Exodus: Allae Hozrot Iakubor noea nam disla Israil, erlagi tan bongshor nam oilo Boni Israil. Iakube tan bibi-baichcha ar foribaror hoḳolre loia Mishor desho gelagi. Ou shomoe tan loge oia zera gela, erar nam oilo,
Ruben, Shimion, Lebi, Ehuda,
Isaḳor, Shobulon, Bin-Iamin,
Dan, Noftali, Sadu ar Ashir.
Iakubor bongshor hoḳoltae milia shottoir zon asla. Ar Iusuf ag taki-u Mishoro taḳta.
Bade Iusuf, tan baiain, ar hi amolor hoḳol mara gela.
Oile tarar bador bongshodor baṛia kub bolala oila. Era sairobae sitria asta Mishor desh borigela.
Ermaze Mishoro eḳzon noea bashsha oila, ein Iusufre sinoin na.
Ein nizor proza oḳolre ḳoila, “Saia deḳo, Boni Israil oḳol amra taki beshio ar bolalao.
Te ao, amra eḳ fondi ḳori, ita zenu ar na baṛoin. Arnae tara baṛia heshe zuddor ḳalo amrar dushmonor loge milia amrar birudde zuddo ḳorbo, bade amrar desh taki zaibogi.”
Teu tara shordar lagaila erare maria-doria zur-zulum ḳoria ḳam ḳoranir lagi. Era Feraunor foshol raḳar lagi Pitum ar Ramashesh namor duiṭa ṭauno banaila.
Oile erar ufre zoto beshi zur-zulum ḳora oilo, erao oto beshi baṛila ar sitrila. Erlagi Mishori oḳole Boni Israilre kub ḍoraigela.
Ḍoraia eraredi aro ḳoṭin ḳam ḳoraila.
Maṭi ḳam, iṭor ḳam ar ketor maze ḳosṭor ḳam ḳoraia erar zanre titta banaililo. Ar tara zur-zulum ḳoria nisṭur-pashanor laḳan ḳam ḳoraito.
Bade Mishoror bashshae Shifra ar Fua namor duizon Ibrani dai beṭire hukum dila,
“Tumra Ibrani beṭintor dai girit gia, itar fuain foeda oile-u marilaio, ḳali fuṛintore zita rakio.”
Oile hi dai beṭinte Allare ḍoraita gotike, Mishori bashshar hukum na mania fuaintoreo zita raḳto.
Teu bashshae erare nia zikaila, “Ita ḳam ḳene ḳorlae? Fuaintore ḳene zita raḳlae?”
Tara zuaf dila, “Ibrani beṭin Mishori beṭintor laḳan nae, tara bout bolala. Dai tarar ḳasat zaibar age-u tarar hurutta foeda oizae.”
Ou duio beṭie Allare ḍoraita ḳori, Allae rohomot ḳoria tarareo aolad dila. Ar Boni Israilo aro beshi ḳori baṛia kub shoktiman oila.
Ou duio beṭie Allare ḍoraita ḳori, Allae rohomot ḳoria tarareo aolad dila. Ar Boni Israilo aro beshi ḳori baṛia kub shoktiman oila.
Ita dekia Feraune nizor proza oḳolre hukum dila, “Ibrani oḳolor kunu fuain oile-u tumra Nil nodo falai dio, ḳali fuṛintore zita rakio.”
Ermaze Lebi gusṭir eḳzon manshe, tan nizor gusṭir ek koinnare shadi ḳorla.
Ou ḳoinnar goro eḳ fuar zonom oilo. Fuagu deḳte kub shundor oae, tin mash dori lukai raḳla.
Heshe ar lukaita na faria, tain nol-ḳagṛar eḳ ṭukri loila. Ou ṭukrit maṭia tel ar alḳatra lefia ogur bitre hurutare haraia, gangor soror nol bonor maze toia aila.
Ar er kita dosha oe deḳar lagi, tar boin duroi ubailo.
Tuṛa bade Feraunor fuṛi gango naoat aila. Gangor faro tan bandi oḳol guragurit asil. Tain soror nol-ḳagṛar maze ou ṭukri dekia, tan bandire ḳoila, “Ou ṭukrigu an.”
Ṭukrir ḍala kulia deḳla, er bitre eḳ fuae ḳander. Dekia tan maea lagigelo. Tain ḳoila, “Ish, igu to kunu Ibranir fua.”
Ou shomoe fuar boin aia Feraunor fuṛire zikailo, “Rani ma, i huruttare dud ḳaoanir lagi kunu Ibrani beṭire faile afnar gese antam ni?”
Feraunor fuṛie ḳoila, “Za angi.” Teu fuṛie gia fuar maʼre loia ailo.
Feraunor fuṛie tanre ḳoila, “Ogo, ami tumar beton dimune, tumi amar oia ou fuagure buḳor dud ḳaoao.” Ou hi beṭie nia huruttare dud ḳaoaia falila.
Fuagu kisu boṛo oar bade tain nia Feraunor fuṛir gese dilaila. Feraunor fuṛie enre nizor fua banai falila. Tain ḳoila, “Ami tare fani taki ṭania tulsi.” Erlagi tar nam raḳla Musa [mani, ṭania tula].
Heshe Musa boṛo oigele eḳdin tan nizor zatir baiaintor gese gia deḳla, tara kub ḳosṭor ḳam ḳorra. Ermaze deḳla, tan nizor Ibrani zatir eḳ beṭare, eḳ Mishorie mair-doir ḳorer.
Dekia sairobae saia ar kunu manush na deḳae, tain hou Mishorire kun ḳoria balur tole gaṛilla.
Bador dino tain hirbar bare gela. Gia deḳla, duizon Ibranie nize nize maramari ḳorer. Ou tain dushi zonre ḳoila, “Oba, tumar baire ḳene marrae?”
He ḳoilo, “Tumare ḳegie amrar hakim banaia bisar ḳorat faṭailo? Ḳail zela hou Mishorire kun ḳorso, oula amareo kun ḳoriltae sairae ni?” Ou Musae ḍoraigela. Tain buzla ita to zana-zani oigese.
Ar Ferauneo ita hunia Musare marilta saila. Ou shomoe Musa Feraunor ges taki bagi gela. Bagia Madian desho boshot ḳorar lagi aila. Aia honor ek kuar ḳasat boila.
Madian desho Shuaib namor eḳ imam sab asla. Tan shatzon fuṛin asoin. Ou fuṛinte kuar faro aia, tarar bafor sagol-meṛare fani ḳaoaibar lagi gamla borat lagla.
Ou shomoe oinno raḳal oḳole tarare ḳedaia dilailo. Oile Musa ubaia tarare shaijjo ḳorla, ar tarar falre fani ḳaoaila.
Tara tarar bafor daro gia harle tain zikaila, “Tumra aiz oto zoldi ḳemne ailae?”
Tara ḳoila, “Eḳ Mishori beṭae amrare raḳal oḳolor at taki basaisoin. Ein amrar sagol-meṛare fani tulia ḳaoaisoin.”
Teu tain zikaila, “I manushgu kuai? Tumra tare toia aillae ḳene? Ere ḍakia ania ḳana ḳaoao.”
Erbade Musae ou imamor baṛit roite razi oila. Imam sabe tan fuṛi Sofurare Musar loge shadi dila.
Bade Sofurar goro eḳ fua oile Musae ḳoila, “Ami to boitol bonia bidesho roiram.” Erlagi ou fuar nam raḳla Zarsum [mani, boitol].
Bout din bade Mishoror bashsha morigela. Boni Israile gulamir lagi ḳator oia ḳanda-ḳaṭi ḳorlo. Tarar ḳandon Allar gese ḳobul oigelo.
Allae tarar foriad hunla. Tain Ibrahim, Isʼhak ar Iakubor loge tan oadar ḳota iad ḳorla.
Ar Boni Israilor bae muḳ firaila, doyar nozore tarar bae saila.
Musae tan hour Madiani imam sab Shuaibor sagol-meṛa raḳta. Eḳdin tan sagolor fal loia morubumir hesh galat Allar faṛ Turor ḳasat gela.
Hono eḳ zonglar maze Mabudor firistae agunir laḳan nuror maz taki tanre deḳa dila. Musae deḳla, zonglar maze aguin zoler otoso zongla zoler na.
Ou tain taijjub oia ḳoila, “Zongla ze zoler na er ḳaron kita? Te aro ḳasat gia deki sain.”
Mabude zebla deḳla ein deḳar lagi ḳasat zairagi, ou shomoe tain zonglar maz taki ḍakia ḳoila, “Musa, O Musa!” Musae ḳoila, “Ounu ami.”
Allae ḳoila, “Ar samne aguaio na. Tumar fao taki zuta kulilao. Zano ni, tumi oḳon ze zagat ubaiso ikan faḳ zaga.
Huno, ami tumar bafor Alla, Ibrahimor Alla, Isʼhakor Alla ar Iakubor Alla.” Ikan huniau Musae tan muḳ lukailla. Allar bae saite tan dilo ḍor hamaigelo.
Mabude formaila, “Ami Mishor desho amar bonda oḳolor duḳ-mosibot dekiar. Mishori shordar oḳolor lagi tarar ḳandon huniar. Tarar duk-koshṭo hoḳolta ami deḳsi.

Dekia Mishori oḳolor zulum taki tarare basaitam ḳori ami nize lamia aisi. Te ami tarare Mishor taki horaia nimugi. Nia roshail zomir bout boṛo shundor eḳ desh dimu. Ikan dud ar mour banḍarala desh. Ou desh oilo oḳonkur Kenani, Hiṭṭi, Amuri, Farizi, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolor desh.
Boni Israilor foriad amar dorbaro aise, Mishori oḳole tarare zela sataira, ita ami dekiar.
Erlagi ami tumare Feraunor gese faṭaiar. Tumi zao, gia amar bonda Boni Israilre Mishor taki bar ḳoria ano.”
Musae zuaf dila, “Ami aroḳzon ḳe, zein Feraunor samne gia Mishor desh taki tarare horaitam farmu?”
Allae ḳoila, “Ami to tumar loge loge roimu. Tumi Mishor taki manshore horaia ania, tarare loia ou faṛo amar ebadot ḳorbae. Teu buzbae amiu tumare faṭaisi.”
Musae aroz ḳorla, “Deḳoukka, ami zebla Boni Israilre gia ḳoimu, tumrar baf-dadar Allae amare bezisoin, ou shomoe tara zudi zikain tan nam kita, te tarare kita zuaf ditam?”
Allae ḳoila, “Ami zein asi, asiu. Boni Israilre oula ḳoio, zen nam ‘ami asi’ tain amare tumrar gese bezisoin.

Tumi gia tarare ḳoio, ‘Mabud’ zein hor-hamesha asoin, ein tumrar baf-dadar Alla, Ibrahimor Alla, Isʼhak ar Iakubor Alla, einu amare tumrar gese bezisoin. Amar hor-hameshakur nam ‘Mabud, zein asoin’. Zuge zuge, purushe purushe ou nam ḳaim roibo.

Tumi zao, gia Boni Israilor murobbi oḳolre eḳano dola ḳoria ḳo, Mabud, zein tarar baf-dadar Alla, Ibrahimor Alla, Isʼhak ar Iakubor Alla, tain tumare didar dia ḳoisoin, ami tumrar bae kial ḳorsi, tumrar uforor zulum-mosibot deḳsi, Mishoro tumrar bae zeta ḳora or eota kial ḳorsi.
Ita dekia ami ḳoiar, ami Mishoror gulami taki tumrare basaia Kenani, Hiṭṭi, Amuri, Farizi, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolor dud ar mour banḍarala desho nimugi.

“Israilor murobbi oḳole tumar ḳota hunba, tumi tarare loge loia Mishoror bashshar gese zaio. Gia ḳoio, ‘Mabud, zein Ibrani oḳolor Alla, tain amare doroshon disoin. Erlagi amra tan name eḳan kurbani ḳortam saiar, amra morubumir bae tin dinor fot gia kurbani dimu, te amrare zaoar onumoti deukka.’
Oile ami zani Mishoror bashshae tumrare zaite dito nae, zur-zobordosti ḳorleo dito nae.
Teu ami amar kudroti at lagaimu ar oula asanoḳ gozob nazil ḳormu, zate he tumrare zaite dey.
Ar ami Mishori oḳolor dilor maze Boni Israilor bae emon eḳ doyar bab foeda ḳoraimu, era zanu Mishor taki ḳali ate na zain.

Hoḳol Israili beṭinte tarar ari-fori ba zerar baṛit tara roin, oula Mishori beṭintor ges taki tarar shuna-rufar goena-gaṭi ar bala ḳafoṛ-sufoṛ ḳuzia nio. Ota dia tumrar fua-fuṛinreo hazaio, ou nomunae tumra Mishorintor don-samana doḳol ḳorbae.”
Musae zuaf dila, “Mabud, tara zudi amare ekin na ḳoroin, amar mat na hunoin ba tara zudi ḳoin, Mabude tumare doroshon disoin na, te ami kita ḳortam?”
Ou Mabude tane zikaila, “Tumar ato igu kita?” Tain ḳoila, “Egu laṭi.”
Mabude ḳoila, “Oḳṭa maṭit falao.” Musae laṭire maṭit falaiteu iṭa haf oigelo. Haf dekiau tain faldi horla.
Mabude tane hukum ḳorla, “At baṛaia ogur lenjo doro.” Ar tain dorar loge loge ogu hirbar laṭi oigelo.
Bade Mabude ḳoila, “Tumio oula ḳorio, teu tara hasau ekin ḳorba tarar baf-dadaintor Alla, Ibrahimor Alla, Isʼhak ar Iakubor Allae tumare doroshon disoin.”
Mabude hirbar ḳoila, “Tumar at tumar saddoror tole harao.” Tain at haraila, ar bar ḳorar badeu tan at kusṭo-dolbeda bemare dudor laḳan dola oigelo.
Mabude ḳoila, “Tumar at hirbar hono harao.” Tain haraila ar saddoror tol taki bar ḳoria deḳoin, agor laḳan bala oigese.
Mabude ḳoila, “Tara zudi tumare ekin na ḳoroin, te tumar laṭire haf oa deḳle ekin ḳorba, ar eoṭae ekin na ḳorle tumar ator bemaror keramoti deḳle tara ekin ḳorba.
Ar zudi i duio keramotieo ekin na ḳoroin, tumar ḳota na manoin, te tumi Nil nod taki tuṛa fani ania hukna maṭit falaio, deḳbae maṭit foṛiau i fani lou oizibo.”
Ou Musae Mabudre ḳoila, “O malik, ami to bala ḳori mat-ḳotau mattam fari na, ageo fartam na ar afne i gulamor loge batchit ḳorar badeo fari na, amar to zifra baṛua.”
Mabude ḳoila, “Manshor muk ke banaise, ami nae ni? Ḳe manshore buba, ḳalua ba anda banain? Souḳe deḳar lagi sokur faoar ḳe dein? Ita to ami Mabudeu dei na ni?
Te tumi zao, gia kita mattae ami hikaia dimu. Tumar muḳor zobanre ami shaijjo ḳormu.”
Tain ḳoila, “O malik, ami minot ḳoriar, oinno ḳeurore faṭai deukka.”
Ou Musar ufre Mabudor gusa uṭlo. Tain ḳoila, “Tumar bai Harun bin Lebi ase na ni? Ami zani, he bala boktita dito fare. He oḳon tumar loge deḳa ḳorat ar, tumare dekia he kub kushi oibo.
Tumi hikaia dio ar ḳoio he kita matito. Ami tumra duiozonor muḳor zobanre shaijjo ḳormu. Ar hono gia kita ḳortae ami hikaia dimu.
Tumar bai Harunor muḳ oibo tumar muḳ, he tumar oia manshor loge matibo. Fegambor oḳole zela Allar ḳalam ḳoin, Harune oula tumar buli ḳoibo.
Ou laṭi tumar ato rakio, iṭa dia hou keramoti-muzeza oḳol zair ḳorbae.”

Madian desho taḳteu Mabude Musare hukum ḳorsla, “Tumi Mishoro zaogi, ḳaron Mishoror zeta manshe tumare kun ḳorta saisla, ita oḳon mori gesoin.” Teu Musae tan hour Shuaibor ḳasat gia ḳoila, “Ami amar zonom maṭi Mishor desho zaitam sairam, amar ḳesh-kuṭum oḳol zita asoin ki na, tarar hal-hokikot deḳat zaitam, te amare zaoar onumoti deukka.” Houre ḳoila, “Aichcha, sohi-salamote zao.”

Madian desho taḳteu Mabude Musare hukum ḳorsla, “Tumi Mishoro zaogi, ḳaron Mishoror zeta manshe tumare kun ḳorta saisla, ita oḳon mori gesoin.” Teu Musae tan hour Shuaibor ḳasat gia ḳoila, “Ami amar zonom maṭi Mishor desho zaitam sairam, amar ḳesh-kuṭum oḳol zita asoin ki na, tarar hal-hokikot deḳat zaitam, te amare zaoar onumoti deukka.” Houre ḳoila, “Aichcha, sohi-salamote zao.”
Ou Musae tan bibi ar fuaintore gadar ufre soṛaia Mishoror fote roana oila. Tan ato Allai keramotir hou laṭi raḳla.
Mabude Musare hukum dila, “Tumi Mishoro gia harle amar deoa keramoti oḳol Feraunor samne deḳaio, oile ami tar dilre fashan banailimu, he manshore saṛto nae.
Tumi Feraunre ḳoio, Mabude nize ḳoisoin, ‘Boni Israil to amar boṛo futor laḳan.
Ami nize tumare hukum ḳorslam, amar ebadoto zaita ḳori tumi amar futre saṛi ditae, oile tumi mancho na. Erdae amio tumar boṛo futre marilimu.’ ”
Bade Mishoro zaoar foto rait ḳaṭaibar zagat aile Mabude Musare marilita ḳori mukamuki oila.
Oile tan bibi Sofurae eḳan darail fattor loia tan fuar mosolmani ḳorailla ar oḳṭa tan zamai Musar faor maze suaia ḳoila, “Lour bodola ami tumare zamai hishabe faisi.”
Teu Musare Mabude saṛi dila. Mosolmani ḳamor befare Sofurae to ou ḳotau ḳoisla.
Ermaze Mabude Harunre ḳoila, “Tumi morubumit gia Musar loge deḳa ḳoro.” Ou tain gela ar Allar faṛ Turor gese aia Musare faia suma dila.
Ar Mabude zeta zeta ḳoibar lagi Musare hukum disla, Musae ita hokkolta Harunre zanaila. Mabude zoto laḳan keramoti deḳanir hukum disoin, ita hoḳoltau tain Harunre buzaila.
Bade Musa ar Harun Mishor desho gia Boni Israilor hoḳol murobbire dola ḳorla.
Mabude Musare zotota ḳoisla, Harune ita hoḳolta tarare zanaila, ar hou keramoti oḳolo manshor samne deḳaila.
Erlagi manshe ita ekin ḳorla. Tara zebla hunla, Mabude tarar bae kial ḳorsoin, tarar uforor zulum-mosibot deḳsoin, ou tara tanre shoizda ḳorla.
Musa ar Harune gia Feraunre ḳoila, “Mabud, zein Boni Israilor Alla, tain nize ḳoisoin, amar bonda oḳolre tumi saṛi deo, amar name hoj ḳorar lagi, tara morubumit hizrot ḳorte oibo, tumi tarare saṛo.”
Feraune zuaf dilo, “I Mabud aroḳzon ḳe, zen hukum mania ami Boni Israilre saṛi ditam? Ila kunu Mabudre ami sini na, ar Boni Israilreo ami saṛtam nae.”

Tara ḳoila, “Ibrani oḳolor Allae amrare doroshon disoin. Erlagi amra minot ḳoriar amrare morubumir bae tin dinor fot gia, amrar Mabud Allar name kurbani ḳorte deukka, arnae tain hoeto amrare gozobi bemar dia ba zuddor maze falaia marilaiba.”
Mishoror bashshae zuaf dila, “O Musa ar Harun, tumra manshore ḳene ḳamo taki firairae? Zao, tumrao gia ḳamo lago.
Deḳrae ni, desho tumrar manush bout baṛi gesoin, ar tumrar lai faia itae kunu ḳam ḳorra na.”
Ou Feraune hou dinu Mishori zalim shordar ar Israili subedar oḳolre hukum ḳorla,
“Iṭ banaibar lagi tumra manshore agor laḳan ḳer-nera ania dio na, tara gia ita zugaṛ ḳoruk.
Oile age tara zotoḳan iṭ banaito oḳono otoḳan banaite oibo, eḳano ḳom oito nae. Ita alshia oigesoin ḳori, ono aia tarar Allar namor kurbani ḳorta ḳoia sillaira.
Tumra tarare aro ḳosṭor ḳamo lagao, teu itae kunu laḳan baze mat na hunia ḳamor maze mon diba.”
Ou hi shordar ar subedar oḳol baroi gia manshore ḳoila, “Feraune ḳoisoin, oḳon taki tain ar iṭ bananir ḳer zugai dita nae.
Tumra zen taki faro ḳer-nera zugaio, oile tumrar ḳam kuntau ḳomail oito nae.”
Ou manshe ḳer-nera tukaibar lagi hara Mishor desho sitri gela.
Ar shordar oḳole bare bare tagda dia ḳoilo, “Age ḳer zugaia deoar bala tumra forteḳ din zotoḳan iṭ banaitae, oḳono otoḳan banao.”
Feraunor zalim shordar oḳole Boni Israilor ufre ze subedar lagaisil, hou shordar oḳol aia subedar oḳolre mair-doir ḳoria zikailo, “Tumra age zotoḳan iṭ ditae, oḳon otoḳan deo na ḳene?”
Ou Boni Israilor subedar oḳole aia Feraunor gese nalish dila, “Afnar i gulam oḳolor loge ila bebohar ḳene ḳorra?
Shordar oḳole amrare ḳer-nera zugai dein na, ta-o iṭ banaibar hukum dein ar afnar i gulam oḳolre mair-doir ḳoroin, oile dush to afnar nizor shordaror.”
Feraune zuaf dilo, “Tumra alshia, kuṛia, erlagi ḳoirae Mabudor name kurbani ḳorat zaitam.
Zao, ḳam ḳoro gia. Tumrare ḳer deoa zaito nae, ta-o forteḳ din zotoḳan iṭ banaibar ḳota asil, otoḳanu banaite oibo.”
Ou Boni Israilor subedar oḳole buzla, tara bifodor maze foṛsoin, ḳaron tarare hukum ḳora oise, age zotoḳan iṭ banani lagto, oḳono otoḳan iṭ banaite oibo, ḳom oito nae.
Tara Feraunor ges taki zaoar foto Musa ar Harunor loge deḳa oilo, era ubaia bar saoat asla.
Subedar oḳole ḳoila, “Mabude afnarar faona shaza diba, afnara Feraun ar tar uzir-naziror gese amrare fosa-ganda banaia, amrare kun ḳorar lagi toluar nia tarar ato disoin.”
Ou Musae hirbar gia Mabudor gese foriad ḳorla, “O din duniar malik, tumi ḳene tumar bondare musiboto falailae? Ar amare kitallagi bezilae?
Feraunor gese tumar ḳota hunanir bad takiu tumar bonda oḳolor ufre zulum to aro baṛise. Oile tumi to kuntau ḳorlae na.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Feraunor kita dosha oe tumi dekio, amar ator zur deḳleu he manshore saṛi dibo. Zurala ator kudrot deḳleu he tar desh taki erare ḳedai dibo.”
Allae Musar loge batchit ḳori ḳoila, “Ami ‘Mabud zein asoin’.
Ami Ibrahim, Isʼhak ar Iakubor gese shorbo-shoktiman Alla name didar ditam, ‘Mabud zein asoin’ name tarare didar ditam na.
Ami tarar loge ou oada ḳorslam, ami tumrare Kenan desh dimu, ze desho tumra musafir oia ro, ou deshu ami tumrare dimu.
Ḳas ḳori Mishori oḳole Boni Israilre gulami ḳoranir lagi erar ḳandon hunia, amar hou oada iad ḳorlam.

Oḳon tumi gia Boni Israilre ḳo, Mabude ḳoisoin, ami Mabud, ami tumrare Mishori oḳolor tol taki bar ḳori anmu, tarar gulami taki azad ḳormu. Tarare deḳar moto shaza dia, amar kudroti atdi tumrare ḳalas ḳormu.
Heshe tumrare amar nizor bonda banaimu, ami nize tumrar Alla oimu. Teu tumra buzbae, ami Allau tumrar Mabud, ar Mishori oḳolor baror tol taki amiu tumrare basaisi.
Ami Ibrahim, Isʼhak, Iakubor loge ze deshor ḳota oada ḳorsi, hou desho tumrare loia zaimu, tumra hou deshor malik oibae. Amiu Mabud.”
Musae gia ita hoḳolta tarare zanaila, oile hi betaea zulum-toklif ar gulami ḳorte ḳorte mon-mora oizaoae, tara ar Musar mate ḳan dila na.
Ou Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Tumi gia Mishoror bashsha Feraunre ḳo, he zanu tar desh taki erare zaite dey.”
Musae zuaf dila, “Boni Israileu zebla amar mat huner na, te Feraune kila hunbo? Ar amar to matte muḳo lagizae.”
Teu Mabude Musa ar Harunre ḳoila, “Tumra Boni Israil ar Mishoror raza Feraunre ḳo, Mabude amrare hukum disoin, Boni Israilre Mishor taki bar ḳori neoar lagi.”

Musa nobir nizor zati Boni Israilor fordan murobbi oila Hozrot Iakub, Allae ou Iakubor noea nam disla Israil. Israilor fuain oila Ruben, Shimion, Lebi shoho muṭ barozon, ou Lebi oila Musa ar Harun ḳandanor mul-murobbi.
Israilor boṛo fua Rubenor fuain oila Honuk, Pollu, Hasir ar Kormi, era Ruben ḳandanor mul-murobbi.
Shimionor fuain oila Jimuel, Jamin, Ohod, Jakin, Shuhor ar tar Kenani bour torofa fua Shoul, era Shimion ḳandanor mul-murobbi.
Ḳandan taliḳa hishabe Lebir fuain oila Zarsun, Kahat ar Marari. Lebi eḳ-sho shaṛtish boros basisla.
Zarzir gusṭir fordan hishabe Zarsunor fuain oila Libni ar Shimio.
Kahator fuain oila Imran, Izhar, Hebron ar Ujjol. Kahat eḳ-sho tetrish boros basisla.
Mararir fuain oila, Moholi ar Mushi.
Erau oila Lebir ḳandanor mul-murobbi.
Imranor fuain oila Musa ar Harun. Imrane tan fufu Iuḳabezre bia ḳorsla, tan feṭo erar zonom oisil. Imran eḳ-sho shaṛtish boros basisla.
Ujjolor fuain Mishael, Ilshafon ar Zitri.
Ar Harune Aminadabor fuṛi Nahishor boin Ilishebare bia ḳorae, tan hurutta oila Nadab, Abihu, Ali-Azor ar Isamar.
Gusṭi hishabe era oila Lebi ḳandanor mul-murobbi.
Ou Harun ar Musare Mabude hukum ḳorsla, tumra Boni Israilre sifai dolor laḳan Mishor taki bar ḳoro.
Musa ar Haruneu Boni Israilre Mishor taki bar ḳori anar ḳota Mishoror bashsha Feraunor loge matisla.
Mabude Musar loge zedin Mishor desho batchit ḳorla,
hou din tain ḳoila, “Ami Mabud. Te tumare oḳon zeta zeta ḳoimu, ita hoḳolta tumi Mishoror bashsha Feraunre ḳoio.”
Musae Mabudor dorbaro aroz ḳorla, “Deḳoukka, amar to matte muḳo lagizae, Feraune kunu amar mat hunbo ni?”
Ou Mabude Musare ḳoila “Huno, ami Feraunor gese tumare Allar laḳan banaimu. Ar tumar bai Harunre banaimu tumar nobi.
Ami tumare zela hukum ḳormu, tumi oula Harunre ḳoibae, ar Harune ota Feraunre ḳoibo; zate he Boni Israilre tar desh taki saṛi dey.
Oile ami Feraunor dilre fashan ḳorilimu. Mishor desho ami bout keramoti ar kudroti lila-ḳela deḳaimu.
Tar badeo Feraune tumrar mator dam dito nae. Teu ami Mishoror ufre amar at lagaia, deḳar moto shaza dia Mishor desh taki amar nizor bonda Boni Israilre sifair laḳan dole dole bar ḳormu.
Mishoror maze amar nizor at lagaimu, Mishori oḳolor maz taki Boni Israilre bar ḳoria anmu, oudin tara buzba amiu Mabud.”
Bade Musa ar Harune oula ḳorla, Mabudor hukum mafik kam ḳorla.
Feraunor loge mat-ḳotar shomoe Musar boeosh asil ashi, ar Harunor tirashi boros.
Ou shomoe Mabude Musa ar Harunre ḳoila,
“Feraune zebla ḳoibo, tumrar nizor kunu keramoti ḳam deḳao, teu tumi Harunre ḳoio, tar laṭi nia Feraunor samne falaito, falanir loge logeu iṭa haf oizibo.”
Bade Musa ar Harun Feraunor gese gela, gia Mabudor hukum mafik kam ḳorla. Harune Feraun ar tar uzir-naziror samne hou laṭi falanir loge logeu iṭa haf oigelo.
Ou Ferauneo tar gunin ar zadugir oḳolre anailo, tarao tarar zadu-montro dia oula deḳaila.
Tara hoḳoleu zarzir laṭi saṛlo, ar eota haf oigelo, oile Harunor laṭie tarar hokkol laṭire gilililo.
Ita dekiao Feraunor dil fashan roilo, he erar mate ḳan dilo na, zela Mabude age ḳoisla.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Feraunor dil to fashan, he manshore saṛte razi nae.
Te tumi biani bala Feraunor gese zaio, gele deḳbae he fanir gese zaibo, tumi tar loge deḳa ḳorar lagi Nil nodor faro ubaio. Tumar ze laṭi haf oisil, ou laṭi ato ḳori nio.

Nia tare ḳoio, ‘Mabud, zein Ibrani oḳolor Alla, tain nize amare faṭaisoin afnare oḳan ḳoitam, tumi amar bonda oḳolre saṛi deo, tara amar bondegi ḳorar lagi morubumit hizrot ḳoruk, ta-o oḳono tumi hunrae na.
Erlagi oḳon tumi buzbae, amiu Mabud.’ Oḳan ḳoia hari tumi ḳoio, ‘Deḳoukka, ami nizor ator laṭi dia ou Nil nodor fanit baṛi marmu, ar hokkol fani lou oizibo.
Hokkol mas morizibo ar fosa gondo baroibo, teu Mishori oḳole ou Nil nodor fani ḳaita farta nae.’ ”

Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Harunre ou ḳota ḳo, tumi nizor laṭi loia Mishori oḳolor hokkol fanir ufre, deshor gang-nala, ḳal-bil, aor-baor sairobae tumar at baṛao, teu itar hokkol fani lou oizibo. Fattor kudia banail ba laḳṛir fatil-ḳoloshir maze toa fanio lou oizibo.”
Ou Musa ar Harune Mabudor hukum mafik oula ḳorla, tain laṭi usa ḳori Feraun ar tar uzir-naziror samne Nil nodor fanit baṛi marla, teu hoḳol fani lou oigelo.
Nil nodor hoḳol mas morigelo, hoḳol fanit fosa gondo baroilo, Mishori oḳole fani ar ḳaita farla na, Mishor deshor hoḳol fani lou oigelo.
Mishori zadugir oḳoleo tarar zadu-montro saṛia oula ḳorlo, ete Feraunor dil fashan roilo. He erar mato ḳan dilo na, zela Mabude age ḳoisla.
Bade Feraune Musa ar Harunre fis dia tar razbaṛit gelogi, ita kuntatu ḳan dilo na.
Oile kunu Mishorie gangor fani ḳaite na farae, fani ḳaoar lagi gangor faror sairobae tara gat kudila.
Nil nodor fanit Mabudor gozob nazil oar bade shat din guzori gelo.
Ou shat din bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Feraunor gese zao, gia tare ḳo, Mabude nize ḳoira, amar kezmot ḳorar lagi amar bonda oḳolre saṛi deo.
Tarare na saṛia kunu bada dile, ami beng dia tumar asta desho gozob ḍalmu.
Asta Nil nod benge boriziba, ar ita aia tumar razbaṛit, hutibar goro, tumar bisnat uṭiba. Ar tumar uzir-naziror goro, tumar proza oḳolor goro, tumar undal ar fiṭa banaibar gamlato aia hamaiba.
Tumar, ar tumar uzir-naziror, ar proza oḳolor gotoro beng uṭiba.”
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Harunre ḳo, tumi Nil nod ar ḳal-bilor ufre hou laṭiala at baṛaia asta Mishoro beng anao.”
Ou Harune Mishoror hoḳol fanir ufre tan at baṛaila, teu bengainte aia Mishor desh boria jam oigela, kunu zaga ḳali roilo na.
Oile zadugir oḳoleo tarar zadu-montro dia Mishoro oula beng anlo.

Bade Feraune Musa ar Harunre anaia ḳoila, “Mabudor gese aroz ḳoro, tain amar ges taki ar amar proza oḳolor ges taki i beng oḳol horaia neukka, taile ami manshore saṛi dimu, zate tara gia Mabudor name kurbani ḳorto fare.”

Ougi Musae Feraunre ḳoila, “Afne amare ṭik kori ḳoukka, ami kun shomoekur lagi minoti ḳortam, kun shomoe afnar gor, afnar uzir-nazir ar proza oḳolor gor taki beng oḳol horia zaitagi, gia ḳali gango roita?”
Tain ḳoila “Ḳailkur lagi.” Ou Musae ḳoila, “Afnar zoban motou ouk, zate afne buzta faroin, amrar Mabud Allar homani ar keu nai.
Bengainte afnar ges taki, afnar gor-baṛi taki, afnar uzir-nazir ar proza oḳolor gor taki horia gia ḳali Nil nodo roiba.”
Musa ar Harun Feraunor ges taki bare gela, gia Musae Mabudor gese foriad ḳorla, Feraunor ufor taki bengor gozob horanir lagi.
Mabude Musar arzi ḳobul ḳorae, tarar baṛi-gor, uṭan ar bondor hoḳol beng morigelo.
Ar manshe itare zagae zagae dola ḳorle, fosia desho gondo baroilo.
Oile Feraune zebla deḳlo, gozob to horigese, ou he tar dil fashan ḳorillo. Erar mato ar ḳan dilo na, zela Mabude age ḳoisla.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Harunre ḳo, tumi tumar laṭi baṛaia maṭir dulit baṛi maro, teu i duil mosha oia asta Mishor desh borizibo.”
Tara oula ḳorla, Harune tan laṭiala at baṛaia maṭir dulit baṛi marla, teu maṭir hokkol duil mosha oigelo. Ou moshae manush, zanuar ar Mishoror hokkol bae borigelo.
Ar zadugir oḳoleo tarar zadu-montro dia oula mosha banaito sailo, oile farlo na. Manush ar zanuaror maze mosha roilo.
Teu zadugir oḳole Feraunre ḳoila, “Ita to Allar kudrot.” Ta-o Feraunor dil fashan roilo, he erar mate ḳan dilo na, zela Mabude age ḳoisla.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi fozore uṭia Feraunor gese azir o, gele deḳbae he fanir gese aibo. Tumi tare oula ḳoio, Mabude nize ḳoira, amar kezmot ḳorar lagi tumi amar bonda oḳolre saṛi deo.

Zudi na saṛo taile ami tumar, tumar uzir-nazir, tumar proza oḳolor ufre, ar tumar goraintor maze ḳamṛaora fuḳor fal faṭaimu, ita fale-fale aia Mishori oḳolor goro ar tarar boshot-biṭa shoho hoḳol zagat jam oiziba.
Oile ami amar bonda oḳolor boshot ḳana Gushon elaḳare ita taki basaimu, ino fuḳor fal aita nae. Teu tumi buztae farbae, ami Mabud i desho asi.
Ami to amar bonda ar tumar prozar maze tofat-fartokko ḳormu, ḳail i nomuna deḳbae.”
Ar Mabude oula ḳorla, Feraun ar tar uzir-naziror goro ḳamṛaora fuḳor fal ailo, asta Mishor deshor hokkol bae fuḳor lagi shorbonash oigelo.
Teu Feraune Musa ar Harunre ḍakaia ḳoila, “Tumra zao, deshor bitre tumrar Allar name kurbani ḳorogi.”

Musae ḳoila, “Ila ḳora ṭik nae, ḳaron amrar Mabud Allar name Mishori oḳolor ginna ḳora kurbani ḳorte oibo. Ar deḳoukka, Mishori oḳolor samne tarar ginna ḳora kurbani ḳorle tara to amrare ḳankoṛdi iṭaia mariliba.
Te amrar Mabud Allae zela hukum ḳorba, amra morubumir bae tin dinor fot horia gia, tan name oula kurbani ḳormu.”
Feraune ḳoila, “Ami tumrare saṛi diar, tumra morubumit gia tumrar Allar kurbani ḳoro. Oile beshi duroi zaio na, tumra amar lagio minot ḳorio.”

Ou Musae ḳoila, “Deḳoukka, ami afnar ges taki horia gia Mabudor gese minoti ḳormu, teu ḳail afnar ges taki, afnar uzir-nazir ar afnar proza oḳolor ges taki fuḳor fal horiziba. Oile manshe Mabudor kurbani ḳorat zaite afne ar kunu baotabazi ḳoroin na zanu.”
Bade Musae Feraunor ges taki gia Mabudor gese minoti ḳorla.
Ar Mabude Musar arzi mafik kam ḳorla. Feraun, tar uzir-nazir ar tar proza oḳolor ges taki hokkol fuk horigela, eguo roila na.
Oile hirbar Feraune tar dil fashan ḳorillo, manshore saṛlo na.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Feraunor ḳasat gia tare ḳo, Mabud, zein Ibrani oḳolor Alla, tain nize ḳoira, amar ebadot ḳorar lagi amar bonda oḳolre saṛi deo.
Tarare saṛte razi na oia oḳono bada dile,
hunia raḳo, bondor maze tumar foshuintor ufre, guṛaintor, gadaintor, uṭ, ar goru-sagol, meṛaintor ufreo ami Mabude at dimu, betaea bemaror moṛki saṛimu.
Oile ami Mabude Mishoror ar Boni Israilor foshur maze tofat ḳormu; Boni Israilor kunu foshu morta nae.”
Ar Mabude shomoeo ṭik koria dilaila, samnor ḳail tain desho i ḳam ḳorba.
Hasau bador din Mabude oulau ḳorla, teu Mishoror hokkol foshu morigela, oile Boni Israilor egu foshuo morla na.
Feraune manushdi ḳobor loia deḳlo, Boni Israilor egu foshuo morsoin na; ta-o tar dil fashan roilo, he manshore saṛlo na.
Ou Mabude Musa ar Harunre ḳoila, “Tumra duiozonor muiṭ boria undalor sali ano, ania Musae ou salire Feraunor samne ufredi siṭai deo.
Deḳbaene, ita hara Mishor deshor maze fatla duil oia hoḳol zagar manush ar foshuintor gotoro fuṭ oia ga oibo.”
Teu tara undalor sali ania Feraunor samne ubaia, Musae ufredi siṭai dila, ete manshor ar foshuintor gotoro ga-ala fuṭ oilo.
Ar ou gar lagi zadugir oḳole Musar samne ubaita farla na, hoḳol Mishori ar zadugir oḳolor gotoro-o fuṭ oilo.
Oile Mabude Feraunor dil fashan ḳorilla. He erar mate ḳan dilo na, zela Mabude age ḳoisla.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi biane uṭia Feraunor samne ubaia oula ḳoio, Mabud, zein Ibrani oḳolor Alla, tain nize ḳoira, amar ebadot ḳorar lagi amar bonda oḳolre saṛi deo.
Naile i fira ami tumar, tumar uzir-nazir ar tumar proza oḳolor maze amar hokkol zator gozob saṛimu. Teu tumi buzbae, hara duniait amar homani ḳeu nai.
Er ageu ami amar at baṛaia betaea moṛki dia tumare ar tumar proza oḳolre martam farlam one; tumi duniai taki binash oigelae one.
Asole erlagiu ami tumare duniait otodin basaisi, zate tumare amar lila-ḳela deḳai, ar hara duniait amar nam zair oe.
Tumi oḳono amar bonda oḳolre saṛrae na, tumar beṭagiri deḳairae,
te dekio, ḳail i shomoye ami ou laḳan hil-tufan ar meg dimu, zeta Mishoror zonom taki aiz forzonto kunudin oise na.
Erlagi bondor maze tumar foshuin ar zotota ase, itare ania goro harao; manush ba foshuin zeta goro hamaita nae, itar ufre hil foṛia hokkolṭi morba.”
Teu Feraunor uzir-naziror maze zera Mabudor zobane ḍoraila, tara zoldi ḳori nizor gulam ar foshuintore goror bitre anaila;
Oile Mabudor zobanre zetae dam dilo na, tarar gulam ar foshuintore bondor maze toilo.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi asmanor bae nizor at baṛao, teu Mishoror hokkol zagat hil-tufan oibo, Mishoror manush, foshu ar ketor hoḳol gas-gasalir ufre ita foṛbo.”
Ou Musae tan ator laṭi ufredi tulla, Mabude Mishor deshor ufre megor ḍak-zilḳanir loge hil-tufan deoaila; ar asmani ṭaṭa zomino foṛlo.
Ou hilor loge megor zilkani ar ṭaṭao asil. I laḳan gozobi hil-tufan Mishor deshor zonom taki kunudino oise na.
Hara Mishor deshor bondor mazor hokkol manush ar foshuintor ufreo kub zure zure hil foṛlo, ar ketor hoḳol foshol nosṭo oigelo ar hoḳol gas-gasalio bangi gelo.
Ḳali Boni Israilor boshot ḳana Gushon elaḳat hil-tufan oilo na.
Bade Feraune manush faṭaia Musa ar Harunre anaia ḳoilo, “I fira ami oforad ḳorsi. Mabud to pak-fobitro, oile ami ar amar proza oḳol oforadi.
Te gozobi megor ḍaḳ ar hil-tufan to bout oise, ar zartam fariar na. Erlagi ami oḳon tumrare saṛi dimu, ar aṭḳaitam nae. Tumra amar lagi Mabudor gese minot ḳoro.”
Musae tare ḳoila, “Ami ṭaunor baire giau Mabudor gese at tulmu, teu megor ḍaḳ, hil-tufan bondo oizibo, zate afne buzta faroin i duniai to Mabudor.
Oile ami to zani, afne ba afnar uzir-nazir oḳole oḳono Alla Mabudre ḍoraira na.”
I shomoe ketor hoḳol nalia gas ar barli nosṭo oigelo, ḳaron nalia gasor ful ar barlir soṛa baroi gesil.
Oile kunu zator gomor gas boṛo na oae itar ḳeti oilo na.
Teu Musae Feraunor samne taki ṭaunor bare gia Mabudor gese at tulla, loge loge megor ḍaḳ, hil-tufan bondo oilo, megor zoṛio bondo oigelo.
Oile Feraun ar tar uzir-nazir oḳole meg, megor ḍaḳ ar hil foṛa bondo oigese dekia tarar dil fashan ḳorilla. Feraune hirbar guna ḳorlo.
Tar dil fashan oizaoae, he Boni Israilre saṛlo na, Mabude age zela Musare ḳoisla.
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Feraunor gese zao; ami to tar ar tar uzir-naziror dilre fashan ḳorilisi, zate tarar samne ami amar kudroti lila-ḳela deḳaitam fari.
Ami Mishori oḳolor ufre zeta zeta ḳoṭin gozob disi, tarar maze kudroti zeta lila-ḳela zair ḳorsi, tumi ita tumar aolad ar nati-futir gese gof ḳortae faro, ar amiu zen Mabud iṭa buztae faro.”

Teu Musa ar Harune Feraunor gese gia ḳoila, “Alla, zein Ibrani oḳolor Mabud, tain nize ḳoira, tumi amar samne mata nuaite ar ḳotodin horail roitae? Huno, tumi amar bonda oḳolre amar ebadot ḳorar lagi saṛi deo.
Tarare saṛte razi na oile dekio, ami ḳail tumar shimanat fongofal oḳol saṛimu.
Itae aia tumar asta zominre oula beriliba, kunu manshe maṭi deḳto farto nae. Hil-tufan taki zotota basigese, ketor maze zoto gas-gasali roise, ita hokkolta tara ḳailiba.

Tumar nizor gor-baṛi, tumar uzir-naziror gorain, ar hokkol Mishori oḳolor gorain boria jam oiziba. Tumar moe-murobbi ar tarar baf-dada oḳoleo duniait tarar zonom taki aiz forzonto kunudin oula deḳsoin na.” Oḳan ḳoiau tain muḳ firaia Feraunor ges taki bare gelagi.
Feraunor uzir-nazire tare ḳoilo, “I beṭae ar ḳotodin amrare sataito? Otar Alla Mabudor ebadotor lagi otare saṛi deukka. Afne oḳono kunta buzra na ni, asta Mishor desh nu sarḳar oizar?”
Ou Feraune Musa ar Harunre hirbar anailo, anaia ḳoilo, “Tumra zaogi, gia tumrar Alla Mabudor ebadot ḳoro. Oile ḳe ḳe zaitae sairae?”
Musae ḳoila, “Amra to Mabudor name hojo zairam. Te amrar huruttain, murobbi, fua-fuṛin ar goru-sagol loia zaimu.”
Feraune ḳoilo, “Aichcha, ami zudi hasau tumrare huruta-muruta dia saṛi dei, te tumrar ou Mabudo zanu tumrar loge oia zaegi. Ḳobordar! Tumrar motlob to bala nae.
Na, ila to oito nae, tumrar hokkolta nite ditam nae. Tumra zebla zaitaeu sairae, te ḳali beṭain zaogi.” Oḳan ḳoia hari Feraune tar samne taki Musa ar Harunre ḳedai dilo.
Teu Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Mishor deshor ufre fongofalor lagi at tulo, fongofale aia Mishoror zominor hoḳol gas-gasali ḳailibo. Hil-tufan taki zotota basise, ita hokkolta ḳailibo.”
Musae Mishoror ufre tan laṭi melia dorla, ar Mabude hara din, hara rait deshor maze fubali haoa saṛla, ou fubali haoae biane fongofal loia azilo.
Hara Mishor deshor ufre fongofale jam oigela. Mishoror hoḳol zagat fongofale gis-gis ḳorla, kub bezati fongofal aila, oula fongofal er ageo kunudin oisoin na ar badeo kunudin oita nae.
Tara asta zominor ufor gurilila, desh andair oigelo, ar zominor zoto ket, gas-gasali hil-tufan taki basi gesil, ita hokkolta ḳailila. Asta Mishoror kunu gas-gasali ba ketor foshol kuntau roilo na.
Feraune zoldi ḳori Musa ar Harunre anaia ḳoilo, “Ami to tumra ar tumrar Alla Mabudor gese gunagar oigesi.
Te minot ḳoriar, ḳali eḳan bar amar guna maf ḳori deo. Amar ges taki i ḳa’l oḳolre horai neoar lagi, tumrar Alla Mabudre minot ḳoro.”
Ou Musae Feraunor ges taki horia gia Mabudor gese minot ḳorla;
Ar Mabude kub zure fochchima haoa saṛla, itae fongofal oḳolre ḳedaia saf ḳoria Nil doriat falailo, Mishoror kunu zagat egu fuḳo roilo na.
Oile Mabude Feraunor dil fashan ḳorilla, he Boni Israilre saṛlo na.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi asman muka tumar at baṛao; teu hara desho oto gono andair oibo, i andair at dia soa zaibo.”
Musae asman muka at baṛaile tin din forzonto hara Mishor desh kub gono andair oilo.
Tin din ḳeu ḳeuror muḳo deḳto farlo na, ḳeu zaga taki loṛto farlo na. Oile Boni Israil oḳolor goro kunu rushonir obab asil na.
Feraune Musare anaia ḳoilo, “Zao, tumra gia tumrar Mabudor ebadot ḳoro, tumrar huruttainreo neogi, ḳali tumrar goru-sagolor fal taḳuk.”
Musae ḳoila, “Amrar Mabud Allar name dibar lagi, foshu kurbani ar Zalail Kurbanir foshuin amrar loge nite oibo.

Amrar loge oia amrar foshuino zaiba, foshur eḳan kuṛao toia zaitam nae. Amrar Mabud Allar ebadotor lagi on taki kurbani ḳora lagbo, ar kita kita kurbani ḳortam, ita amra hono na gele ḳoitam fartam nae.”
Oile Mabude Feraunor dil fashan ḳorilla, he erare saṛte razi oilo na.
Feraune ḳoilo, “Amar samne taki bago. Ḳobordar! Amar muḳor samne ar kunudin aio na. Amar samne zedin aibae, hidin zan ḳuaibae.”
Musae ḳoila, “Balare bala! Ami shok koria kunudinu afnar muḳ deḳat aitam nae.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ami Feraun ar Mishor deshor ufre ar matro eḳṭa gozob saṛmu, erbade he tumrare on tone saṛi dibo, saṛar bala he tumrare ekkebare ḳedai dibo.
Tumi Boni Israilre hikai deo, hokkol beṭain-beṭinte tarar Mishori ari-forir ges taki shuna-rufar goena-gaṭi ḳuzia neuk.”
Ou haloto Mishori oḳolor nozoro maea faite Mabude shaijjo ḳorla. Ermaze Mishor desho Feraunor uzir-nazir ar proza oḳolor gese Hozrot Musa kub ijjoti bonigela.
Musae Feraunre ḳoila, “Mabude nize ḳoira, ami ada raitkur bala Mishor deshor mazdi zaimu.
Ete godit boa Feraunor boṛo fua taki bara-banra bandir fua forzonto, Mishor deshor maze rora hokkol foribaror boṛo fuain moriziba. Erloge hoḳol foshuintor foela meda baichchao moriziba.
I laḳan dosha Mishor desho kunudin oiseo na ar oito-o nae, asta Mishor desho ou laḳan ḳandon ḳandiba.
Oile Boni Israilor kunu manush ba foshur bae egu kukureo uh ḳorto nae, zate afnara buzta faroin ami Mabude Mishori ar Boni Israilor maze tofat ḳori.”

Heshe Musae Feraunre ḳoila, “Ou shomoe afnar hokkol uzir-nazire aia amar ṭengo foṛia ḳoiba, afne afnar hoḳol manshore loia bidae neingi, erbade ami baroimu.” Oḳan ḳoia tain gusae aguin oia Feraunor ges taki baroi gela.
Mabude Musare ḳoisla, “Feraune tumar ḳota manto nae, zate Mishor desho amar keramotir foriman aro baṛe.”
Erlagi Musa ar Harune Feraunor samne ou keramoti oḳol deḳaila. Oile Mabude Feraunor dilre fashan ḳorilla, he nizor desh taki Boni Israilre saṛlo na.
Bade ou Mishor deshor bitre Mabude Musa ar Harunre ḳoila,
“I sandḳan bosoror foela sand oibo, tumra i sandre bosoror foela sand gonio.
Tumitain tamam Boni Israilre dola ḳori zanai deo, ou sandor dosh tariḳo tumrar hoḳol foribaror murobbie, zarzir foribaror lagi egu ḳori meṛa ba sagolor baichcha nibae.
Oile kunu foribaro er gust ḳaoar manush ḳom oile, laga goror manshor loge milia, duio foribare zotoḳan ḳaita faroin, hou onumane meṛa ba sagolor baichcha nibae.
I baichcha oibo nikut, eḳ boros boeoshor faṭa baichcha oite oibo; tumra meṛa ba sagolor baichcha nitae farbae.
Ar ou sandor souddo tariḳ forzonto iṭar zoton ḳorbae, bade tamam Boni Israil eḳloge milia, tara hainja bala zarzir foribare ou baichchain zobo ḳorba.
Zobo ḳorar bade tara er kisu lou nia zoto goro er gust ḳaiba, oto goror duaror soukaṭor duio galat ar uforor soukaṭo ou lou lagaiba.
Hou raitu tara i gust aguindi sekia ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ar titta hagor loge milaia ḳaiba.
I gust tumra ḳasa, ba fanidi randia ḳaio na. Ḳali aguindi sekia ḳaio, er ṭeng, ḳolla shudda bitoror hokkolta eḳano sekio, bade ḳaio.
Rait fuanir age ḳani shesh ḳorio, bian forzonto kuntau baki toio na. Zudi kunta baki roizae, te aguindi zalailio.
I ḳani ḳaoar bala tumrar ḳomoror ḳafoṛ mozbut ḳori findio, faot zuta lagaio, ator laṭi loio. Zoldi ḳori ḳani ḳaio. Iṭa oilo Mabudor namor Azadi Id.
Hou raitu ami Mishor deshor mazdi zaimu, deshor hokkol manshor boṛo fuare ar foshur foela meda baichchareo marilimu. Mishoror hoḳol deb-debir bisar ḳoria shaza dimu; amiu Mabud.
Oile tumrar duaror soukaṭo lefa lou deḳle ami buzmu i goro tumra ro. Erlagi ami Mishor desho gozob ḍalibar shomoe, lou lefa ou gor bad dia samnedi zaimu. Moutor gozob tone tumra rehai faibae.
Ou dinre tumra iad rakio ar ami Mabudor name idor din manio. I idre tumra amar hukum mono ḳoria hor-hamesha oarishor for oarish dori mania zaio.”

Mabude ḳoila, “Tumra shat din forzonto ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaibae. Foela dinu zarzir gor taki hoḳol ḳamir falai dibae. I shato dinor maze zegue ḳamirala ruṭi ḳaibo, tare Boni Israil tone fusia falail oibo.
Foela din ar shat nombor din tumra fobitro milon-mahfil adae ḳorbae, i dui din ḳali zoruri ḳaoa-daoa saṛa dusra kunu ḳam-ḳaz ḳorbae na.
Ou laḳan tumra ḳamir saṛa ruṭir i id adae ḳorio, amar hukum mono ḳoria oarishor for oarish dori hor-hamesha i id adae ḳorio. Ou dinu ami tumrare sifai dolor laḳan ḳori Mishor desh taki bar ḳori anmu.
Tumra foela sandor souddo tariḳor hainja taki shuru ḳoria, eḳoish tariḳor hainja forzonto ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaio.
Ou shat din zate tumrar goro ḳamiror kunu nam-nishana na taḳe, ou shomoe ḳeu zudi ḳamirala ḳani ḳae, te he tumrar nizor zatir ouk ba bin zatir ouk, tare Boni Israilor shomaz taki fusia falail oibo.
I shat din tumra zenou ro na ḳene ḳamirala kuntau ḳaio na; ḳali ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaio.”
Musae Boni Israilor hoḳol moe-murobbire dola ḳoria ḳoila, “Afnara zaukka, gia zarzir foribaror lagi Azadi Idor meṛar baichcha ania zobo ḳoroukka.
Ar ‘esub’ gasor eḳ aṭi ḍeṭa loia, fatilo toa lout buṛaia duaror soukaṭor duio galat ar ufre lagaio. Shabdan! Shuruz uṭar age ḳeu goror bare baroio na.

Mishori oḳolre marar lagi Mabude zebla Mishor deshor mazdi toshrif niba, ou shomoe tumrar soukaṭor ufre ar duio galat lou deḳle, tain i gor bad dia samnedi aguaiba. Azrail firistare tumrar goro hamaia marte dita nae.
“Amar batail hukum mono ḳoria tumra ar tumrar aolad oḳole i idre adae ḳorio.
Ami amar nizor oada mafik tumrare ze desh dimu, hou desho gia harleo tumra i id adae ḳorio.
Tumrar huruttainte zebla tumrare zikaiba, i idor ḳaron kita? Iṭa kila aise?

Te tumra zuaf dio, iṭa Mabudor name Azadi Idor kurbani. Mishori oḳolre marbar bala tain Mishor desho Boni Israilor gor bad dia samnedi aguai gia, amrare azad ḳorsla.” Ikan hunia hoḳol manshe Mabudre shoizda ḳorla.
Musa ar Harunre Mabude zela batai disla, Boni Israil oḳol tarar goro gia ou laḳan ḳam ḳorla.

Heshe maz raite ou laḳan goṭlo, Mabude godit boa Feraunor fua tone zel ḳanar bondir fua forzonto hokkolre marilila. Mishor deshor hokkol foribaror boṛo fuain ar foshuintor foela meda baichchareo tain marilila.
Teu Feraun ar tar uzir-nazir oḳol, Mishoror hoḳol manush hozag oia uṭla, asta Mishor desho betaea ḳandonor ruil foṛlo; ḳaron ola kunu gor roisil na, ze goro ḳeu na ḳeu morse na.
Hou raitu Feraune Musa ar Harunre anaia ḳoilo, “Tumra zoldi zao, Boni Israilre loia amar prozar ges tone horo. Tumra zela ḳoiso, oula gia Mabudor ebadot ḳoro.
Tumrar zoban motou tumrar goru-meṛar fal neogi. Tumra amareo nek dua deo.”
Mishori oḳole kub ḍoraila, tara mono ḳorla tarao moriziba. Erlagi tara tagda dita lagla, Boni Israil hokkol zoldi ḳori bidae oita.
Boni Israile tarar moedar ḳair maze ḳamir furaibar ageu, ḳai shoho gamlain ḳafoṛdi gaiṭ bandia ḳando loila.
Hoḳol Boni Israile Musar foramish moto, Mishori oḳolor shuna-rufar goena-gaṭi ar ḳafoṛ-sufoṛ ḳuzia nila.
Mabude ag toneu Mishori oḳolor dilor maze eḳ doya-maea foeda ḳorsla, zate Boni Israile zeta ḳuziba, otau zanu tarare dein. Ou laḳan ḳori tara Mishori oḳolor bout don-douloto ḳobza ḳorla.
Ota nia Boni Israil oḳol Ramashesh elaḳa taki Shukkotor muka roana oila. Tarar maze onuman soe lak shobol beṭain aṭia gela. Erar loge beṭin ar huruttaino asla.
Boni Israil badeo tarar loge rora aro bout manush, goru-meṛar fal hoḳolta milia bout boṛo dol bandia roana dila.
Bade tara Mishor taki ana hou moedar ḳai dia ḳamir saṛa ruṭi banaila. Mishor taki tarare zoldi ḳori bidae deoae i ḳait ḳamir maḳaibar shomoeu faisla na, ar fotor lagi kunu mosao nita farsla na.
Boni Israil oḳol Mishoro hoḳoltae sair-sho tish boros boshot ḳorsla.
Ṭik ou sair-sho tish boros fura oibar dino Mabudor hokkol bonda, sifai dolor laḳan hazia Mishor desh taki baroila.

Ou rait Mabude afon kudroti saeae fahara dia tarare Mishor desh taki bar ḳoria anae, i raitḳan ebadotir rait. Hokkol Boni Israilor lagi oarishor for oarish dori, Mabudor name uzagori ḳorar ek kas rait.
Mabude Musa ar Harunre ḳoila, “Azadi Idor kurbanir niom-ḳanun ami tumrare hikai diar. Huno, oinno kunu zatir manshore er gust ḳaite dibae na.
Oile ḳorida gulame mosolmani ḳoranir bade ita ḳaito farbo.
Oinno zekunu zatir musafir ba betondari ḳamlareo ita ḳaoaio na.
Tumra zar baṛit foshu zobo ḳorbae hou baṛitu er gust ḳaite oibo; baṛir bare kuntau nibae na, foshur kunu aḍḍi bangibae na.
Tamam Boni Israile ou id adae ḳorbae.

Tumrar loge rora kunu abadire zudi Mabudor namor i id manto sae, te foela tar foribaror hoḳol beṭaintor mosolmani ḳorani lagbo. Bade he Boni Israilor laḳan id adae ḳorto farbo. Oile mosolmani ḳorani saṛa ḳeu i gust ḳaito farto nae.
Boni Israilor lagi ar abadir lagio eḳ homan ain zari oilo.”
Mabude Musa ar Harunre zela hukum disla, Boni Israile hasaror oulau amol ḳorla.
Mabude hou dinu sifai dolor laḳan ḳori, Boni Israil oḳolre Mishor desh taki bar ḳori anla.
Mabude Musare hukum dila,
“Tumi Boni Israilor hokkol foribaror boṛo fuainre amar name alog ḳoria shofia deo. Ita kunu manshor fua ouk ba foshur baichcha ouk. Hoḳoltar boṛo fuain amaru.”
Teu Musae manshore ḳoila, “I dinkanre tumra iad rakio, ou dinu tumra Mishoror gulami taki azad oiso. Mabude tan kudroti at dia tumrare hon taki bar ḳorsoin. I din kunu zator ḳamirala ḳana ḳaio na.
Abib sandor ou tariḳo tumra baroilae.

Mabude tumrar baf-dadar gese oada ḳorsoin, Kenani, Hiṭṭi, Amuri, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolor desho tumrare nibagi. I desh dud ar mour banḍarala desh. Te hono gia harleo tumra forteḳ bosor Abib sandor ou id adae ḳorio.
“Tumra shat din forzonto ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaio, bade shat nombor dino Mabudor name id adae ḳorio.
I shato din ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaoa lagbo, tumrar gese ḳamirala kunu zator ḳana zate na deki, tumrar asta deshor bitreo zanu kunu ḳamir na mile.
I din tumra hoḳole zarzir fuaintore ḳoio, ‘Amra zebla Mishor taki baroia aislam, ou shomoe Mabude amrare zela rohom ḳorsla, otar iadgarir lagi amio oḳon ola ḳorram.’

Ou laḳan tumra zarzir aolad oḳolre Mabudor hukum talim dio, zate tumrar mono roe, Mabude tan kudroti at dia tumrare Mishor desh taki bar ḳori anchoin. Tumrar ator ba ḳofalor tabiz-ḳobozor laḳan, ou talimreo hamesha sokur samne rakio.
Erlagi forteḳ boros ou oḳt aileu tumra i niom adae ḳorio.
“Mabude tumrar gese ar tumrar baf-dadaintor gese zela oada ḳorsoin, ou oada mafik tain tumrare Kenani oḳolor desh dan ḳorsoin. Te Mabude hono nia harle,
tumra zarzir boṛo fuare Mabudor name shofia dilaio; erloge tumrar hoḳol foshuintor foela meda baichchareo Mabudor name dilaio, ita to Mabudoru.

Oile hoḳol gadintor foela meda baichchar bodola, tumra egu meṛar baichcha dia ḳalas ḳoraio. Ḳalas na ḳoraile gada baichchar gordona bangi dio. Mono rakio, tumrar hokkol foribaror boṛo fuainre ḳalas ḳorani lagbo.
“Tumrar fuainte zebla zikaiba, ita kitar lagi ḳora lage? Tumra zuaf dio, ‘Mabude tan kudroti at dia amrare Mishoror gulami taki azad ḳori anchoin.

Feraune na-humari ḳoria zebla amrare aite dilo na, ou shomoe Mabude Mishor deshor hoḳol foribaror boṛo fuaintore, manshor fuain ar foshuintor foela meda baichchainre marilla. Ou ḳarone amrar boṛo fuainre Mabudor ges taki ḳalas ḳorai, ar foshur foela meda baichchare kurbani dei.
Iṭa omon eḳ iadgarir id, at ba ḳofalo banda tabiz-ḳobozor laḳan zanu hamesha sokur samne roe, ar Mabude tan kudroti at dia amrare Mishor taki bar ḳori anchoin, oḳan mono roe.’ ”

Feraune Boni Israilre saṛar bade, Filistini oḳolor deshor mazdi shida fot taḳleo Allae tarare hi fotedi nila na. Allae ḳoila, heshe zudi kunu zuddor mukabila ḳora lage, te manshe zuddor ḍore hirbar Mishoro firizito fare.
Erlagi tain manshore Nil doriar faredi morubumi bae neoaila; tamam Boni Israile sifai dolor laḳan hazi-faṛi Mishor desh taki roana oila.

Zaoar bala Musa nobie Hozrot Iusufor ḳoebor taki tan aḍḍi-guḍḍi loge ḳori nila. Iusufe Boni Israilre mozbut ḳori ḳosom ḳorai ḳoisla, “Allae nichoe tumrare hefazot ḳorba, te tumra zaoar bala amar aḍḍiguin tulia loge ḳori niogi.”
Bade tara Shukkot ṭaun taki roana oia morubumir kinarao Etom namor zagat aia tambu gaṛila.
Ar Mabude tarare fot sinanir lagi dinor bala megor saḳar surote roita, ar raitor balae for deḳanir lagi agunir saḳar surote tarar age-age zaita, erlagi tara rait-din homane solta farta.
Manshor samne hamesha dinor bala megor saḳa ar raitor bala agunir saḳa roito.
Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Tumi Boni Israilre ḳo, tara guria aia Fama-Hirut namor zagar ḳandat Migdul ar doriar mazamazi, Bal-Safon elaḳar samne doriar soro tambu gaṛita.
Ita deḳle Feraune mono ḳorbo, Boni Israile kunubae fot na faia guraguri ḳorte ḳorte morubumit aṭki gesoin.

Ami Feraunor dilre fashan banaimu, he tumrar ḳore ḳore ḳedanit aibo. Teu Feraun ar tar sifai oḳoloredi amar nam uzila oibo; ita dekia Mishori oḳoleo buziliba, amiu Mabud.” Mabudor hukum mafik Boni Israile oula ḳorla.

Hasau Mishoror bashsha Feraune zebla ḳobor failo, Boni Israil oḳol bagi gesoin, huniau Feraun ar tar uzir-naziror dil firigelo. Tara ḳoila, “Hae, hae! Amra ita kita ḳorsi? Itare amrar gulami taki ḳene saṛlam?”
Oḳan ḳoiau Feraune tar zuddor rot hazanir hukum dia, tar sifai oḳolre zuit ḳorailo.
He tar ḳas shoktiman soe-sho rot, Mishoror hokkol rotain ar erar saloḳdar sifaireo loge loilo.
Mabude Mishoror bashsha Feraunor dilre fashan ḳorilla, he Boni Israilor ḳore ḳore ḳedanit ailo. Era zebla himmot ḳori aṭia zaira, ou shomoe he erare dorat ailo.
He Mishor deshor hoḳol guṛ soar sifai, rotala sifai shoho asta armi dol loia erare dorar lagi erar ḳandat aillo. Ou shomoe Boni Israil oḳol doriar faro Bal-Safonor samne Fama-Hirutor ḳandat asla.
Tara ḳandat ateu Boni Israile saia deḳla, tarar ḳore oia Mishori sifai aira; dekiau zanor ḍore Mabudor dorbaro ḳandon lagaila.
Tara Musare ḳoila, “Mishoro ḳoebor dibar zaga nai dekia, amrare martae ḳori ou morubumit loia aiso ni? Tumi ita kita ḳorlae? Ḳene amrare Mishor taki bar ḳorlae?
Mishoror bitre amra tumare ḳoisi na ni, amrare ono roite deo, amra Mishorintor gulami ḳori? I morubumit morar saite Mishorintor gulami ḳorau to amrar lagi bala asil.”
Musae tarare ḳoila, “Tumra ḍoraio na. Hoḳole nirai oia deḳo, Mabude aiz kila basain. Ou zeta Mishorintore oḳon deḳrae, itare ar kunudinu deḳtae nae.
Tumra oḳon shanti o, deḳo, Mabudeu tumrar fokko oia zuddo ḳorba.”
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi ḳene amar gese ḳandirae? Boni Israilre ḳo na samnedi aguaita.
Ar tumar ator laṭire baṛaia doriar ufre usa ḳori doro, doriare dui bag ḳorilao. Teu tamam Boni Israil hukna bae aṭia doria far oiba.
Kial rakio, ami Mishori oḳolor dil ola fashan banaimu, tara erare dorar niote doriat hamaiba. Erbade Feraun, tar sifai, tar rotain, tar guṛ soar oḳolor mazdi amar zalal-shan zair oibo.
Feraunor hal-hokikot dekia baki Mishori oḳoleo buziliba, amiu Mabud.”
Ermaze Allar ze firista Boni Israilor age oia zaoat asla, ein zaga bodlaia Boni Israilor ḳore gelagi. En loge oia kudroti hou megor saḳao samne taki horia ḳore aillo.

Ḳore aia Mishori ar Israili duio dolor mazḳano ubailo. Erlagi ou megor saḳar andaire Mishori oḳol andairt foṛigela, tara raitor bala Boni Israilor ḳanda loita farla na. Oile Boni Israilor samne raitor balao megor saḳar forsha roilo.
Bade Musae doriar ufre tan at baṛaila, ar Mabude hara rait kub zure fubali haoa dia doriar fani horaia dui baṭ ḳorilla, doria hukaia mazedi hukna fot baroilo.
Boni Israil oḳole hukna fae doriar mazdi roana dila, doriar fani tarar ḍaine-baue oalor laḳan ubai roilo.
Ita dekia Mishori oḳole tarare ḳedaia doriar hou hukna fotedi gela. Feraunor hokkol rot, guṛa, ar guṛ-soar oḳol ḳedai ḳedai doriar hou foto gia hamaila.
Ar fotabala Mabude hou kudroti aguin ar megor saḳa taki Mishori sifair bae lannoti nozore saila, teu tara bedisha lagigela.

Tain erar rotor sakka nosṭo ḳori dila, erlagi tarar kub ḳosṭo oile rot salanit roilo; ermaze tara eḳe-oinnore ḳoilo, “Oise, ar bad deo, amra Boni Israilor ḳor tone hori zai. Mabude nize tarar fokko oia, amrar loge zuddo ḳorra.”
Ou shomoe Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi doriar ufre hirbar at baṛao. Tumar at baṛaile fani hirbar Mishorintor ufre, tarar rot ar guṛ soaror ufre aibbo.”
Musae doriar ufre at baṛaila, ar bian oar ageu doriar fani hirbar homan oigelo; Mishorinte ḍaine-baue douṛa-douṛi lagaila, oile Mabude tarare doriar fanidi baoai dila.
Fani hirbar zagat aillo, tarar rotain, sifain, ar guṛ soar oḳol, mani Boni Israilor ḳore oia ḳedanit aora hokkolta fanie buṛi gelo, eguo zita roila na.
Oile Boni Israil oḳole hukna fote doriar mazdi gela, tarar ḍaine-baue fani oalor laḳan ubai roilo.
Ou nomunae Mabude hi din Mishori oḳolor at taki Boni Israilre basaila, tara nizor souḳe deḳla, Mishorintor mora lash doriar soro bashi roise.
Mishorintor ufre Mabudor kudroti lila-ḳela dekia, Boni Israileo Mabudre ḍoraigela. Tara Mabudor ufre ar tan gulam Hozrot Musar ufre furafur iman anla.
Allar kudrote Nil doria far oia aia harle Hozrot Musa ar tamam Boni Israile Mabudor name ou shukurana gozol gaila,
“Ami Mabudor name gozol gaimu,
hoḳolor samne tan kudroti mohima baṛise,
guṛ soar shudda guṛainre tainu doriar fanit falaisoin.
Mabudu to amar bol, tainu amar gozol,
amare basanir ḳol-ḳobza tan ato ase.
Ou Mabudu amar Alla, amar baf-dadar Alla,
ami tan hamd gaimu, tan lila-ḳela boean ḳormu.
Mabud oila foeluan sifai, tan namu Mabud.
Feraunor rotre ar sifaire tain fanit falaila,
tar namḳora subedar oḳol Nil doriat buṛia morla.
Goin fanie tarare gilillo,
ar bari fattoror laḳan tara doriar tole gelagi.
O Mabud, tumar ḍain atḳan kudroti lilae bora,
tumar ate nichchoe dushmonre surmar ḳorse.
Tumar birudde zetae lagsila, kudroti bole tarare goin gato falailae.
Tumar faṭail gozobi aguine, hukna ḳer-nerar laḳan tarare zalaililo.
Tumar naḳor dome hoḳol fani dola oigelo,
fanir fut oḳol zagat ubai roilo,
doriar goin fani saḳa bonigelo.
Dushmone ḳoisil, ‘Ami itare ḳedaia nimu,
douṛaia nia dormu, tarar hoḳolta ḳaṛia ania baṭimu.
Tarar maldi ami maldar oimu, itadi amar monor ḳaish furaimu.
Amar toluardi maria tarar nam miṭailimu.’
Oile tumi fu dia batash dilae,
ar doriae tarare gurililo,
tara shishar laḳan goin fanit tolaigelo.
O Mabud, kun deb-debi tumar homan?
Ḳe tumar laḳan oto fobitro mohan,
ar tumar moto boeonkor kudroti mohima ḳar ase?
Tumar bolala ḍain atḳan baṛailae,
ar duniae tarare gilililo.
Tumar ḳas maeae zerare basaiso,
tarare to tumiu salairae,
tumar afon kudroti bole tumar fobitro boshot ḳanat nirae.
Ita hunia hokkol zatie ḳafira,
Filistini bedin oḳolor mon soṭfoṭ ḳorer.
Idumor shordar oḳol ḍoraia bedisha lagigela,
Muabor neta oḳole tor-toraia ḳafila,
Kenani oḳol ḍoraia horigela.
Tarar bitre ḍor-ḳof aia hamaise,
tumar ator ṭelae fattoror laḳan nirai oigese.
O Mabud, tumar proza oḳol, tumar ḳorida gulam oḳol,
furafur far na oa forzonto tumi oula raḳso.
Tumi erare nia gasor serar laḳan,
tumar nizor faṛo ruibae.
O Mabud, hoḳanu tumar boshot ḳana,
tumar afon ator goṛa fobitro ebadot ḳana.
O Mabud, zug zug dori tumiu ḳali bashshai ḳorbae.”
Feraunor guṛain, tar rot ar guṛ soar oḳol zebla doriar maze hamaigelo, Mabude tarar ufre doriar fani firai anla, oile Boni Israil hoḳol to hukna fote doriar mazedi age aṭia geslagi.
Harunor boin Hozrot Moriomo nobi asla, tain ḍugi ato loia bazaila, ar baki hoḳol beṭinteo tan ḳoredi ḍugi loia nasi-nasi baroi aila.
Ar Moriomeo manshor samne oula gaila:
“Tumra Mabudor name gozol gao,
hoḳolor samne tan kudroti mohima baṛise,
guṛ soar shudda guṛainre tainu doriar fanit falaisoin.”
Musae Boni Israilre Nil doria taki samnedi loia roana oila, ar Shur namor morubumit gela. Tarar zaoar foto tin din dori kunu fani faila na.
Bade tara Marua namor eḳ zagat aila, oile hinor fanio ḳaita farla na, hinor fani kub titta. Erlagi ou zagar nam laglo Marua [mani, titta].
Ar manshe Musar birudde ḳana-ḳani ḳori ḳoila, “Amra oḳon fani ḳaitam kila?”
Musae Mabudor gese foriad ḳorla, Mabude tanre egu gas deḳai dila, tain hou gasre nia fanit falaila, ar fani miṭa oigelo.
Mabude hou zagat Boni Israilor forikka loila, ar tarar lagi niom-ḳanun batai dila.

Tain ḳoila, “Tumra zudi kial ḳoria tumrar Alla Mabudor ḳalam huno ar ou laḳan amol ḳoro, ami zeta fosond ḳori ota ḳoro, amar hukum mano, te ami Mabude Mishori oḳolre zeta bemar-azar disi, ita kunu bemar tumrar ufre ditam nae; zano to, ami Mabud tumrar shifa ḳorneala.”
Heshe tara Elimo gia fousla, hino barogu fanir indara ar shottoirgu kezur gas asil. Tara ou fanir ḳandat tambu gaṛila.
Bade tamam Boni Israile Elim taki roana dilaila. Mishor desh taki baronir bador sandor fonro tariḳo tara Sin namor morubumit aia azila. Sin oilo Tur Faṛ ar Elimor mazḳano.
Ou shomoe tamam Boni Israile Musa ar Harunor birudde ḳana-ḳani lagaila.

Era duiozonor birudde Boni Israile ḳoila, “Haere hae, itar ḳotae amra ḳene ailam, Mabude ḳene nizor ate amrare Mishor desho marla na? Hi shomoe amra gustor ḍegor ḳandat boitam, feṭ boria gust-ruṭi ḳaitam, oile itae amrare ufashe ar feṭor buḳe marta ḳori ono anchoin.”

Ikan hunia Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ami tarare forikka ḳoria deḳmu, tara amar niom-ḳanun manoin ki na. Ami tumrar lagi megor nomunae behesti ḳani zomino saṛimu. Manshe baire aia haftar forteḳ dinor ḳani forti din tulia niba.
Ḳali haftar soe nombor dino tara zeta tulia anba, ita toiar ḳorar bade oinno dinor ḳani taki ḍabul oizibo.”
Bade Musa ar Harune hokkol Boni Israilre ḳoila, “Mabudor birudde tumra zebla ḳana-ḳani lagaiso, te aiz hainja balau buzbae, ou Mabudeu tumrare Mishor taki bar ḳori anchoin.
Bian oileu tumra Mabudor kudroti nur deḳbae, tain to hunchoin, tumra kita ḳana-ḳani ḳorso. Te amra ar kita zen, tumra amrar birudde otota matirae?”

Musae tarare ḳoila, “Mabude hainja bala tumrare gust diba, ar biane feṭ bora ruṭio diba. Mabudor birudde tumra zeta ḳana-ḳani ḳorso, ita tain hunchoin. Ashole amra duizon kita zen, tumra amrar birudde otota matirae? I mat to amrar birudde nae, tumra Mabudor biruddeu matirae.”
Erbade Musae Harunre ḳoila, “Tumi hokkol Boni Israilre zanai deo, tumra Mabudor birudde zeta matiso, ita tain hunchoin. Oḳon tumra aia Mabudor samne azir o.”
Teu Harune tarare ou shongbad zanaira, ou shomoe morubumir bae tarar souḳ foṛteu deḳoin, megor saḳar maze Mabudor kudroti nur zair oise.
Ermaze Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Ami Boni Israilor hokkol mat-ḳota hunchi. Oḳon tumi zanai deo, tara forteḳ din hainja bala ḳaiba gust ar biane ḳaiba feṭ bora ruṭi. Teu tara buzba, ami Allau tarar Mabud.”
Hasau hainja bala kuel fakir fal aia tarar asta kempo zam oigela, bador din biane kua foṛia kempor sairobae bizigelo.
Beil oar bade ou kua hukaile deḳa gelo, shagur danar laḳan eḳ zator fatla zinish maṭir ufre foṛi roise.
Ita dekia Boni Israile eḳe-oinne zikaila, “Oba, ita kita? Ita kita foṛse, amra ḳeu to sinram na.”
Teu Musae ḳoila, “Ita to behesti ḳani, tumra ḳaitae ḳori Mabude dan ḳorsoin.
Ou ḳanir ḳotau Mabude hukum disoin, forteḳ zone zarzir foribaror lagi ḳani tukaia neo. Goror hoḳolor lagi zon-mate eḳ feṭu ḳori tukaio.”
Teu tara oula ḳorla, manush onumane ḳeu besh ḳori nila, ḳeu ḳom nila.
Bade feṭudi mafia deḳla, zein beshi tukaisla, tano beshi oise na, ar zein tuṛa tukaisla, tano ḳom oise na; hoḳoleu zarzir foribaror ḳanir onumane tukaisoin.
Musae tarare ḳoila, “Tumra ḳail biankur ḳanir lagi ita muṭeu zomai toio na.”
Ta-o ḳeu ḳeu Musar ḳota na mania bador dinor lagio tuṛa toilo. Erlagi ita fosia kiṛa-fuk zonmia gondo baroilo; ita dekia Musa tarar ufre kub gusa oila.
Ola forteḳ din fozore tara zarzir ḳanir onumane tukaito, oile roid gorom oileu ita golizito.
Bade soe nombor dino tarar ḳanir lagi ḍabul ḳani, mani dui feṭu ḳori tukailo, ar gusṭir murobbi oḳole aia Musare zanaila.

Musae tarare ḳoila, “Ita ṭik ase, Mabudeu oula hukum disoin; ḳail to haftar shesh din, Zummabar; Mabudor faḳ-fobitro din. Te tumrar zeta randar dorḳar ase ita aiz randilao, ar biran ḳorar zorur oile biran ḳoro, baki hoḳolta bador din biankur lagi toi deo.”
Ou Musar hukum mafik tara bador din forzonto ita goro toilo, itar maze kunu gondo-o baroilo na, kiṛaeo dorlo na.
Bade Musae tarare ḳoila, “Aiz tumra ita ḳao, ḳaron aiz Mabudor faḳ-fobitro din, Zummabar. Aiz tumra bondor maze i ḳani faitae nae.
Tumra haftat soe din i ḳani tukaio, oile shat nombor din to Zummabar, i din ita faitae nae.”
Ta-o kunu kunu zone shat nombor dino ou ḳani tukaibar lagi bare gelo, gia kunta failo na.
Teu Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumra ar ḳotodin amar hukum ar niom-ḳanun bangitae?

Huno, tumrar ziranir lagi i Zummabar to Mabudeu tumrare disoin, erlagi tain haftar soe nombor dino tumrare dui dinor ḳani dein; oḳon taki ou shat nombor din, mani Zummabare tumra hoḳole zarzir goro roia ziraio, ḳeu goror bare zaio na.”
Er bad taki haftar shat nombor dino manshe ziraito.
Boni Israile i ḳanir nam toilo, manna; ita deḳte dola ḍula bisir laḳan, ar ḳaite mou maḳail fiṭar laḳan moza.

Bade Musae tarare ḳoila, “Mabude ou hukum disoin, tumra eḳ feṭu foriman manna tulia tumrar bador bongshodor oḳolor lagi zoma ḳori to, teu tarao deḳba, Mishor desh taki tumrare bar ḳori neoar ḳalo morubumir maze tain kita ḳaoaisoin.”
Musae Harunre ḳoila, “Tumi egu boeamor maze eḳ feṭu foriman manna tulia Mabudor samne to, ita tumrar oarishor for oarish dori zoma roibo.”
Mabude Musare zela hukum ḳorsla, ou laḳan Harune ou manna boeamo borla. Bade tain fobitro shonduḳor maze shahadot pattoror samne toila.
Boni Israile sallish boros dori i manna ḳailo, tara zotodin forzonto manush boshot ḳorar zaga, mani Kenan deshor shimanat aia na fousilo, otodin ou ḳaniu ḳaila.
Eḳ feṭu oilogi, eḳ furaror dosh baṭor eḳ baṭ.
Bade Mabudor hukume tamam Boni Israil Sin morubumi taki roana dia, eḳ zaga taki aroḳ zagat gia gia heshe Rofidimo aia tambu gaṛila, oile hino manshor ḳaoar fani asil na.
Erlagi manshe Musar loge ḳaijja ḳori ḳoila, “Amrare ḳaoar fani deukka.”
Musae tarare ḳoila, “Tumra ḳene amar loge ḳaijja ḳorrae? Ḳene Mabudre forikka ḳorrae?”

Manshe fanir fiase ḳahil oia Musar birudde gali-galaz ḳori ḳoila, “Tumi amrare martae ḳori Mishor desh taki ancho ni? Amrare, amrar huruttaintore, amrar foshur falre anafanie martae ḳori ono ancho ni?”
Teu Musae Mabudor gese foriad ḳori ḳoila, “Ami i manshore kita ḳortam? Ar tuṛa deri oileu to tara ḳankoṛdi iṭaia amare mariliba.”
Mabude zuaf dila, “Tumi ze laṭidi Nil nodo baṛi marslae, hou laṭi ato lo, ar Boni Israilor ḳoezon murobbire loge loia manshor age age zao.
Gia harle ami Tur faṛor ḳandat eḳ fattoror ufre azir oimu, tumi ou fattoro baṛi marle ogu taki fani baroibo, teu manshe ḳaita farba.” Hasau Musae Israilor murobbi oḳolor samne oula ḳorla.

Ou Rofidimo aia manshe ḳaijja ḳori ḳoisla, “Mabud kita amrar loge asoin ni, na hori gesoin?” Oula ḳoia tara Mabudre forikka ḳorsla ḳori, i zagar nam oilo Masa [mani, forikka] ar Mariba [mani, ḳaijja].
Ou shomoe Boni Israilor loge zuddo ḳorar lagi Amaleki sifai oḳol Rofidimo aila.
Teu Musae tan ḳadim Hozrot Iusare ḳoila, “Tumi amrar manush taki laṛai ḳorra zon basia nia, Amaleki oḳolor loge zuddo ḳorat zao. Amio ḳail Allai kudroti laṭi ato loia faṛor ufre ubaimu.”
Iusaeo Musar hukum mafik kam ḳorla. Amaleki oḳolor loge zuddo ḳorla, Musa, Harun, ar Hur, ou tino zon gia faṛor ṭillar ufre uṭla.
Bade deḳa gelo, Musae zoto shomoe at usa ḳori raḳoin, oto shomoe Boni Israilor dol zitoin, oile Musae at lamaileu Amaleki dol zitoin.

Aste aste Musar at bar oa dorlo. Ou tara eḳan fattor ania Musare boibar bebosta dila. Ou fattoror ufre Musa boila, Harun ar Hur duiozone Musar dui galat ubaia tan at usa ḳori dorla. Teu shuruz ḍubar ag forzonto tan at usa roilo.
Erlagi Amaleki sifair loge zuddo ḳoria Iusa zitigela.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ita iad raḳar lagi tumi eḳan kitabor maze lekia to ar Iusareo zanao. Mono rakio, ami duniar buḳ taki Amaleki oḳolor nam miṭailimu.”
Musae eḳan kurbani ḳana banaia er nam toila, Mabud namu amar zuddor zanḍa.
Tain ḳoila, “Mabudor namor zuddor zanḍa amra ato loi, teu Mabudeo oarishor for oarish dori Amaleki oḳolor loge zuddo ḳorba.”

Allae Hozrot Musare ar tan bonda Boni Israilre zoto laḳan rohom ḳorsoin, ita hoḳolta Musar hour Madian deshor imam Shuaibor ḳano gelo. Mabude Boni Israilre Mishor desh taki kila bar ḳori anchoin, eota tain hunla.
Musae age tan bibi Sofurare hour baṛit faṭai disla, erlagi tan houre Musar bibire ar duio fuare nizor gese raḳla.
I duio fuar mazor eḳzonor nam asil Zarsum [mani, boitol]. Musae ḳoila, “Ami bin desho boitolor laḳan roiram.”
Ar dusra zonor nam asil Eliezer [mani, Alla shohae]. Tain ḳoila, “Amar bafor Alla amar shohae oia amare Feraunor toluar taki hefazot ḳorsoin.”
Musar hour Shuaibe Musar bibi ar tan duio fuare loia Musar gese aila. Ou shomoe Boni Israil ar Musar tambu asil Allar faṛ Turor ḳandat.
Tan hour ono aia Musare ḳobor dila, “Ami tumar hour Shuaib. Te ami tumar bibi ar duio fuare loia ono aisi.”
Ḳobor faia Musae tan houror loge deḳa ḳorat baroila. Tain maṭit shoizda ḳoria tan hourre salam ḳorla ar maear hunga dila. Bade duiozone bala-bura zikaia hari tambur bitre hamaila.

Mabude Boni Israilor fokko loia Feraun ar Mishori oḳolor loge zeta zeta ḳorsoin, ita hokkolta tan hourre hunaila. Mishor taki zaoar bala tarar ḳoto ḳosṭo oisil ar Allae kila tarare basaisoin eotao tanre zanaila.
Ar Mabude Mishori oḳolor at taki Boni Israilre azad ḳoria tarare zoto laḳan asan ḳorsoin, ita hunia tan hour kub kushi oila.
Tain ḳoila, “Hoḳol tarif Mabudor, zein Feraun ar Mishori oḳolor at taki tumrare azad ḳorsoin.
Oḳon ami nizeo buziar, hoḳol devtar saite Mabudu mohan. Ḳaron Mishorinte zeta befar loia tumrar birudde bahaduri ḳorta, itar ḳobza taki tainu tumrare basaisoin.”
Bade Musar hour Shuaibe Allar name Zalail Kurbani ar hoḳol zator kurbani zuit ḳori loia aila. Heshe Harun ar Boni Israilor murobbi oḳol aia, Musar houror loge boia Allar samne ḳana-fina ḳaila.
Bador din Musae manshor bisar-shalish ḳorat boila. Bisaror lagi manush aia bian taki hainja forzonto hara din tan samne ubai roila.
Musae ola ḳorra dekia tan houre ḳoila, “Tumi manshore loia ita kita ḳorrae? Kitar lagi tumi eḳla ono bisaro boiso, ar bian taki hainja forzonto hoḳol manush tumar gese ubai roise?”
Musae zuaf dila, “Bisaror befare Allai foesala hunar lagi manush amar gese ain.
Tara kunu ḳaijja-fosad ḳorle amar ḳasat ain, aile ami duio dolor bisar ḳori, ar Allai hukum-ahkam tarare batai.”
Teu Musar houre ḳoila, “Tumi zelaḳan ita ḳorrae, ita to bala nae.
Ila ḳorle tumi ar tumar hoḳol manusho ḳahil oizibae. I ḳam tumar takkot taki beshi, tumi eḳla ita kulaitae fartae nae.
Te ami tumare ḳoiar, tumi amar foramish huno, ete Allao tumar loge roiba. Tumi manshor bisar-asar foesala ḳorar niote, tarar imam hishabe hoḳol befar Allar samne azir ḳorio.
Ar manshoreo Allar hukum-ahkam talim dio. Tara kila solta, kita ḳorta na ḳorta, ota tarare buzaio.

Ar tumi erar maz taki basia oula joiggo manush bar ḳoro, zera Allare ḍorain, hok fote soloin, ar gush ḳaoare gin ḳoroin. Erare tumi manshor bisar-asaror daeitto deo. Era kunu zonre azar zonor ufre, ḳeurore sho zon, ḳeurore fonchash zon, ar ḳeurore dosh zonor ufre bisar-asaror bar deo.
Erau hamesha manshor bisar-insaf ḳorba. Huru-muru hoḳol bisar tara ḳorba, ḳali boṛo boṛo bisar tumar gese anba. Teu tumar bar kisu ḳombo, tarao tumar loge kisu bar boukka.
Allar hukum faia tumi zudi oula ḳoro, te tumi kulaitae farbae, ar mansheo arame zarzir zagat zaita farba.”
Musae tan houror foramish manla, tain zela ḳoila, Musae oula ḳorla.
Musae tamam Boni Israil taki basia ufozukto manush tukaia, tara ḳeurore azar zon, ḳeurore sho zon, ḳeurore fonchash ar ḳeurore dosh zonor ufre neta banaila.
Era hamesha manshor bisar-asar ḳorta. Ḳali boṛo boṛo goṭona oḳol Musar ḳasat anta, ar huru huru hoḳolta tara miṭaita.
Heshe Musae tan hourre bidae dile, tain nizor desho toshrif nilagi.
Mishor desh taki Boni Israil oḳol baronir bade, tin nombor sandor foela dinu tara Rofidim oia Sinai morubumit fousila. Ono aia tara morubumir Tur faṛor samne tambu gaṛila.
Mishor desh taki Boni Israil oḳol baronir bade, tin nombor sandor foela dinu tara Rofidim oia Sinai morubumit fousila. Ono aia tara morubumir Tur faṛor samne tambu gaṛila.
Ermaze Hozrot Musa Tur faṛor ufre Allar dorbaro gela. Mabude faṛor ufre taki tanre ḍakia ḳoila, “O Musa, tumi Iakubor aolad oḳolre ḳo, Boni Israilre zanai deo,
Ami Mabude Mishori oḳolor dosha kita goṭaisi, ita to tarar nizor souḳe deḳsoin. Sile zela tar baichchare ḍaḳnadi boia ney, amio ou nomunae tumrare amar gese boia anchi.
Oḳon tumra zudi amar tamam hukum-ahkam mano, ar amar logor oada adae ḳoro, te duniar hokkol zatir maz taki tumrau oibae amar ḳas shompod. Mono rakio, hara duniar hoḳoltau amar eḳtiaro.
Tumrare diau ḳaim oibo amar imam oḳolor bashshai, tumrau oibae amar fobitro zati. Te amar ou buliḳanain tumi Boni Israilre zanao.”
Ou Musae aia Boni Israilor murobbi oḳolre dola ḳoraila. Dola ḳoraia ḳoila, Mabude tanre kita kita hukum disoin.
Teu hoḳol manshe eḳloge ḳoila, “Mabude zela bataisoin, amra ola hokkolta ḳormu.” Manshe zemone zuaf dila, Musae gia Mabudor dorbaro ola zanaila.

Ar Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ami zebla tumar loge batchit ḳormu, ou batchit zate manshe nizor ḳane hunto fare, erlagi ami gono eḳ megor saḳar maze roia batchit ḳormu. Teu manshe ita hunba, ar tumar ufre hor-hamesha furafur ekin raḳba.”
Bade Musa gia tararo hoḳol ḳota Mabudre zanaila.
Ikan hunia Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi aiz ar ḳail duio din manshor ḳasat gia tarare faḳ-saf ḳoro. Tara zarzir ḳafoṛ-sufoṛ doia deuk.
Tara forshu dinor lagi toiar ouk, ou din ami Mabud Tur faṛor ufre lamia aia tara hoḳolre didar dimu.
Te tumi faṛor sairobae eḳṭa shimana ṭik koria dilao. Dia tarare hushiar ḳori ḳo, tara zanu i faṛo na uṭe ar faṛor shimanat na soe. Ḳeu zudi i faṛo soe, te tar shaza oilo mout.
Marar bala tar gotoro at na dia, tare fattor ba tir maria marbae. He manush ouk ba zanuar ouk tare marilibae. Ḳali eḳloge bout shomoe shinga bazanir aoaz hunle, tara ou faṛor ḳandat aita farba.”
Teu Musae faṛo taki lamia aia manshore faḳ-saf ḳorla, manshe tarar ḳafoṛ-sufoṛ doia dilo.
Musae tarare ḳoila, “Tumra forshu dinor lagi zuit o, ermaze ḳeu bibir loge milamisha ḳorio na.”

Hasau hou forshu din aile bianku bala faṛor ufre Allar kudroti megor saḳa deḳa gelo, kub beshi megor ḍak-zilkani shuru oilo. Zure zure shingar aoaz huna gelo, teu Boni Israilor kempor bitoror hoḳol manush ḍoraia ḳafa dorla.
Ou shomoe Musae manshore Allar samne neoar lagi kemp taki bar ḳorla. Tara hoḳol gia faṛor lamat ubaila.
Ar asta Tur Faṛ dumae bori gelo, Mabud-Moulae agunir laḳan nuror surote faṛor ufre toshrif anla. Iṭ-baṭṭar dumar laḳan duma uṛa shuru oilo ar asta faṛ zuṛi bezuita ḳaf shuru oilo.
Shingar aoaz aro zure zure bazilo. Ou shomoe Musae Allar loge matila, ar Allaeo nizor aoazdi Musar mator zuaf dila.
Mabud nize Tur faṛor matat lamia aia Musare ḍakila, teu Musa uṭia faṛor ufre gela.
Gia harle Mabude tanre ḳoila, “Tumi lamat zao, gia manshore ḳoṛa ḳori ḳoia ao, arnae amare deḳar lagi tara shimana far oia ufre aibba. Aile bout manush mara zaiba.
Ar ze imam oḳol hamesha amar samne azir oin, ashole tarar ḳamu amar samne azir oa, tarao nize nizore faḳ-saf ḳorba. Arnae ami tarar ufreo gozob ḍalimu.”
Musae Mabudre zuaf dila, “Tara to emneu Tur faṛo aita nae, afne ageu amrare ḳoṛa hushiari disoin. Amra-o faṛor sairobae dag dia afnar lagi faḳ shimana algaisi.”

Oile Mabude tanre ḳoila, “Na, tumi lamat zao. Bade tumi ar Harun duiozone milia ufre aio. Kial rakio, kunu imam ba dusra kunu manush zate shimana saṛia amar ḳasat na ain, aile ami tarar ufre lannoti gozob ḍalmu.”
Ikan hunia Musa lamat gela, gia manshore hoḳolta zanaila.
Bade Mabude formaila,
“O Boni Israil oḳol, ami Allau tumrar Mabud. Mishor deshor gulami taki amiu tumrare bar ḳori anchi.
“Amar bodola tumra dusra kunu devta manio na.
“Tumra fuza ḳorar niote kunu devta banaio na. Asmanor kuntar laḳan, zominor kuntar laḳan ba fanir mazor kuntar laḳan kunu devta banaio na.

Mono rakio, ḳali ami Allau tumrar Mabud. Amar faona ebadot ami sai. Erlagi tumra itar fuza ḳorio na, kezmoto ḳorio na. Huno, zera amar birudde guna ḳore, ami tarar gunar fol tarar tin sair ḳandan forzonto bortai.
Oile zera amar ashik bonia amar hukum-ahkam amol ḳore, ami tarar azar azar oarish forzonto amar obiram maea-mohobbot deḳaimu.
“Beḳama kunu ḳarone tumrar Alla Mabudor nam muḳo loio na. Ḳeu zudi ḳamoḳa Mabudor nam loe, te kunumonteu amar shaza taki rehai faito nae.
“Iad ḳoria Zummabarre fobitro din manio.
Tumra haftat soe din ḳam ḳorio, zarzir hoḳol ḳam adae ḳorio,

oile shat nombor din oilo Zummabar, tumar Alla Mabudor name ziraibar din. I din tumi, tumar fua-fuṛin, tumar gulam-bandin, tumar goru-gadain, tumar gaut ba ṭauno rora musafir ba bin-deshi, ḳeu kunu zator ḳam-ḳaz ḳorio na.
Zano to, Mabude soe dine asman-zomin, doria ar erar mazor hoḳolta foeda ḳorsoin, bade shat nombor din ziraisoin, kunu ḳam ḳorsoin na. Ou dinre Mabude rohomot dia pakdin ḳorsoin.
“Tumrar ma-bafore ijjot ḳorio. Teu tumrar Alla Mabude ze desh diba, hou desho tumrar haeati baṛibo.
“Kun ḳorio na.
“Zina ḳorio na.
“Suri ḳorio na.
“Ḳeuror birudde misa shakki dio na.
“Oinno manshor gor-duaror bae lalos ḳorio na, tarar bou, gulam-bandi, goru-gada, ba kunu kichchur bae llalos ḳorio a.”
Boni Israile zebla faṛ taki megor ḍaḳ, zilkani, shingar aoaz, ar duma baronit deḳla, dekia tara duroi takiu ḍoraia ḳafa dorla.
Tara Musare ḳoila, “Afneu amrar loge matoukka, amra hunmu; oile Allae amrar loge batchit ḳorle to amra morizimu.”
Musae tarare ḳoila, “Tumra ḍoraio na. Allae tumrare forikkat falaisoin, zate tumrar zano Allar ḍor hamae, ḍoraia tumra guna taki basia ro. Erlagiu tain nize didar disoin.”
Hoḳol manush duroi ubai roila, ar Musa Allai hou megor ḳalnir andarir maze hamaila.
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Boni Israilre ḳo, tumra nizeu to deḳlae, ami Mabude asman taki tumrar loge batchit ḳorlam.
Erlagi ebadot ḳorar niote, amar bodola dusra kunuzat devta banaio na. Tumra shuna ba rufadio nizor kunu deb-debi banaio na.

“Amar lagi ḳali maṭi dia kurbani ḳana banaio. Er ufre tumrar Zalail Kurbani ar Salamoti Kurbanir goru-sagol ania kurbani dio. Zeta zagainto ami amar nam iad ḳorai dimu, hou zagainto ami nize azir oia tumrare dua dimu.
Tumra amar lagi fattordi kunu kurbani ḳana bananit lagle, hi fattorguin ḳaṭio na. Er ufre atiar salaile tumra itare nafaḳ banailibae.
Amar kurbani ḳana oula ḳori banaio, zate er ufre uṭte kunu moi ba siṛi na lage. Ḳaron siṛi bae uṭat gele kiba tumrar lemṭa deḳa zaibo.”
Mabude Musare aro ḳoila, “Tumi Boni Israilre amar ou niom-ḳanun oḳol zanao.
“Tumra zudi kunu Ibrani beṭare ḳorid ḳoria gulam banao, te ou gulame soe bosor tumrar gulami ḳorbo, bade shat bosoror bala tar ges taki kunta na nia, tare emneu azad ḳori dibae.
He zudi eḳla tumrar gese ae te eḳlau zaibo; ar zudi boure loge loia ae, te bou loia zaibo.
Oile tar munibe zudi tare bia ḳorai taḳe, ar tar kunu huruta-muruta oin, taile i beṭi ar huruttain munibor geseu roiba; he ḳali eḳla azad oibo.
Ar hi gulame zudi saf ḳori ḳoe zen, he tar munib, ar tar bou-baichchar maeae, erare saṛia zaito nae,
te i malike tare loia Allar dorbaro azir oibo. Tare duaror ḳopaṭ ba soukaṭor loge uba ḳoria munibe shik dia tar ḳano fur ḳorbo. Teu he hara zindegi bor munibor gulamit roibo.
“Kunu manshe zudi bandigirit dibar lagi tar nizor fuṛire besilae, te gulam oḳol zela soe bosor bade munibor baṛi taki emneu azad oizain, ou fuṛi to ila azad oito nae.
Tair munib zudi tair ufre kushi na oin, te ṭeḳa-foeshar bodola taire azad ḳori dite oibo. Taire dusra kunu zatir manshor gese besibar eḳtiar nai, ḳaron munibe to tan nizor daeitto adae ḳorsoin na.
Oile munibe zudi tan nizor fuar lagi taire fosond ḳoria nein, te taire afon fuṛir laḳan hoḳol ḳemota dite oibo.
Munibe zudi ou bandire bia ḳorar bade, dusra kunu ḳoinnare bia ḳore, ta-o i bandir kuraki, ḳafoṛ-sufoṛ ar shorilor faona hok taire deoa lagbo.
He zudi ou tino hok furafur adae na ḳore, te i fuṛire eḳdom bina foeshae azad ḳori dite oibo.
“Mair ḳaia zudi kunu manush morizae, te zegie tare marse, tareo ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
Oile he nize zudi kun na ḳorar niote mare, aḳta kunu ḳarone goṭizae ba ami Allar morzie ita oe, te ou kuni zon gia ola kunu zagat bagito farbo, ze zagar ḳota ami tumrare ḳoimu.
Ar ḳeu zudi zania-hunia ichcha ḳori ḳeurore kun ḳoria, bade aia amar kurbani ḳanar geseo ashroe loe, ta-o hon taki dori nia tare ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
“Ze manshe tar afon ma ba bafor ufre at tule, tare nichoe ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
“Ḳeu zudi kunu manshore suri ḳoria ania besilae, ba ou manshore tar gese faoa zae, te tare nichoe ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
“Ze manshe afon ma ba bafore gali-galaz ḳore, tareo nichoe ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
“Kunu manshe ḳaijjat lagia zudi logor zonre ṭushi ba fattordi mare, i mair ḳaia ou zon na morleo bisnat hutia foṛono taḳe,
heshe uṭia laṭi bor dia sola-fira ḳorar zorur oe, te zegie tare marse tare ḳatol ḳorio na. Ḳali hou zonor ḳam-ḳazor ḳeti ar tar shullo-ana daoai ḳoros dite oibo.
“Ḳeu zudi tar ḳorida gulam-bandire laṭi dia mare ar mair ḳaia ogu morizae, te ere shaza dite oibo.
Oile mair ḳaoar dui-eḳdin bade zudi basia roe, te kunu shaza deoa lagto nae, ḳaron ou gulam to tar nizor samana asil.
“Maramari ḳorat lagia zudi aḳta ḳeu kunu beṭire maʼre ar tair feṭor baichcha nosṭo oizae, oile ar kunu ḳeti na oe, te ou beṭir zamair dabi ar bisari-shalishor bibesona mafik ere ḳeti-furon dite oibo.
Oile zudi tair aro kunu ḳeti oe, taile ere ou laḳan shaza dibae;
Zanor bodola zan, souḳor bodola souḳ, dator bodola dat, ator bodola at, faor bodola fao,
zalanir bodola zalani, zoḳomor bodola zoḳom, dagor bodola dag dite oibo.
“Ḳeu zudi tar ḳorida gulam ba bandir kunu sokut marae souḳ nosṭo oizae, te ou souḳor bodola he i gulamre azad ḳori dite oibo.
Zudi maria er dat falai dey, ta-o ere azad ḳori deoa lagbo.
“Kunu gorue gutaia zudi kunu beṭa ba beṭire marilae, te gorur malikre kunu shaza deoa lagto nae. Ḳali hi gorure ḳankoṛdi iṭaia marilite oibo, i gorur gust ḳeu ḳaito farto nae.

Oile i gorur zudi hamesha oula gutanir ḳaichchot taḳe, ar hi malikre hushiar ḳorar badeo he iṭare aṭḳae na, ermaze i gorue kunu beṭa ba beṭire marilae, te i gorure ḳankoṛ maria marilite oibo, ar tar malikreo marilite oibo.
Zudi i malikor gese kunu ḳeti-furon saoa oe, taile he ou zorimana dia nizor zan basaito farbo.
I gorue zudi kunu huruttare gutaia marilae, taile erlagio ou homan niom oibo.
Kunu gorue zudi ḳeuror gulam ba bandire gutaia marilae, taile gorur malike hi gulamor malikre tish tola foriman rufa dite oibo ar hi gorureo ḳankoṛ mari marilite oibo.
“Ḳeu zudi kunu gator muk kulia toe ba gat kudia igur muḳ guria na toe, ar i gator bitre kunu goru ba gada foṛizae,
taile gator malike foshur malikre ḳeti-furon dite oibo. Oile i mora foshu faibo gator malike.
“Ḳeuror gorue zudi aroḳzonor gorure gutaia marilae, te hou zita gorure besia, er dam ar mora gorur damo era duiozone homan-homan ḳori baṭia niba.
Oile ag taki zudi zanahuna taḳe zen, i gorue ola gutae, ar tar malike tare na aṭḳae, te gorur bodola goru dite oibo, bodola deora zone ou mora goruṭa faibo.
“Ḳeu kunu manshor goru ba meṛa-sagol suri ḳoria ania zudi besilae ba zobo ḳorilae, te eḳ gorur bodola fasgu, eḳ meṛa ba sagolor bodola sairgu firot dite oibo.

Sure tar surir malor ḳeti-furon dite oibo, oile tar zudi ḳeti-furon dibar kunu takkot na taḳe, te tare besia er ḳeti-furon adae ḳorte oibo. Suri ḳora goru-gada ba meṛa-sagol zudi suror gese zita faoa zae, taile he ita egur bodola dugu firot dite oibo.

“Kunu sure zudi surit gia goro hamaibar bala dora ḳailae ar zoḳom oia morizae, taile tare marar lagi marra zon daei oito nae. Oile shuruz uṭar bade zudi dinor bala ila oe, te i kunor lagi he daei oibo.

Sure tar surir malor ḳeti-furon dite oibo, oile tar zudi ḳeti-furon dibar kunu takkot na taḳe, te tare besia er ḳeti-furon adae ḳorte oibo. Suri ḳora goru-gada ba meṛa-sagol zudi suror gese zita faoa zae, taile he ita egur bodola dugu firot dite oibo.

“Kunu sure zudi surit gia goro hamaibar bala dora ḳailae ar zoḳom oia morizae, taile tare marar lagi marra zon daei oito nae. Oile shuruz uṭar bade zudi dinor bala ila oe, te i kunor lagi he daei oibo.

Sure tar surir malor ḳeti-furon dite oibo, oile tar zudi ḳeti-furon dibar kunu takkot na taḳe, te tare besia er ḳeti-furon adae ḳorte oibo. Suri ḳora goru-gada ba meṛa-sagol zudi suror gese zita faoa zae, taile he ita egur bodola dugu firot dite oibo.

“Kunu sure zudi surit gia goro hamaibar bala dora ḳailae ar zoḳom oia morizae, taile tare marar lagi marra zon daei oito nae. Oile shuruz uṭar bade zudi dinor bala ila oe, te i kunor lagi he daei oibo.
“Ḳeu zudi tar goru-sagol nizor bagano ba ketor maze raḳat gia saṛi dey, ar itae gia manshor ketor foshol ḳailae, te tar nizor ketor hoḳol taki bala ongsho bodola dia ḳeti-furon dite oibo.
“Kunu zaga taki aguin lagia zudi zuf-zongol zole, ar bade ou aguin gia ḳeuror ketor maze banda muiṭ, ṭeki ba asta ket zolizae, te aguin zegie zalaisil, he itar ḳeti-furon dibo.
“Ḳeu zudi aroḳzonor gese mal-samana ba ṭeḳa-foesha amanot toe, ar amanotdaror gor taki ita suri oizae, te ou sur dora foṛle, sure er ḍabul firot dibo.
Oile sur dora na foṛle, hi goror malike nizeu ita lukaise ni, oḳan zanar lagi tare Allar dorbaro azir ḳorbae.

“Aroḳzonor doḳolo ase, oula kunu goru-gada, meṛa-sagol, finnor ḳafoṛ ba zekunu arail samana dekia ḳeu zudi mono ḳore iṭa tar mal, taile iṭar salishir lagi tara duiozon gia Allar dorbaro azir oibo. Allae zare dushi shaibosto ḳorba, he tar birudi zonre er ḍabul firot dibo.
“Ḳeu zudi tar goru-gada, sagol-meṛa ba oinno kunu foshure kunu girostor gese raḳat dey, ar ogu morizae, zoḳom oizae ba araizae, oile er kunu shakki na mile,
te ou giroste nizeu zen ita ḳorse na, iṭa he Mabudor samne gia ḳosom ḳoria miṭmaṭ ḳorbo. I foshur malikeo ikan mante oibo, tain kunu ḳeti-furon faita nae.
Oile i girostor ges taki zudi iṭa suri oizae, te malike ḳeti-furon faibo.
Zudi kunu zongli zanuare dori igure marilae, taile er formanor lagi ogur faṛa-siṛa ṭukrain ania deḳani lagbo. Teu er kunu ḳeti-furon lagto nae.
“Ḳeuror ges taki ḳuzia ana kunu foshu zudi malikor aforḳe zoḳom oe ba morizae, te zein ḳuzia anchoin, ein er ḳeti-furon diba.
Oile malikor samneu zudi oula oe, te ḳeti-furon lagto nae. I foshu zudi ṭeḳa dia baṛa ḳori ana oe, te ou baṛar ṭeḳau oibo er ḳeti-furon.
