“Biar aḳt oise na oula kunu shoti fuṛire ḳeu zudi misa matia ania tair loge zina ḳorilae, taile hou beṭae fuṛir bafore zorimana dia ou fuṛire bia ḳorte oibo.
Oile fuṛir bafe zudi tar fuṛire i fuar gese bia dite kunu monteu razi na oe, ta-o i zorimana dite oibo.
“Kunu zadugir beṭire tumi zita rakio na.
“Kunu foshur loge ḳeu zina ḳorle, tare nichoe ḳatol ḳorte oibo.
“Ḳali Mabud saṛa dusra kuntar name zudi ḳeu kunu boli-foshad dey, te tareo shesh ḳorilte oibo.
“Kunu bin-deshi manshor loge bad bebohar ḳorio na, tare zulum ḳorio na. Mono rakio, tumrao eḳ shomoe Mishor desho musafir aslae.
“Kunu ṛaṛi beṭire ba kunu etim huruttare duḳ dio na.
Tarare duḳ dile tara zudi ḳande, te i ḳandon nichoe ami ḳobul ḳormu.
Ete amar gusa oibo aguin borabor. Tumra zuddot foṛia morbae, tumrar bouo ṛaṛi oibo, tumrar huruttaino oula etim oiba.
“Tumra zudi amar kunu obabi bondare ḳoroz deo, taile shudkuror laḳan tar ges taki shud nio na.
Ḳeuror gotoror saddor bondok raḳle, shuruz ḍubar ageu tar saddor firot dilaio.
Ḳaron uṛibar lagi oṭau tar eḳmatro shombol. Ikan nilegi he kita uṛia hutibo? Huno, he zudi amar gese ḳande, te ami to rohmanur rohim, ami tar ḳandon hunmuu.
“Tumi Allar birudde matio na, tumar kunu bisarok-shalishreo boddua dio na.
“Tumrar ketor foshol ba anguror shorbotor ze baṭ amare dibar ḳota, amar i baṭ dite deri ḳorio na. Tumra hoḳolor boṛo fuain amare dilaibae.
Tumrar goru-basur ar sagol-meṛar lagio ou eḳ shoman hukum. Itar hoḳol boṛo meda baichchain shatdin forzonto tarar maʼr gese roiba, aṭ dinor din amare dilaibae.
“Tumrau oibae amar faḳ-fobitro bonda. Zongli zanuare maria falaise, ila kunu zandaror gust tumra ḳaio na; ita kukurre ḳaoaio.
“Tumra misa kunu bodnam bar ḳorio na. Fokkofati ḳori misa shakki dia kunu ḳobis manshore shaijjo ḳorio na.
Shomazor doshzone oinnae ḳorer dekia tumio oula ḳorio na. Kunu mamla-mokoddomar shakki deoat gia, shoktiala dolor fokko loia oinnae ḳam ḳorio na.
Ar kunu goribor bisaro gia, he gorib gotikeu tar fokko loio na.
“Tumar dushmonor kunu goru-gadare be-fote zaoat deḳle, iṭa firaia ania tar gese dio.
Tumare ingshae ila kunu manshor gadare baror tole foṛigese deḳle, tare ila falaia zaio na. Tare tulat tumi oboshshoi shaijjo ḳorbae.
“Kunu goribor mamla-mokoddomat oinnae salishi ḳorio na.
Hazail misa mamla taki horia roio. Kunu be-ḳosur ba ni-oforadi manshore moutor shaza dio na. Zegie ila oinnae ḳorbo, tare ami saṛtam nae.
Gush ḳaio na, ḳaron gushe souḳala manshoreo anda ḳorilae. Gushe bala manshor mator mazeo fes lagai dey.
“Kunu bin-deshi manshor ufre zulum ḳorio na. Musafiror hal-hokikot to tumra zano, ḳaron tumrao Mishor desho musafir aslae.
“Tumra eḳ lagare soe boros zomino ket ḳorio ar foshol ḳaṭio,

bade shat nombor boroso zomino kunu ket na ḳoria fotit rakio, zominre aram dio. Ete zomino emneu zeta folibo, ota tumrar gorib oḳole ḳaia basiba. Tara neoar bade zeta foṛi roibo, ita zongli foshu-fakinte ḳaiba. Tumrar anguror bagan ba zoetun baganor lagio ou hukum manio.
“Tumra haftat soe din ḳam ḳorio, oile shat nombor din to Zummabar, idin kunta ḳorio na. Teu tumrar goru-gadae ziraiba, ar tumrar baṛit zonmise i gulam ar musafir oḳolor zaneo aram faibo.
“Ami tumrare zeta hukum dilam, ita kub hushiar oia amol ḳorio. Kunu devtar nam muḳo loio na, itar nam zanu tumrar muḳo na huna zae.
“Tumra forteḳ boros tinbar amar name id adae ḳorio.

Foela, Ḳamir saṛa Ruṭir Id adae ḳorio. Ami zela hukum ḳorsi, ekkere ou laḳan Abib sandor shatdin ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaio, ḳaron ou sando tumra Mishor taki baroia aislae. Idor shomoe lilla-sodga saṛa tumrar ḳeu zanu ḳali ate amar gese na ae.
Dusra, tumra Foshol Daoar Id manio. Ketor maze tumra zeta ruiso, ita daoar bade foela foshol diau id ḳorio. Tisra id, bosoror hesh sando baganor faḳna fol baṛit anar bade Ḍera-goror Id ḳorio.
Ou tino idor shomoe, bosoro tinbar tumrar hoḳol beṭain aia hoj ḳorar niote ami Alla malikor samne azir oio.
“Tumra zebla amar name foshu kurbani deo, ou shomoe ḳamirala kunuzat ruṭi itar loge furaia lilla dio na. Idor shomoe amar name zeta foshu kurbani dibae, itar sorbiala ṭukrain bian forzonto rakio na.
Tumrar ketor hoḳol taki bala foshol, tumrar Alla Mabudor goro anio.
“Ar huno, kunu sagolor baichchar gust tar maʼr dud dia randio na.
“Ami tumrar lagi ze zaga zuit ḳori raḳsi, hono tumrare hefazote fousanir lagi, ami tumrar age age eḳzon firista faṭaimu.
Tumra en ḳota mon dia hunio ar manio, en loge to amio asi. Hushiar roio, en birudde zaio na. Arnae ein tumrar oforad maf ḳorta nae.
Oile tumra zudi en hukum mano, ar ami zela ḳoisi oula solo, taile tumrar dushmonor loge ami dushmoni ḳormu, zera tumrar birudde lagbo, ami tarar birudde lagmu.
Amuri, Hiṭṭi, Farizi, Kenani, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolor desho amar firistae tumrare nia haraiba. Ami tara hoḳolṭire binash ḳorilimu.
Tumra tarar devtare fuza ḳorio na, kezmoto ḳorio na, ar hinor manshe zeta ḳoroin tumra ita ḳorio na. Tumra tarar deb-debir murtin ar tarar fuzar monḍop oḳol bangia surmar ḳorilio.
Tumra ḳali tumrar Alla Mabud, mani amar ebadot ḳorio. Teu tumrar rizeḳor maze rohomot dimu, ar tumrar hokkol bemar-azar dur ḳormu.
Tumrar deshor kunu beṭir feṭor hurutta nosṭo oito nae, ḳeu aṭkura roito nae. Ami tumrare furafur haeati forzonto basaia raḳmu.
Tumra zoto zatir ḳasat zaibae, tarar dilor maze ag taki amar ḍor-ḳof foeda ḳormu, tarare bedisha banailimu. Tumrar hokkol dushmon ḳoredi bagiba.
Hibbi, Kenani ar Hiṭṭi oḳolre tumrar shamna taki ḳedaibar lagi, ami tumrar age ḳori bingulor fal faṭaimu.
Oile ami tara hokkolre eḳoi bosoror bitre ḳedaitam nae, arnae asta desh fotit roia zongli zanuare boriziba, bade itae tumrare sataiba.
Ami aste aste tarare ḳedaimu, ar tumrar manush baṛia asta desh abad ḳorbae.

Ami Nil doria taki Filistini deshor shagor forzonto, ar douknor morubumi taki Furat gang forzonto tumrar deshor shimana gaṛmu. I desho zera boshot ḳorer tarare tumrar ato shofimu, ar tumra tarare i desh taki ḳedai dibae.
Tarar loge ba tarar devta oḳolor loge tumra kunu chukti ḳorio na.
Tumrar deshor bitre tarare roibar dio na. Arnae tara tumrare amar ges taki horaia gunar fote ṭania nibogi. Tumra zudi tarar deb-debir fuza ḳoro, taile nichchit tumrao tarar fando hamaibae.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi ar Harun, Harunor fuain Nadab ar Abihu, ar Boni Israilor shottoir zon murobbi neta amar gese uṭia ao. Aibar bala tumra duroi taki amare shoizda ḳorio.
Oile ḳali tumi eḳla amar ḳasat ufre aibae, ar keu nae. Erar loge ar kunu Boni Israil zanu na uṭe.”
Musae manshor gese aia Mabudor hokkol ḳalam ar ain-ḳanun hunaila, ita hunia hoḳol manshe eḳloge ḳoila, “Mabude zotota bataisoin ita hokkolta amra manmu.”
Mabudor batail hoḳol ḳalam Musae lekia toila. Bador din fozore uṭia faṛor lamat eḳan kurbani ḳana banaila, ar Boni Israilor baro gusṭire iad raḳar lagi barogu kuṭa banaila.
Bade tain Boni Israilor zuan oḳolre faṭaila ar tara Mabudor name bout Zalail Kurbani dila, ar bout bisal zobo ḳoria Salamoti Kurbanio dila.
Musae kurbanir lour ordeḳ nia ḳoeṭa baṭit toila, ar baki ordeḳ nia kurbani ḳanar ufre siṭai dila.
Bade tain Allar loge milonor usillar niom-ḳanun leḳa kitabḳan tilaot ḳori manshore hunaila. Ita hunia manshe zuaf dila, “Amra Mabudor hoḳol hukum hunmu, tain zotota ḳoisoin hoḳolta manmu.”
Oḳan hunia Musae lou loia manshor ufre siṭaia ḳoila, “I lou oilo Allai milonor hou usillar lou, ze usilla Mabude tan hoḳol shorto mafik tumrar loge boail ḳorsoin.”
Teu Musa, Harun, Nadab, Abihu ar Boni Israilor shottoir zon murobbi neta faṛor ufre uṭla.
Tara nizor souḳe Boni Israilor Alla Pakor didar deḳla. Tara deḳla, Allar fao mubaroḳor tole ase, soḳsoḳa lil moni fattoror toiari saṭor laḳan, asmanor nomunae saf.
Boni Israilor murobbi oḳole Allare deḳleo tain erare marar lagi at tulla na. Tara tan didar faila ar ḳaoa-daoa ḳorla.
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi ou faṛor ufre amar ḳandat ao, aia ḳoe din ro. Manshore talim dibar lagi amar ze hukum-ahkam fattoror ufre leksi, ota ami tumare dimu.”
Teu Musae tan ḳadim Iusare loge loia faṛo uṭla, ar Musa Allar faṛo gela.
Tain murobbi oḳolre ḳoia gela, “Amra firot aibar ag forzonto afnara amrar lagi ono bar saiba. Harun ar Hur afnarar ḳasat asoin, kunu ḳaijja-fosad lagle erar gese zaiba.”
Musa faṛo uṭteu asta faṛ megor saḳae guri gelo,
ar Tur faṛor ufre Mabudor nuror tozolli zair oilo. Soe din asta faṛ megor saḳae gura roilo. Shat nombor din ou megor saḳa taki Mabude Musare ḍakila.
Boni Israile Mabudor nuror tozolli deḳla, tara deḳla faṛor ufre agunir laḳan zoler.
Faṛ baia uṭi-uṭi Musa hou megor bitre hamai gela. Tain sallish din, sallish rait hou faṛo roila.
Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Tumi Boni Israilre ḳo, tara amar gese dan-ḳoerat loia azir ouk. Tarar nizor kushie zeta dan ḳorba, ota tumi shomzia rakio.
Tarar ges taki ou laḳan mal shomzio;
“Amar roar lagi tumi Boni Israil oḳolredi faḳ-fobitro eḳan zaga toiar ḳoraibae. Teu ami tarar loge boshot ḳormu.
Amar roar gor ar mal-samanar befare ami tumare zela nomuna deḳaimu, ekkere ou laḳan ḳori hoḳolta tiar ḳoraio.
“Tara babla laḳṛi dia egu shonduk banaiba. Iṭa lambae aṛai at, deṛ at fash ar deṛ at usa.
Er bare-bitre ḳaṭi shunadi lefia dio, ar sairo kinarao shunar noksha lagaio.
Hunaror aguindi fuṛia sairṭa shunar ḳoṛa er sairo kunat lagaio, o galat duiṭa ar ho galat duiṭa lagaio.
Babla laḳṛidi dugu benda banaia shunadi lefia dite oibo.
Shondukre boia near lagi duio galar ḳoṛar mazedi, ou duio benda harani lagbo.
Benda duioṭa shonduḳor ḳoṛar bitre harail roibo, iguin kulio na.
Ami amar hukum-ahkam leḳa ze fobitro shahadot fattor tumare dimu, tumi iṭa ou shonduḳor bitre toio.
“Ḳaṭi shunadi shonduḳor eḳan sani banaio, oḳanor ufre gunar kofora adae ḳora oibo. I sani lambae aṛai at ar fashe deṛ at oibo.

Tumi hou sanir kinarao shuna fiṭaia dugu karubi banaio. Ou karubi deḳte Duldul guṛar laḳan ḍaḳna-ala. Banaia shonduḳor dui galat lagaio, o galat eḳṭa, ar ho galat eḳṭa. Duio karubi sanir loge ou laḳan ḳori shunadi banani lagbo, zeta astaṭa ḳali eḳ siz oe.

Tumi hou sanir kinarao shuna fiṭaia dugu karubi banaio. Ou karubi deḳte Duldul guṛar laḳan ḍaḳna-ala. Banaia shonduḳor dui galat lagaio, o galat eḳṭa, ar ho galat eḳṭa. Duio karubi sanir loge ou laḳan ḳori shunadi banani lagbo, zeta astaṭa ḳali eḳ siz oe.
Er ḍaḳna duioḳan ufredi melail roibo, ar er saear tole taḳbo shonduḳor sani. Duio karubi mukamuki uba taḳbo, ar tarar souḳ roibo sanir bae.
I sanire shonduḳor ufre lagaio, ar amar hukum-ahkam leḳa ze shahadot fattor tumare dimu, ou fattor tumi shonduḳor bitre toio.
I shahadot shonduḳor sanir ufre duio karubir mazḳano, ami tumare didar dimu. Ou didaror shomoe Boni Israilor lagi amar hoḳol ain-ḳanun zanaimu.
“Babla laḳṛi dia dui at lamba, eḳ at fash ar deṛ at usa ḳori eḳan ṭebul banaio.
Oḳanre ḳaṭi shunadi lefia sairo kinarao noksha lagaio.
Ṭebulor sairo kinarao sair angul usa ḳori eḳ haz dibae, hazor maze shunadi noksha ḳorbae.
Ṭebulor sairo kunat sairo faear ufre shunar sairṭa ḳoṛa lagaibae.
I sairo ḳoṛain ṭebulor kunar hou usa hazor tole lagaio, zate ṭebul boia neoar bala ḳoṛar bitre benda harail zae.
Benda duioṭa babla laḳṛidi banaia shunadi lefibae, ou bendadi ṭebul boia nibae.
Ṭebulor uforor tal-bashon, Allar name Shorbot-Fanir Kurbanir zog ar mog, hoḳolta ḳaṭi shunadi banani lagbo.
Ou ṭebulor ufre amar samne hamesha fobitro ruṭi toibae, i ruṭi zanu shob shomoe toa oe.”

Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi ḳaṭi shunadi eḳan seragdani banaibae, seragdanir tola ar uforor ḍanḍi ḳaṭi shuna fiṭaia goṛaibae. Er ḍanḍi, fulor laḳan fiala, kuṛi ar fafṛi oḳol seragdanir loge eḳano lagail roibo.
Seragdanir ḍanḍir dui galat tinṭa ḳori muṭ soeṭa ḍal taḳbo.
Forteḳ ḍalor maze zobafulor laḳan tingu ḳori fiala taḳbo. Seragdanir soeo ḍalo eḳlaḳan ḳam ḳora oibo.
Seragdanir mul ḍanḍir mazeo zobafulor laḳan sairṭa fiala taḳbo.
Ou mul ḍanḍi taki baroil soeṭa ḍalor maze, foela duio ḍalor zuṛat egu kuṛi, dusra duio ḍalor zuṛat arok kuṛi, ar heshor duio ḍalor zuṛato kuṛi dio.
Kuṛi ar ḍal hoḳolta seragdani taki baroibo, hoḳolta milia ek chiz oibo. Astaṭau ḳaṭi shuna fiṭaia banani lagbo.
Erbade shatṭa lem banaia ou seragdanir ufre ou laḳan ḳori lagani lagbo, zate lem zalanir bade seragdanir samna for oe.
Lemor fita saf ḳorar simṭa ar zalail fitar sali toar lagi ḳoegu baṭi, ḳaṭi shunadi banani lagbo.
Seragdanir hoḳolta bananir lagi eḳ mon ḳaṭi shuna lagbo.
“Huno, ou faṛor ufre tumare zela noksha deḳail oilo, ekkere ou laḳan ḳori hoḳolta banaio.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi dosh ṭukra fesail sutardami lilen ḳafoṛdi amar goror bitoror forda banaio. Ar lil, baingoni, lal sutadi bala ustadredi ermaze karubi oḳolor sobi bain ḳoraio.
Hoḳol ṭukrain eḳ mafor oibo, lambae aṭaish at ar fashe sair at.
I ṭukraintor fasḳan fasḳan ḳori eḳano zuṛa dia, duḳan boṛo terfal banaite oibo.
Boṛo terfalor foela ṭukrar fashor ek kinarao lil sutadi hukor fur banaite oibo. Dusra ṭukrato oula ḳorte oibo.
Foela terfalor kinarao fonchashgu hukor fur ar dusra terfalo oula fonchashgu fur dite oibo. Duio boṛo terfalor hukor fur egu aregur ulṭamuḳa taḳbo.
Bade shunadi fonchashgu huk banaia hou furor mazedi haraia, boṛo duio terfalre aṭḳai dio. Teu i duio ṭukradi eḳan gor tiar oibo.
“Amar goror ufor gurar lagi sagolor ruma dia terfalor laḳan egaroḳan ṭukra banani lagbo.
Hoḳol ṭukrain eḳ mafor oibo, tish at lamba ar sair at fash.

On taki fas ṭukra eḳloge zuṛa dia boṛo eḳ terfal banaite oibo. Ar baki soe ṭukra zuṛa dia, boṛo aroḳ terfal banaia harle, ou dusra terfalor ze ṭukra baṛoti roibo, oḳanre tambur samnor bae dui bainj ḳori dite oibo.
Foela boṛo terfalor fashor ek kinarao fonchashgu hukor fur banaite oibo, ar dusra terfalo-o oula oibo.
Bade fitol dia fonchashgu huk banaia hou hukor furor maze haraia, ou boṛo duio terfal eḳano zuṛa dite oibo. Teu i duio terfal milia eḳan sani oibo.
Sagolor rumar boṛo terfalor ze ada ṭukra baṛoti oibo, ikan ḳoredi loṭḳail roibo.
I terfalḳan tolor ḳafoṛ taki eḳ at boṛo oae ikan duio galabae loṭḳail roia hara gorre gurilibo.
Er ufor gurar lagi lal rong ḳora meṛar samṛadi aroḳan terfal banaia guri dite oibo. Bade er ufre fu’r samṛadi sani toiar ḳori guri dite oibo.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Amar goror lagi babla laḳṛidi ḳoeḳan freim banani lagbo.
Forteḳ freim banaibae dosh at lamba ar deṛ at faṛ.
Ou freimo dugu ḳori faea taḳbo. Hoḳol freim eḳlaḳan banaite oibo.
Dokkin galar lagi bishḳan freim banani lagbo.
I freimor faear tole deoar lagi sallishgu rufar bura banani lagbo, forteḳ freimor dui faear lagi dugu bura lagbo.
Amar goror uttor galar lagiao bishḳan freim lagbo,
ar forteḳ freimor faear lagi dugu ḳori sallishgu rufar bura banani lagbo.
Foismor galar lagi, mani ḳor galar lagi soeḳan freim,
ar ḳoror duio kunar lagi aro duḳan freim lagbo.
I dui freimre dui kunar duio freimor loge tole-ufre eḳano zuṛa dite oibo. Fortek kunar dui freim daror freimor loge batti maria eḳloge zuṛa dite oibo. Duio kuna eḳlaḳan oibo.
Teu ḳoredi aṭḳan freim oibo, ar forteḳ freimor tole deoar lagi dugu ḳori shulogu rufar bura lagbo.
“Tumi freimre zuṛa dibar lagi babla laḳṛidi ḳoegu lamba batti banaio.
Er maze fasgu batti goror eḳ galar lagi, ar baki fasgu aroḳ galar lagi, ar fasgu lagbo ḳor gala, mani fosim galar freimor lagi.
Freimor mazḳano lagail ou battidi hoḳol freimor eḳ mata taki aroḳ mata forzonto aṭḳaibae.
Freimḳanain shunadi lefte oibo, ar batti haranir lagi shunar ḳoṛa banaia freimo lagaite oibo. I batti oḳolo shunadi lefte oibo.
Amar goror ze noksha tumare ou Tur faṛor ufre deḳailam, tumi ekkere ou laḳan ḳori iṭa toiar ḳoraio.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi lil, lal, baingoni suta ar fesail dami lilen ḳafoṛdi eḳan forda banaio. Bala kunu ustadredi er ufre karubi oḳolor sobi bain ḳoraio.
I fordaḳan babla laḳṛidi sairṭa kuṭir loge lagaia shunar ḳoṛadi loṭḳai dibae, kuṭir matat shunar ḳoṛa lagaibae. Ar kuṭiguin shunadi lefaibae, kuṭir tolat rufar bura lagaibae.
Fordar uforor lilen ḳafoṛo lagail hukor loge fordaḳan loṭḳail roibo. I fordar ḳore shahadot shonduk toibae. Fordadi amar goror herem shorif, mani ḳas faḳ zaga ar faḳ zagar mazḳano beṛa dio.
Ou herem shorifor bitre shahadot shonduḳor ufre er sani lagaio.
I fordar bare faḳ zagar uttor galat fobitro ruṭi toibar ṭebulḳan toio, ar er ulṭamuka dokkin galat toio seragdani.
“Amar goror duaror lagi eḳan forda banaio, ikan dami lilen ḳafoṛdi banaia hari, lil, baingoni, lal rongor sutadi noksha ḳorio.
I fordar lagi shunar ḳoṛa ar babla laḳṛir fasṭa kuṭi banaio. Kuṭiguin shunadi lefaio, kuṭir tolat fitolor fasgu bura lagaio.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi babla laḳṛidi fas at lamba, fas at fash ar tin at ubi dia sairkuni ḳori eḳan kurbani ḳana toiar ḳoraio.
Er sairo kunar ufre laḳṛidi sairṭa hing dio. Ou hing kunar laḳṛi kudia banani lagbo, i astaḳan eḳ siz oibo. Bade fura kurbani ḳana fitoldi lefaio.
Kurbani ḳanar sali tular boṛo samos ar gamla, lou toar baṭi, gust tular simṭa, angra toar fatil, hoḳolta fitoldi banaio.
Fitoldi eḳan zali banaibae. Er sair kunat sairṭa fitolor ḳoṛa lagaio.
Kurbani ḳanar tola taki uforor mazamazi zagar taṛiar tole ou zali boaio.
Kurbani ḳana boia nibar lagi babla laḳṛidi dugu benda banaio, banaia duiogu fitoldi lefio.
I bendain ḳoṛar bitredi harani lagbo. Teu kurbani ḳana boia neoar bala duio bendain kurbani ḳanar dui galabae taḳbo.
Kurbani ḳana toḳtadi banaia er bitre pak rakio. Ami ou faṛor ufre tumare zela noksha deḳailam, ekkere olaḳan ḳori banani loaio.
“Amar goror sairobae uṭan taḳbo. Er dokkin galabae eḳ-sho at rakio, i muka dibae dami lilen ḳafoṛor forda.
I forda ṭananir lagi bishgu kuṭi dibae. Kuṭir tolat dibae eḳṭa ḳori fitolor bura, forda ṭananir lagi rufar ḳoṛa ar bandibar tar lagaibae.
Uttor galabae eḳ-sho at uṭan raḳbae. Hono-o forda dio, bishgu kuṭi, bishgu fitolor bura, kuṭir loge lagaio rufar ḳoṛa ar tar.
Foisme fonchash at uṭan rakio, hono-o ḳoeḳan forda, doshgu kuṭi, fortek kuṭir tolat eḳṭa ḳori bura dio.
Fubedio fonchash at uṭan rakio;
Geiṭor eḳ galat fonro at lamba forda, tinṭa kuṭi ar tinṭa bura lagaibae,
ola dusra galato fonro at forda, tinṭa kuṭi ar tinṭa bura dio.
Uṭanor geiṭor lagi sairṭa kuṭi, sairṭa bura ar bish at lamba eḳan forda. Fordaḳan dami lilen ḳafoṛdi banaia lil, baingoni, lal sutadi noksha ḳoraio.
Uṭanor sairo galar hokkol kuṭire bandibar tar ar ḳoṛa oibo rufar, er tole fitolor bura taḳbo.
Uṭankan lambae eḳ-sho at ar fashe fonchash at oibo. Er sairobae fas at ubi forda dio, forda oibo dami lilen ḳafoṛor, ar kuṭintor tole dio fitolor bura.
Amar goror ḳamor hoḳol siz fitoldi banaibae, mul tambu ar uṭanor beṛar ṭanar rosir tolor fereg oḳol fitolor oibo.
“Tumi Boni Israil oḳolre hukum dio, tara zoetun sesia tel banaia tumar gese anto, zate lem hamesha zalail roe.

Milon-tambur shahadot shonduḳor samne ze fordaḳan taḳbo, ou fordar bare Harun ar tar fuainte hainja taki fozor forzonto, Mabudor samne lemguin deḳa-huna ḳorba. Amar ou hukum zanu Boni Israile oarishor for oarish dori hor-hamesha amol ḳore.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “O Musa, Boni Israilor maze imamoti ḳorar lagi tumar bai Harun, tar fua Nadab, Abihu, Ali-Azor ar Isamarre tumar samne anao.
“Tumar bai Harunor ijjot ar shundor baṛanir lagi fobitro lebas toiar ḳorao.
Ami faḳ ruhu dia zeta ustad oḳolre ḳarigori ḳamor aḳol-hekmot disi, tumi hou ḳarigor oḳolre hukum deo, tara Harunor lagi oula fobitro lebas banaukka, ze lebas ḳali amar imamotir ḳamo lage.

I lebasor maze buḳor uforor toli, efron, alḳella, chegor ḳafoṛor fainjabi, faugṛi ar ḳomoro bandar ḳafoṛ banaio. Tumar bai Harun ar tar fuainte zate amar imamoti ḳam ḳorta faroin, erlagi tarar faḳ-fobitro lebas banaio.
Lebas banaite tara lil, baingoni, lal suta, ar dami lilen ḳafoṛ, erloge shunao lagaiba.
“Fordan imamor efron banaibae lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ, ar shunadi. Ita bala kunu ustadredi banaio.
Efronor ḳandor dui gala zuṛa dibar lagi duḳan foṭṭi banaia, efronor uforor kunat lagaio.
Efronor loge zuṛa lagail feṭor uforor belṭḳano efronor laḳan lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ, ar shunadi banaio.
“Tumi duiṭa akik fattor ania er ufre Israil, mani Iakubor fuaintor nam kudaia lekaio.
Foela fattoror ufre, tarar zonmor hishabe boṛo taki huru muka soe zonor nam, ar dusra fattoror ufreo baki soe zonor nam kudaia leḳaio.
Hunar oḳole dami fattoror ufre kudia zela shil banain, ekkere ou laḳan ḳori dugu fattoror ufre Israilor fuaintor nam kudaio.
Fattor duiogu shunar zazoiror maze lagaia efronor ḳandor foṭṭir loge lagaio. Israilor fuaintor bae Mabudor nozor raḳar lagi, i fattor Harune Mabudor samne tar ḳandor maze lagaibo.
Duio zazoiror loge shunadi banail duksa chein lagaio. Ou duio chein ḳaṭi shunadi rosir nomunae fesaia banaio.
Duio zazoiror loge shunadi banail duksa chein lagaio. Ou duio chein ḳaṭi shunadi rosir nomunae fesaia banaio.
“Amar rae-foesala zanar lagi bukur uforor toli banaio. Bala ustad kunu dorziredi banaio. Efronor ḳamor laḳan iṭao lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ, ar shunadi banaio.
Iṭa oibo lambae ada at, fashe ada at, sairkuna-ala dui bainj ḳora eḳan ḳafoṛ.
Er ufre hair doraia sair hair fattor lagaibae. Foela harit iakut, fit, ar fanna moni.
Dusra harit lal-moni, lil-moni ar hira;
Tin nombor harit firuz, gumed ar foddorag moni.
Sair nombor hairo fuḳraz, boidurjo ar shuruz moni. I fattor oḳol shunar zazoirdi lagaio.
Israilor baro fuar lagi baroṭa fattor lagbo. Ita eḳo fattoro eḳ eḳ fuar nam kudia lekaio, zela kudia shil banail oe.
“Buḳor uforor tolir lagi ḳaṭi shunadi rosir laḳan fesaia duksa chein banaio.
Shunar duiṭa ḳoṛa banaia buḳor ou tolir uforor kunat lagaio.
Ar chein duiogesa duio ḳoṛar loge aṭḳaio.
Duio ḳandor efronor samnor fitat shunar zazoiror loge cheinor eḳ mata bandio.
Aro duiṭa shunar ḳoṛa banaia buḳor uforor tolir dui kunat lagaio. I duioṭa efronor loge buḳor tolir tole roibo.
Bade aro duiṭa shunar ḳoṛa banaia, efronor ḳandor foṭṭir shoi toledi, feṭor uforor belṭor uforor silair ḳasat lagaio.
Bade buḳor uforor tolir tolor ḳoṛar loge feṭor uforor noksha ḳora belṭor ḳoṛa lil sutadi bandio. Teu ou toli efronor ufre taki horto nae.
“Faḳ zagat hamaibar bala Harune amar rae-foesala hunar lagi, buḳor uforor tolir ufre leḳa Israilor baro fuar nam lagaite oibo, i toliṭae tarare hor-hamesha Mabudor samne raḳbo.

Amar rae-foesalar ou tolir bitre Urim ar Tummim rakio. Harun zebla Mabudor samne azir oibo, ou shomoe ita tar buḳor ufre roibo. Harune Boni Israilor lagi amar rae-foesala zanar upae hishabe hor-hamesha tar buḳor ufre Mabudor deoa ou siz raḳbo.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Efronor tole lamba ze alḳella roibo, ikṭa furaṭau lil rongor sutadi banaio.
Mata haraibar lagi er mazḳano pak rakio. I pak zaga zate na siṛe, erlagi er sairo gala doṛ ḳori bain ḳorte oibo.
Lil, baingoni, lal rongor sutadi anuar folor laḳan banaia, ou alḳellar tolor muṛir sairobae lagaio. Ar itar maze maze dio shunar gungur.
I muṛit dibae egu ḳori anuar ar egu gungur.
Imamoti ḳorar bala Harune i lebas findibo. He zebla faḳ zagat Mabudor samne azir oibo, ar hon taki bare baroibo, ou shomoe ou gungur oḳolor aoaz huna zaibo, teu he morto nae.
“Ḳaṭi shunadi eḳan fat banaia er ufre shilor laḳan kudia ou aeat lekaio, ‘Mabudor name faḳ-fobitro.’
I fatḳan faugṛir samnor galat lagaia lil sutadi bandio.

Iṭa Harunor ḳofalor ufre roibo. Zoto faḳ-fobitro mal Boni Israile dan-ḳoerat loia aiba, itar hoḳol nomunar dush-tirutir bar Harune boibo. Mabude zate tarare ḳobul ḳoroin, erlagi Harune ḳofalor ufre i shunar fatḳan hamesha lagaia raḳbo.
Imamor fainjabi ar faugṛi toiar ḳoraio chegor dami lilen ḳafoṛdi. Ḳomoro bandar ḳafoṛḳan sui-sutadi noksha ḳori banaio.
“Harunor fuaintor ijjot ar shundoror lagi fainjabi, toki ar ḳomoro bandar ḳafoṛ toiar ḳoraio.
Tumi tumar bai Harun ar tar fuaintore i ḳafoṛ findaio. Tarar matat fobitro tel ḍalia ḳelafoti dia imamoti ḳamo lagaio. Tumi tarare faḳ-fobitro ḳorio, zate tara amar imam oita faroin.
Ḳomor taki urat forzonto shorom gurar lagi lilen ḳafoṛdi haf-penṭ banaio.

Harun ar tar fuain zebla milon-tambut hamaiba, ba kurbani ḳanar gese faḳ zagat hamaia imamotir ḳamo lagba, ou shomoe tara ou haf-penṭ finba. Teu tara ni-oforadi roiba, morta nae. Harun ar tar oarishor silsilar lagi i ain hor-hamesha salu roibo.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi imam oḳolre ou laḳan faḳ-saf ḳorio, zate imam bonia tara amar ebadot ḳam salaita faroin. Tumi nikut egu bisal ar dugu meṛa anaio.
Erloge nireḳ moedadi ruṭi, teldi baza fiṭa, ar tel maḳail safaṭi banaio. Ita kuntatu ḳamir mishaio na.
Ota banaia eḳ ṭukrit loio, erloge hou bisal ar duio meṛa loia amar samne aio.
Bade Harun ar tar fuaintore amar goror duaror ḳasat ania, fanidi naoai dio.
Ar hou fobitro lebas oḳol ania Harunre findaio. Fainjabi, alḳella, efron ar buḳor uforor toli hoḳolta findaio. Efronor loge ustadi ator banail hou feṭor uforor belṭḳano bandia dio.
Tar matat faugṛi findaio ar shunar fatdi banail fobitro tazḳano lagaio.
Bade ḳelafotir tel tar matat ḍalia tare ḳelafoti dio.
Tar fuaintoreo ania fainjabi findaio.
Harun ar tar fuaintore ḳomoror ḳafoṛ bandia dio. Fuaintor matat dio toki. Ou laḳan Harun ar tar fuaintore imamor fodo boail ḳorio, zate siroḳalin niom hishabe imamotir fod ḳali tarar bongshot taḳe.
“Bade hou bisalre tumi milon-tambur samne anio, Harun ar tar fuainte ogur ḳolla ataia diba.
Atanir bade ou bisalre milon-tambur duaror ḳasat nia Mabudor samne zobo ḳorio.
Zobo ḳoria harle tuṛa lou tumar angulit lagaia kurbani ḳanar hingor maze lagaio, ar baki lou kurbani ḳanar tole ḍali dio.
Bisalor feṭor bitoror atboror sorbi, ḳoiljar uforor sorbi, duio kiḍni ar er sorbi, kurbani ḳanar ufre nia zalailio.
Er gust, ḳal, atbor gufor shudda Boni Israilor kempor bare nia zalailio. Ita oilo guna mafir kurbani.
“Bade hou duio meṛa taki egu meṛa anio, anle Harune ar tar fuainte ogur ḳolla ataia diba.
Ar ou meṛare zobo ḳoria er lou nia kurbani ḳanar sairo galat siṭai dio.
Meṛare ḳaṭia ṭukraia tar ṭeng ar feṭor bitoror hoḳolta doia, ḳolla ar baki ṭukraintor loge toio.
Heshe i astagu kurbani ḳanar ufre nia zalailio. Ita oilo Mabudor name Zalail Kurbani, Mabudor niote agunit deoa kushboeala sodga.
“Bade dusra meṛareo ania Harune ar tar fuainte ḳolla atai diba.
Atanir bade ogure zobo ḳoria er tuṛa lou nia Harun ar tar fuaintor ḍain ḳanor lotit, ḍain ator ar ḍain faor buṛi angulor maze lagaio. Ar baki lou nia kurbani ḳanar sairo galabae siṭai dio.
Bade ḳelafotir tel ar kurbani ḳana taki tuṛa lou loia, Harun ar tar fuaintor gotoro ar lebasor ufre siṭai dio. Teu lebas shudda Harun ar tar fuain faḳ-saf oiba.
Tumi ou meṛar sorbi, sorbiala lengur, feṭor bitoror hoḳoltar uforor sorbi, ḳoiljar uforor sorbi, duio kiḍni, er sorbi, ar ḍainor ran nio, iṭa oilo imamoti ḳamo boailor lagi boḳshia dibar meṛa.
Bade Mabudor nozoro toa ḳamir saṛa ruṭir ṭukri taki eḳan ruṭi, teldi baza eḳan fiṭa ar tel maḳail safaṭi eḳan loio.
Loia ita hoḳolta Harun ar tar fuaintor ato dia, Mabudor samne raḳar niote usa ḳori doria Dulona Kurbani hishabe dulaibae.
Ar ota tarar at taki nia, Mabudor samne kurbani ḳanar ufre, hou Zalail Kurbanir ufre zalailibae. Iṭa oilo Mabudor name agunit deoa sodga. Ou kushboeala kurbanie Mabud kushi oin.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi Harunre imamotir ḳamo boail ḳorar lagi, ḳelafoti boḳshibar meṛar sinar ṭukra loia, Mabudor samne Dulona Kurbani hishabe usa ḳori dulaibae. Iṭa oilo tumar baṭ.
Harun ar tar fuaintore imamotir ḳamo boailor lagi Dulona Kurbanir meṛar sina ar ran hoḳolta tumi faḳ-fobitro ḳorio.
Ou laḳan Boni Israilor deoa ou kurbanir ṭukrain hor-hamesha Harun ar tar fuainte faiba. Ita oibo Mabudor name Boni Israilor deoa Salamoti Kurbanir eḳṭa ongsho.
“Harunor bebohar ḳora fobitro lebas oḳol tar oarish oḳole faiba. Ou lebas findia tara ḳelafoti faiba ar imamotir ḳamo boail oiba.
Harunor bade tar ze fua imam oia milon-tambur faḳ zagat ḳam ḳorbo, he shatdin forzonto i lebas tar gotro raḳbo.
“Ḳelafoti boḳshibar meṛar ou gustḳanain nia kunu fobitro zagat randibae.
Harun ar tar fuainte milon-tambur duaror ḳasat boia, ṭukrit toa hou ruṭir loge ou gust ḳaiba.

Imamor ḳamo boail ḳorar lagi, tarare faḳ-saf ḳorar lagi, ḳanir zeta siz oḳol gunar mafir lagi kurbani deoa oibo, ita ḳali Harun ar tar fuainte ḳaiba. Ar keu ita ḳaito farto nae, ḳaron ita oilo faḳ-fobitro ḳana.
Ou boail ḳorar kurbanir meṛar kunu gust ba ruṭi zudi bian forzonto roizae, te ita zalailite oibo, ḳeu ḳaito farto nae, ita to faḳ-fobitro.
“Harun ar tar fuaintor lagi, ami tumare zotota ḳorar hukum disi, tumi oula ḳorio. Boail ḳorar ou ḳam tumi shatdin bora ḳorio.
Guna mafir kofora hishabe tumi forteḳ din egu ḳori bisal kurbani dibae. Ar kurbani ḳanare faḳ-fobitro ḳorar lagio ou laḳan kurbani dio, ar faḳ-saf oar lagi fobitro tel ḍalio.

Kurbani ḳanare faḳ-fobitro ḳorar lagi shatdin bora kurbani dia, guna mafir kofora adae ḳoria faḳ-fobitro ḳorio. Teu i kurbani ḳana eḳ moha-fobitro zaga oibo. Zekunu zinish i kurbani ḳanat suaile, ita faḳ-fobitro oizibo.
“Er bad taki forteḳ din i kurbani ḳanar ufre, eḳ boros boeoshor dugu meṛar baichcha kurbani dibae,
egu biane ar egu hainja bala.
Foela meṛar baichchar loge eḳ sher nireḳ moeda ar eḳ sher zoetunor fisha tel mishaite oibo. Ar Shorbot-Fanir Kurbanir lagi anguror eḳ sher shorboto Allar name dibae.
Hainja bala ze meṛa kurbani dibae, erlogeo biankur laḳan Foshol Kurbani ar Shorbot-Fani Kurbanir hoḳolta dite oibo. Ita oilo Mabudor niote agunit deoa kushboeala kurbani.
“Oarishor for oarish dori milon-tambur duaror gese, mani amar samne forteḳ din i Zalail Kurbani dite oibo. Hono ami tumrare didar dimu, tumar loge batchit ḳormu.
Boni Israilor gese ami hono didar dimu, ar amar kudrote ou zaga faḳ-fobitro oibo.
Ami milon-tambu ar kurbani ḳana fobitro ḳormu. Amar imamotir lagi Harun ar tar fuaintoreo ami fobitro ḳormu.
Ami Boni Israilor Mabud oia tarar maze boshot ḳormu.
Teu tara zanba, ami Allau tarar Mabud. Ami tarar loge boshot ḳorar lagiu to tarare Mishor desh taki bar ḳoria anchi. Ami Allau tarar Mabud.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Agor-kushboe zalaibar lagi tumi babla laḳṛidi eḳan zalani ḳana banaio.
Igu oibo sairkuna-ala, eḳ at lamba, eḳ at fash, dui at ubi. Astaḳanu hing shudda eḳano lagail roibo.
Er uforor sani, sanir sairo kinara ar hing, hoḳolta ḳaṭi shunadi lefibae. Sairo kinarao shunar noksha ḳoraibae.
Er dui kinarar nokshar tole dugu ḳori shunarḳoṛa lagaio. I ḳoṛar bitre benda haraia ogu boia neoa oibo.
I bendaguin babla laḳṛidi banaia shunadi lefaio.
Shahadot shonduḳor sanir ḳasat ze fordaḳan ase, ou zalani ḳana er samne rakio. Ou zagat ami tumare didar dimu.
“Forteḳ din biane lemguin zuit-zait ḳorar bala, Harune zalani ḳanar ufre kushboeala agor zalaibo.
Hainja bala lem zalanir shomoe, he hirbar agor-kushboe zalaibo. Tumrar oarishor for oarish dori Mabudor samne hor-hamesha ou agor-kushboe zolbo.
I agor-kushboe zalani ḳanar ufre dusra kunu zator kushboe zalaio na. Kunu Zalail Kurbani, Foshol Kurbani, ba ḍalibar zuka fani zatio kunta kurbani ḳorio na.

Gunar mafir kofora hishabe, Harune bosoro eḳbar guna mafir kurbanir lou, zalani ḳanar hingor ufre lagaite oibo. Teu ikan Mabudor name moha-fobitro oibo. Oarishor for oarish dori fordan imame bosoro eḳbar ou laḳan ḳorte oibo.”
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Tumi zebla Boni Israilor manshor foriman gonibae, ou shomoe tara hoḳoleu zarzir zanor bodola rufa dite oibo, zate i gonar lagi tarar ufre kunu gozob na ae.
Tarare gonar bala oula bodola loio, gona oise dolo zera hamaiba, era ebadot ḳanar mafe ada tola rufa diba. I rufa oibo Mabudor.
Bish boros ba er beshi boeoshor zekunu zon gona shesh oa dolo hamaile, en zanor bodola Mabudre ou rufa diba.
Zanor bodola deoar shomoe doni oḳole ou ada tular beshi dita farta nae, ar goribeo ḳom dile oito nae.
Tumi Boni Israilor ges taki zanor bodola ou rufa nia, amar goror ḳamo lagaio. Tumrar zanor bodola i rufae, Boni Israil oḳolre Mabudor dorbaro iad ḳorai dibo.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Ozu ḳorar lagi tumi fitolor eḳṭa gamla, ar gamla toar lagi fitolor eḳan soki-ḳaṭ banaio. Milon-tambu ar kurbani ḳanar mazḳano fani boria ogu toio.
I fanidi Harun ar tar fuainte ozu ḳorba.
Tara zate na moroin, erlagi forteḳbar milon-tambut hamaibar bala ou fanidi ozu ḳorte oibo. Imam hishabe Mabudor name agunit deoa zekunu kurbani adae ḳorar shomoeo ozu ḳorte oibo.
Tara zane basia roar lagi ou ozu ḳorba. I hukum tarar lagi hor-hamesha salu roibo, oarishor for oarish dori boail roibo.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Tumar nizor gese kushboedar bala bala moshla oḳol dola ḳoro. Tumi fas-sho tola mura-ator, aṛai-sho tola kushboeala ḍailchini, ar aṛai-sho tola bos,
shadaron ḍailchini fas-sho tola, ar zoetunor tel sair sher dola ḳorio. I maf oilo ebadot ḳanar mafe.
Ou moshla oḳol dia agor-kushboe moshla bananir ḳarigoror niome tumi ḳelafoti boḳshibar tel banaio, i tel to fobitro.
Ou tel dia tumi milon-tambu, shahadot shonduk,
ṭebul, ṭebulor uforor hoḳol samana, seragdanir hoḳolta, ar agor-kushboe zalanir ṭebul,
kurbani ḳana ar er mazor hoḳol samana, ozur gamla ar er tolor soki-ḳaṭ hoḳoltare fusia faḳ-fobitro ḳorio.
Teu i hoḳolta moha-fobitro samana oibo. Ita samana ḳeu soile, heo moha-fobitro oizibo.
“Tumi Harunre ar tar fuainre amar imamotir ḳamor lagi ḳelafotir tel dia faḳ-fobitro ḳorio.
Ar Boni Israilre zanai dio, oarishor for oarish dori iṭau oibo amar ḳelafoti boḳshibar fobitro tel.
I tel manshor gotoro deoa zaito nae. I niome tara zate ar kunu tel na banae. I tel to fobitro. Tumra iṭare faḳ-fobitro mono ḳoria ijjot ḳorte oibo.
Ḳeu zudi i laḳan tel toiar ḳore, ba imam sab saṛa ar keu i tel gotoro maḳe, te tare nizor zati taki fusilibae.
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi nizor gese kisu kushboeala moshla: guggulu, noki, kunduru ar ḳaṭi loban dola ḳorio. Dola ḳoria ota homan homan ḳori mishaio.
Ar zera agor-kushboe banain, tararedi ou ḳam ḳoraio. Itar loge nun mishaio, ita oibo nirbezal ḳaṭi fak-fobitro agor.
Ou agoror tuṛa guṛa nia milon-tambur shahadot shonduḳor samne toio. Hono ami tumare didar dimu. Tumra i agorre moha-fobitro samana mono ḳorio.
Ou moshla dia i niome ḳeu zate tar nizor lagi kunu agor-kushboe na banae. Ita to Mabudor name faḳ-fobitro chiz, ikan kial rakio.
Kusboedar siz mono ḳoria ḳeu zudi ita toiar ḳorilae, te tare i zati taki fusilibae.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila,
“Huno, ami Ehuda gusṭir Huror nati, Urir fua Batselolre fosond ḳorsi.
Ami tare Allai ruh dia kamil ḳorsi. Hoḳol laḳan ḳarigori ḳamor aḳol-buddi, biddae ustadi ḳamor ḳemota disi.
Erlagi he shuna, rufa, fitolor ufre shundor shundor noksha banaito farbo.
Dami dami fattor ḳaṭia moni-mukta lagani, laḳṛir ufre nokshar ḳam ar hoḳol zator ator ḳam ḳorto farbo.

Tar zugali hishabe ami Dan gusṭir Ohisamaḳor fua Aholiabre fosond ḳorsi. Ze ustad oḳole i ḳam ḳorta farba, ami tarare ḳamor aḳol disi, zate tumare batail amar hukum mafik, ita hoḳolta tara banaita faroin.
Tara banaiba, milon-tambu, shahadot shonduk, er uforor sani, tambur hoḳol mal-samana,
ṭebul, ṭebulor logor siz oḳol, ḳaṭi shunar seragdani, seragdanir logor hoḳolta ar agor-kushboe zalani ḳana,
kurbani ḳana ar er hoḳol mal-samana, hanḍi-bashon, ozu ḳorar gamla ar er soki-ḳaṭ,
imamoti ḳamor lagi Harunor imamotir lebas ar tar fuaintor lebas,
ḳelafotir tel, faḳ zagar lagi kushboeala agor. Ami tumare zela hukum disi, ekkere ou laḳan tara banaiba.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila,

“Tumi nize Boni Israilre ḳo, tumra amar deoa forteḳ Zummabar manio. I Zummabar oarishor for oarish dori tumra ar amar maze eḳ nishana oibo, zate tumra buzbae, amiu Mabud, ar ami tumrare amar fobitro bonda oar lagi alada ḳorsi.
“Tumra Zummabar manio, ou dinre tumrar lagi faḳ din ḳora oise. Ḳeu zudi i din na mane, te tare marilite oibo. Ze manshe idin kunuzat ḳam ḳorbo, tare tar zatir maz taki fusilibae.

Tumra haftar soe din ḳam ḳorio, oile shat nombor din Mabudor name aramor din, Zummabar. Shukrobar shuruz ḍuba taki Shonibar shuruz ḍubar ag forzonto Zummabar. I din ze manshe ḳam ḳorbo, tare marilibae.
Boni Israil oḳole amar deoa siroḳalin niom hishabe, oarishor for oarish dori hor-hamesha i Zummabar mante oibo.
I Zummabar to Boni Israil ar amar maze hameshakur lagi siroḳalin eḳ nishana. Ḳaron soe dine Mabude asman-zomin hoḳolta foeda ḳorla, oile shat nombor din kunu ḳam na ḳoria ziraila.”
Mabude Tur faṛor ufre Hozrot Musar loge ou batchit shesh ḳoria harle, Musar ato dui ṭukra shahadot fattor dila. Ou fattoror maze Alla Pake tan nizor ate tan hukum-ahkam leksoin.

Musa nobi faṛ taki lamia aite deri or dekia, manshe aia Harunor sairobae dola oia ḳoila, “Amrare fot sinia neoar lagi, afne amrare devta banai deukka. Ḳaron, ze Musae amrare Mishor taki bar ḳori anche, tar kita goṭse amra to zani na.”
Ikan hunia Harune tarare ḳoila, “Tumra zarzir bou ar fua-fuṛintor ḳano taki shunar goena kulia amar gese ano.”
Teu hoḳole tarar ḳanor goena kulia Harunor gese ania dilo.

Manshe zeta shuna ania dila, Harune ota nia aguindi golaia, hunaror atiardi eḳ basuror murti banaila. Ogu dekia Boni Israile ḳoila, “Bai oḳol, ou einu tumrar devta, zein tumrare Mishor desh taki bar ḳori anchoin.”
I halot dekia Harune hou basuror samne eḳ boli ḳana banaia zanai dila, “Samnor ḳail Mabudor name kushi-bashi ḳora oibo.”
Teu bador din kub sobre uṭia manshe devtar samne aia mongol boli ar foshu zalaia boli dila. Bade tara ḳaoa-daoa ḳoria hari, hoi-hulla ḳori nas-gan, furti-amud ḳorat lagla.
Ou Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi faṛor lamat zao. Tumar ou zeta manshore Mishor desh taki bar ḳori ancho, ita to naforman bonigese.

Ami tarare zela solar hukum dislam, tara ita bad dia nizor lagi eḳ basuror murti banaia, maṭit foṛia ogure fornam ḳorer. Ogur name tara foshu boli der ar ḳor, bai oḳol, ou einu tumrar devta, zein tumrare Mishor desh taki bar ḳori anchoin.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ami ita manshore sini, ita to gaṛteṛa-eḳguia zat.
Oḳon tumi amare bada dio na, itar ufre amar gusa aguinor laḳan dau dau ḳori zoler, ami itare sarḳar ḳorilimu. Bade ami tumar maz taki eḳ moha zati foeda ḳormu.”
Teu Musae tan Alla Mabudre minot-ḳajji ḳoria ḳoila, “O Mabud, tumi tumar kudroti at dia tumar moha kudroti bole zetare Mishor taki bar ḳori ancho, tarar ufre tumi ḳene oto gusa oilae?

Mishori oḳole ḳene ikan matar shuzug faita, faṛia elaḳat ania tarare ḳotom ḳoria, dunia taki tarar nam miṭailibar lagi tumi tarare Mishor taki bar ḳoria ancho? Mabud go, tumar i betaea gusaḳan tumi tamailao. Meherbani ḳori, tumar bonda oḳolor ufre i gozobḳan anio na.

Tumar afon gulam Ibrahim, Isʼhak ar Iakubor ḳota iad ḳoro. Tumi nizor name ḳosom ḳaia tarare ḳoislae, tarar oarish oḳolre tumi asmanor terar laḳan baṛaibae, ar tumar oada ḳora ou asta deshor malikanao tarare dibae, ar tara hor-hameshakur lagi er doḳol faiba.”
Ikan hunia Mabudor meherbani oilo. Tain tan bonda oḳolor ufre ze gozob ḍalita saisla, ita bad dilaila.
Erbade Musae Allar deoa duioḳan shahadot fattor loia lamat aila. I fattoror ulṭa-baṭiol duio galat leḳa asil.
I duio fattor oilo Alla Pakor nizor ator ḳam, ar i fattoror ufre kudia leḳaḳano tan nizor ator leḳa.
Musar ḳadim Iusae manshorita hoi-hulla hunia Musare ḳoila, “Sab, amrar kempor maze zuddor aoaz huna zar.”
Musae ḳoila, “Ita to kunu zuddor ara-zitar aoaz nae. Ami zeta huniar, ita to ganor aoazor laḳan lager.”
Bade Musae kempor ḳasat aia manshor nasa-nasi ar basuror murti deḳla. Dekiau tain gusae aguin oia, ator fattor duioḳan iṭa mari falai dila. Teu fattor duioḳan faṛor tole foṛia surmar oigelo.
Ar Musae tarar banail basuror murti nia agunit falaia zalailila. Bade ogure fishia guṛa banaia fanit mishaia, Boni Israil oḳolre ḳaoai dila.
Tain Harunre ḳoila, “Ita manshe tumar kun ḳeti ḳorsil, tumi ḳene tararedi shiriki ḳam ḳorailae?”
Harune zuaf dila, “Malik, afne gusa ḳoroin na zanu, afne to zanoinu, ita manush ḳali ḳaraf ḳamor ashik.
Tara aia amare ḳoila, amrare fot sinia loia zaoar lagi devta banai deukka, ḳaron ze Musae amrare Mishor taki bar ḳori anchoin, en kita oise, amra to zaniar na.
Ikan hunia ami tarare ḳoilam, tumrar gese zeta shuna-dana ase, ota kulia amar gese ano. Tara ania amar ato dila, ar ami oḳnain iṭa mari agunit falailam, teu ou basur ogu baroia ailo.”
Musae deḳla, i manushguin beforua oigesoin. Tain buzla, Harune tarare beforua oar shuzug disoin. Erlagi dushmon oḳole ashibar shuzug faisoin.
Ou Musae kempor geiṭor gese ubaia ḳoila, “Tumra zoto zon Mabudor fokke aso, hoḳol amar ḳasat ao.” Teu Lebi gusṭir hoḳol manush tan gese ailo.

Aia harle Musae tarare ḳoila, “Mabud, zein Boni Israilor Alla, tain nize hukum ḳorsoin, tumra hoḳole zarzir ḳomoro toluar bando, ar kempor bitre zare samne fao ḳatol ḳoro. Asta kempor bitre bai-bondu, ari-fori zare fao maro.”
Teu Lebi gusṭir manshe Musar hukum mafik kam ḳorla. Hi din onuman tin azar manush mara gela.
Bade Musae ḳoila, “Tumra aiz Mabudor name zarzir fua ar bai-biradoror ufre at tulte ḳoredi geso na, Mabudor ḳamor lagi tumra alada oiso, erlagi Mabude tumrare rohomot disoin.”
Bador din Musae manshore ḳoila, “Tumra to bezuita guna ḳorso. Te ami oḳon hirbar Tur faṛo Mabudor dorbaro zairam, farle tumrar guna mafir koforar kunu fot bar ḳormu.”
Musae Mabudor dorbaro gia aroz ḳorla, “O Mabud, i manushguinte bezuita guna ḳorilise. Tara nizor lagi shunar murti banaise.
Te tumi meherbani ḳoria tarar gunare oḳon maf ḳori dilao, ar zudi maf na ḳoro, taile tumar leḳa ḳata taki amar namḳano ḳaṭilao.”
Mabude zuaf dila, “Huno, amar birudde zera guna ḳorse, ami ḳali tarar namreu amar ḳata taki fusilimu.

Te tumi oḳon zaogi, ar ami ze deshor ḳota ḳoisi, tumi tarare loia hou desho roana dilao. Amar firistae tumrare fot deḳaia niba. Bade zebla shaza deoar shomoe oibo, ou shomoe ami tarar gunar shaza dimu.”
Harunor ate banail hou basuror murtir lagi manshe zeta ḳorsila, otar lagi Mabude tarar ufre gozob nazil ḳorla.

Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Zao, tumi ou zerare Mishor taki ancho, erare loia oḳonu i zaga saṛia zaogi. Amar oada ḳora hou desho zao. Ami Ibrahim, Isʼhak ar Iakubor gese oada ḳorslam, tarar oarish oḳolre ou desh oḳol dimu, te tumi tarare loia hono zaogi.
Ami tumrar age ḳori eḳzon firista faṭaimu. Ein gia honor Kenani, Amuri, Hiṭṭi, Farizi, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolre ḳedai diba.
Ita to dud ar mour banḍarala desh. Oile ami tumrar loge oia zaitam nae, ḳaron tumra kub gaṛteṛa-eḳguia zat, kizanu ami fotor mazeu tumrare nifat ḳorilai.”
I bifodor ḳota hunia manshe ḳanda-ḳaṭi lagaila. Tara ḳeu kunuzat goena-gaṭi finla na.

Ḳaron Mabude Musare ḳoisla, “Tumi Boni Israil oḳolre ḳo, tumra oilae gaṛteṛa zat. Ami eḳ foloḳor lagi geleo tumrare nifat ḳorilimu. Tumrar gotoro taki hoḳol goena-gaṭi kulilao, teu ami buzmu, tumrar lagi kita ḳortam.”
Teu Boni Israile Tur faṛou tarar goena-gaṭi hoḳolta kulilila, ita ar finla na.
Hozrot Musar eḳ tambu asil, tain Boni Israilor kempor bare duroi nia ou tambu fatita, i tambure tain ḳaneḳa-tambu ḳoia ḍakita. Mabudor ges taki ḳeu kunta zante saile tara ou ḳaneḳar gese zaita.
Musa zebla hi ḳaneḳa shorifo roana dita, ou shomoe hokkol manush zarzir tambur duaro ubaita ar Musa ḳaneḳat na hamani forzonto hoḳole tan bae sai roito.
Tain hi ḳaneḳa shorifo hamanir badeu Allai megor saḳa ḳaneḳar duaror muḳo lamia aito, ar Mabude zotoboil Musar loge batchit ḳorta, otoboil i saḳa ono roito.
Manshe zeblau i megor saḳare ḳaneḳar duaror gese deḳto, ou shomoe tara zarzir duaror ges taki Mabudre shoizda ḳorto.

Kunu manshe tar dustor loge mukamuki boia zela batchit ḳore, Mabudeo Musar loge oula mukamuki batchit ḳorta. Bade Musa kempo firia aita, oile tan ḳadim Nunor fua Iusa namor i zuan, Ḳaneḳa Shorif taki baroita na.

Musae Mabudor dorbaro aroz ḳorla, “Mabud, tumi to ḳoirae ami ota manshore loia zaitamgi, oile amar loge ar ḳare dirae, ikan to amare zanailae na. Tumi ḳali ḳoilae, tumi amare tumar nizor zon mono ḳoro ar amare tumar ḳas maear nozoro raḳso.
Te hasau zudi ami tumar maear nozoro taki, taile tumi kun kiale kita ḳoro, ota amare zanao, zate ami tumare furafur sini ar tumar rohomotor maze roi. Tumi to zano-u, i Israil zati tumaru proza.”
Mabude zuaf dila, “Huno, ami nizeu tumar loge oia zaimu ar tumare aram dimu.”
Ou tain ḳoila, “Tumi zudi amrar loge na zao, te amrare in taki bidae dio na.
Tumi na gele manshe kila buzba, amar ufre ar tumar i bonda oḳolor ufre tumar rohomot ase? Amrau zen duniar hoḳol zati taki alada, ikan kila buzba?”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Ṭik ase, tumi zela ḳoilae, ami ola ḳormu. Tumi to amar maear nozoro aso, tumare amar nizor afon mono ḳori.”
Teu Musae aroz ḳorla, “Te tumar shan-tozolli amare deḳao na.”
Mabude ḳoila, “Ami zare kushi doya ḳormu, ar zare kushi rohom ḳormu. Huno, tumar samnedi ami amar hokkol nek surot zair ḳormu. ‘Mabud, zein asoin’ tumar samne ami amar ou nam elan ḳormu.
Oile amar muḳ deḳar takkot tumar oito nae. Ḳaron amare dekille kunu Adom zat base na.
Te huno, tumi amar ḳasar ou zaga bae sao, deḳrae ni, fattoror eḳ taḳ ase, ou taḳor ufre tumi ubao.
Teu tumar samone dia amar shan-tozolli zaoar bala, ami tumare ou fattoror faṭar bitre haraimu. Ami na zaoa forzonto, amar at dia tumare guria raḳmu.
Bade amar at horaile, tumi amar ḳor gala deḳtae farbae, oile ḳeu amar muḳor didar faito nae.”
Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Agor fattoror laḳan tumi noea duḳan fattor tiar ḳoro. Tumi ze duḳan bangislae, hi fattoror maze ze hukum leḳa asil, ou hukum oḳol ami hirbar i duio fattoro lekia dimu.
Fozor badeu tumi tiar oia Tur faṛor ufre uṭio. Uṭia faṛor matat amar samne azir oio.
Tumar loge kunu manshore anio na, i faṛor kunuḳano zate kunu manush na ae. Faṛor ḳandat kunu goru-sagol ba meṛa-meṛire raḳte dio na.”
Teu Musae agor fattoror laḳan duḳan fattor banaila, ar Mabudor hukum mafik fozore uṭia fattor duioḳan ato loia Tur faṛor ufre uṭila.
Ar Mabudo megor saḳa taki lamia aila. Tain Hozrot Musar daro ubaia tan ‘Mabud, zein asoin’ nam elan ḳorla.
Tain Musar samna dia toshrif nila, ar ou ḳalam elan ḳori ḳori gela,
“Mabud, zein asoin,
rohman ar rohim Alla,
tain gusa ḳoroin dir gotie,
tan obiram maea-mohobbot ar hok-halalir kunu shima nai.
Tain azar azar oarish forzonto obiram maea-mohobbot ḳoroin,
manshor oinnae-oforad, naformani ar gunar mafi dein,
oile dushi zonre shazao dein.
Baf-dadar naformanir shaza,
tarar nati-futi forzonto bortain.”
Ikan huniau Musa nobi loge loge shoizdat foṛia ḳoila,

“O malik, ami zudi tumar dorbaro rohomot fai, te meherbani ḳori tumio amrar logḳano solo. Ou zati zudio kub gaṛteṛa-ekguia zat, ta-o tumi amrar guna ar ḳosurire maf ḳoria dilao. Amrare tumar afon proza hishabe ḳobul ḳorilao.”

Mabude ḳoila, “Huno, ami eḳ usilla boail ḳoriar, ami tumar hoḳol manshor samne ou laḳan keramoti ḳam deḳaimu, zeta asta duniar kunu zatir samne kunudino ḳora oise na. Tumi ou zeta manshor loge boshot ḳorrae, tara deḳba, ami Mabude tumrar lagi kita ḳoriar, ita dekia tarar zano ḍor malum oibo.
Ami aiz tumrare zeta hukum dimu, ita kial ḳori amol ḳoro. Ami Amuri, Kenani, Hiṭṭi, Farizi, Hibbi ar Zibuzi oḳolre tumrar samna taki ḳedai dimu.
Oile ḳobordar! Tumra ze desho zairae, i deshor manshor loge kunuzat chukti ḳorio na, arnae fando hamaibae.
Tumra tarar fuza-monḍop bangia ṭukra ṭukra ḳorbae, tarar boli ḳanain bangilibae, ar tarar Ashera-debir nishana kuṭi oḳol ḳaṭia falaibae.
Tumra kunu devtare fuza ḳorio na. Ḳaron Allar namu Mabud, tain nizor nam mafik ebadot faoar zoiggo. Tain tan nizor faona ebadot sain.

“Hou deshor manshor loge kunuzat chukti ḳorio na, arnae tara zebla shiriki ḳamor niote, tarar deb-debir samne nizore shofia diba, devtar name boli diba, ou shomoe tara tumrareo daot diba ar tumra gia tarar ou bolir gust ḳaibae.
Tumrar fuaintor loge tarar fuṛintor bia-shadi dibae, ar ou fuṛinte tarar devtar gese gia shiriki ḳam ḳorba, tarar loge tumrar fuaintoreo ṭanba.
“Tumra nizor lagi kunu zator murti banaio na.

“Tumra Ḳamir Saṛa Ruṭir Id adae ḳorio. Shat din ḳamir saṛa ruṭi ḳaio. Abib sandor ṭik kora tariḳo tumrare zela hukum deoa oise, ou laḳan id adae ḳorio. Mono rakio, ou sando tumra Mishor taki baroia aislae.
“Tumrar feṭor foeda hoḳol foela fua amar oibo. Erloge tumrar goru-sagol ba foshur foela meda baichchao amar oibo.
Ḳali gadintor foela meda baichchar bodola, amare egu meṛar baichcha bodola dia ogure ḳalas ḳoria nio. Ḳalas na ḳoraile ogur gordona bangilio. Tumrar hokkol boṛo fuainre ola ḳalas ḳorai nio.
“Huno, idor shomoe ḳeu ḳali ate amar ḳasat aio na.
“Haftar soedin tumra ḳam ḳorio, oile shat nombor din ziraio. Ket ḳora ar foshol daoar balao ziraio.
“Dan-gom daoar bala foela daoa foshol dia, tumra Foshol Daoar Id adae ḳorio. Bosoror hesh masho ketor faḳna fol baṛit anar bade Ḍera-goror Id adae ḳorio.
Bosoro tinbar tumrar hoḳol beṭain aia hoj ḳorar niote amar gese azir oio. Mono rakio, amiu Mabud, Boni Israilor Alla.

Ami hou deshor hoḳol zatire tumrar samon taki ḳedai dimu. Tumrar deshor shimana baṛaia boṛo ḳormu. Tumra bosoro tinbar nizor Alla Mabudor samne azir oio, teu tumrar zaga-zominor bae ḳeu lalos ḳorto nae.
“Amar namor kurbanir foshur loge tumra ḳamirala kunta lilla-kurbani dio na. Azadi Idor kurbanir kunuzat ḳani bian forzonto rakio na.
“Tumrar ketor daoa foela fosholor hoḳol taki bala ongsho Alla Mabudor goro loia aio.
“Ar huno, sagolor baichchar gust tar maʼr duddi randio na.”
Bade Mabude Musare ḳoila, “Tumi i ḳalam oḳol lekia to. Ami ou ḳalam mafik tumar loge ar Boni Israilor loge amar milonor usilla boail ḳorlam.”

Ou shomoe Musa nobi sallish din sallish rait Mabudor daro faṛor ufre roila. Tain kunuzat dana-fani ḳaila na. Mabude hou duio fattoror ufre tan loge milonor usillar ou aeat oḳol, mani shoriotor doshṭa hukum-ahkam lekia dila.
Teu Musae shahadot fattor duioḳan ato loia Tur Faṛ taki lamia aila. Mabudor loge batchit ḳorae Musar muḳor surot nurani oigelo, oile Musae ikan ṭer faila na.
Ou shomoe Harun ar hoḳol Boni Israile Musar nurani surot deḳla, dekia tara ḳasat aite ḍoraigela.
Oile Musae tarare ḍaḳ dila, teu Harun ar Boni Israilor murobbi oḳol tan gese aila, ar Musae tarar loge mat-ḳota matila.
Bade hoḳol Boni Israil tan ḳasat aila. Aia harle tain Tur faṛor ufre Mabudor deoa hoḳol hukum-ahkam tarare zanaila.
Tarar loge mat-ḳotar bade Musae tan nurani muḳ gurar lagi forda lagai dila.
Oile Musae zebla Mabudor loge batchitor lagi ḳaneḳar bitre tan samne zaita, ou shomoe i forda kulilita. Bade bare aia forda lagaita, ar Allar deoa hukum oḳol Boni Israilre zanaita.
Hoḳol manshe deḳta Musar muḳ nurani oigese. Musae tan muḳ gurilita ar Mabudor samne zaoar ag forzonto tan muḳ gura roito.
Musa nobie Boni Israilor hoḳol gusṭire dola ḳoria ḳoila, “Mabude hukum disoin, tan ou hukum-ahkam amol ḳorar lagi.
Tumra haftar soedin ḳam ḳorio, oile shat nombor din Mabudor name faḳ-fobitro din, aramor din, Zummabar. I din ze manshe ḳam ḳorbo, tare marilibae.
Zummabare tumrar ḳeuror goro aguin zalaio na.”
Hozrot Musae Boni Israilre ḳoila, “Mabude hukum disoin,
tumra zarzir dilor kushi mafik Mabudor name lilla loia ao. Anar shomoe oula siz oḳol lilla anio:
“Tumrar maze zara bala ustad ḳarigor, tara aia ou hoḳolta banaiba, zela Mabude hukum disoin:
Musa nobir boean bade Boni Israilor hoḳol gusṭi bidae oigela.

Gia tarar dilor eshki mafik zarzir ichchae Allar gor bananir lagi, imam Harunor faḳ-fobitro lebasor lagi ar ebadot ḳamor lagi hoḳol nomunar mal-samana loia aila. Allar name lilla dibar lagi ota loia tara azir oila.
Beṭain ba beṭintor maze zarar mone sailo, tara ita dila. Tara zarzir ḳafoṛor fing, ḳanor iaring, angṭi, golar har, ar hoḳol zator shunar goena ania Mabudor name Dulona Kurbani dila.
Ar zerar gese lil suta, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ, sagolor ruma, lal rong ḳora meṛar samṛa, fu’r samṛa asil, tara ita hoḳolta loia aila.
Zerar gese rufa ar fitol asil, tarao ita ania Mabudor name lilla dila. Allar goror ḳamo laganir zuka babla laḳṛi zerar gese asil, tarao ita loia aila.
Zeta beṭinte suta bananit ustad, tara nizor ate lil, baingoni, lal rongor suta, ar dami lilen ḳafoṛ banaia anla.
Ar suta banaora zeta beṭintor dilor maze eshki foeda oilo, tara sagolor ruma dia suta banaila.
Murobbi oḳole efron ar buḳor uforor tolit laganir lagi, akik moni ar dami dami fattor loia aila.
Lem zalanir tel, ḳelafoti boḳshibar tel, agor-kushboe bananir moshla ar zoetunor telo anla.
Mabude Musar mazdi zeta zeta ḳorar hukum disla, ita fura ḳorar lagi Boni Israilor hoḳol beṭain-beṭinte, zarzir kushi mafik lilla loia azir oilo.
Bade Musae hoḳol Boni Israilre ḳoila, “Mabude Ehuda gusṭir Huror nati, Urir fua Batselolre fosond ḳorsoin.
Tain ere nizor ruh mubarok dia kamil banaia, hoḳol laḳan ḳarigori ḳamor aḳol-buddi, biddae ustadi ḳamor ḳemota disoin.
Erlagi ein ḳarigori ḳam ḳorar bala nizor aḳol ḳaṭaia shuna, rufa, fitolor ufre shundor shundor noksha banaita farba.
Dami dami fattor ḳaṭa, laḳṛir ufre noksha, ar hoḳol nomunar ator ḳam ḳorta farba.
Ar oinno manshoreo ita ḳam hikanir lagi Batselol ar Dan gusṭir Ohisamaḳor fua Aholiabor dilo Mabude aḳol disoin.

Tain erare nanan zator nokshar ḳam, lil, baingoni, lal sutadi ḳafoṛ bain ḳora, noksha ḳora, silai ḳora, ar dami lilen ḳafoṛ silai ḳoraro aḳol disoin. Tara hoḳol nomunar ator ḳam ḳorta farba, ar nizor mon taki nanan nomunar noksha banaita farba.”

Musa nobie eoḳan ḳoila, “Mabude Batselol, Aholiab ar oinno ḳarigor oḳolre aḳol-buddi dan ḳorla, zate tara fobitro ebadot ḳanar hoḳol ḳam-ḳaz ḳorta faroin. Mabude zela hukum ḳorsoin, ou laḳan tara zanu ebadot ḳanar hoḳolta banain ar hazain.”
Ou ḳam ḳoranir lagi Musae Batselol ar Aholiabre anaila. Mabude zeta ustad ḳarigor oḳolre aḳol-hekmot disoin, ar i ḳam ḳorar lagi zerar dilo ḳaish foeda oise, Musae tarareo anaila.
Tara aia fobitro ebadot ḳana bananir lagi, Boni Israilor deoa lillar hoḳol mal-samana Musar ges taki shomzia nila. Manshe kushi oia nizor ichchae forteḳ din biane aro siz oḳol ania ono lilla dita.
Ze ustad ḳarigor oḳol ebadot ḳanar ḳamo asla, tara ita dekia, nizor ḳam toia aia Musare ḳoila,
“Mabude zeta zeta bananir hukum disoin, ita bananir lagi manshe dorḳar taki aro beshi mal-samana loia aira.”
Teu Musar hukume manshe hoḳol Boni Israilre zanai dila, ebadot ḳana bananir lagi, ḳeu zanu ar kunu mal-samana lilla na dein. Ougi manshe lilla deoa bond ḳorla.
Ḳaron ebadot ḳanar ḳamor lagi dorḳar taki aro beshi siz zugaṛ oigesil.
Bade ḳam ḳorra ustad oḳole fesail sutar dami lilen ḳafoṛ, lil, baingoni, ar lal sutadi banail dosh ṭukra ḳafoṛ dia Allar goror forda banaila. Ar ustad oḳole er ufre karubi oḳolor sobi bain ḳorla.
Forteḳ ṭukrain eḳ mafor asil, lambae aṭaish at ar fashe sair at.
Bade fasḳan fasḳan ḳori eḳano zuṛa dia boṛo ḳori duḳan terfal banaila.
Ar duio terfalor fashor ek kinarao, lil sutadi hukor fur deoa oilo.
Oula foela terfalor kinarao fonchashgu hukor fur ar dusra terfalor kinarao fonchashgu hukor fur lagail oilo. I duio hukor fur egu ar egur ulṭamuka ḳora oilo.
Bade shunadi fonchashgu huk banaia hou hukor furor mazedi haraia, boṛo duio terfalre zuṛa deoa oilo. Teu eḳan gor tiar oilo.
Allar goror salor lagi sagolor ruma dia terfalor laḳan egaroḳan ṭukra banail oilo.
Ita fortekḳan eḳoi mafor asil, tish at lamba ar sair at fash.
On taki fas ṭukra eḳloge zuṛa dia boṛo eḳ terfal banaila. Ar baki soe ṭukra zuṛa dia, aroḳan boṛo terfal banaila.
Foela boṛo terfalor fashor ek kinarao fonchashgu hukor fur lagaila, ar dusra terfalo-o oula lagaila.
Bade fitol dia fonchashgu huk banaia hou hukor furor mazedi haraia, ou boṛo duio terfal eḳano zuṛa dila. Teu i duio terfal milia eḳan sani oilo.
Lal rong ḳora meṛar samṛadi er uforor sani banail oilo, bade fu’r samṛadi aroḳan sani toiar ḳoria er ufre guri deoa oilo.
Bade babla laḳṛidi ḳoeḳan freim banail oilo.
Forteḳ freim asil lambae dosh at ar faṛe deṛ at.
Forteḳ freimo dugu ḳori faea lagaia goror hoḳol freim eḳlaḳan anaila.
Ou goror dokkin galar lagi bishḳan freim zuit ḳorla.
I bisho freimor faear tole sallishgu rufar bura lagaila. Forteḳ freimor dui faear tole dugu bura lagailo oilo.
Allar goror uttor galar lagio bishḳan freim zuit ḳorla.
I forteḳ freimor faear tole sallishgu rufar bura lagaila. Eḳo freimor tole dugu ḳori bura lagail oilo.
Ar fosim galar lagi, mani ḳor galar lagi soeḳan freim banaila.
Ar ḳoror duio kunat duḳan freim lagaila.
I duio kunar freimre ḳasar freimor loge tole-ufre zuṛa deoa oilo. Fortek kunar duio freimre daror freimor loge batti maria zuṛa deoa oilo.
Teu aṭḳan freim ar shulogu rufar bura laglo, eḳo freimor tole duiṭa ḳori bura dila.
Bade freimor zuṛa dibar lagi babla laḳṛidi ḳoegu lamba batti banaila.
Goror eḳ galar lagi fasgu batti, aroḳ galar lagi aro fasgu, ar fasgu batti ḳor gala, mani fosim galar lagi banaila.
Freimor mazḳano lagail ou battidi hoḳol freimor eḳ mata taki aroḳ mata aṭḳai dila.
Bade i freimḳanain shunadi lefila. Ar batti laganir lagi shunar ḳoṛa lagaia, battireo shunadi lefila.
Ou ustad ḳarigor oḳole dami lilen ḳafoṛdi eḳan forda banaila. Fordar ufre lil, baingoni, lal suta dia karubi oḳolor sobi bain ḳorla.
I forda ṭananir lagi babla laḳṛidi sairṭa kuṭi banaila, banaia ou kuṭintoreo shunadi lefila, kuṭintor matat shunar ḳoṛa lagaila. Kuṭir tole bura dibar lagi rufar sairṭa bura banail oilo.
Tambur duaror lagi lil, baingoni, lal suta ar dami lilen ḳafoṛdi noksha ḳori eḳan forda banaila.
I fordar lagi fasṭa ḳoṛa ar fasṭa kuṭi banail oilo. Kuṭir mata ar tol shunadi lefa oilo, kuṭir tolor burar lagi fitolor fasgu bura banaila.
Batselole babla laḳṛidi fobitro shahadot shonduk banaila. Iṭa aṛai at lamba, deṛ at fash ar deṛ at usa.
Er bare-bitre ḳaṭi shunadi lefila, er sairo kinarao shunar noksha lagaila.
Hunaror aguindi fuṛia sairṭa shunar ḳoṛa er sairo kunat lagaila, o galat duiṭa ar ho galat duiṭa lagaila.
Babla laḳṛidi dugu benda banaia shunadi lefila.
Shonduk boia neoar lagi i duio benda, shonduḳor dui galar ḳoṛar bitredi haraila.
Bade ḳaṭi shunadi shonduḳor eḳan sani banaila, oḳanor ufre gunar kofora adae ḳorar lagi. I sani lambae aṛai at, ar fashe deṛ at.
Shuna fiṭaia sanir duio galat duiṭa karubi banaila.
Duio karubi shonduḳor sanir dui kinarao roilo. I duio karubi sanir loge eḳano ḳori banail oilo, i astaṭa ḳali eḳ siz oilo.
Karubi deḳte Duldul guṛar laḳan ḍaḳna-ala, er duio ḍaḳna ufredi melia deoae, ou ḍaḳnar saear tole shonduḳor sani hamaigelo. Iṭa mukamuki uba roilo. Ar tarar souḳ roilo sanir bae.
Batselole bade babla laḳṛidi dui at lamba, eḳ at fash ar deṛ at usa ḳori eḳan ṭebul banaila.
Banaia harle ḳaṭi shunadi lefia er sairo kinarao noksha lagaila.
Ar er sanir sairo kinarao sair angul usa ḳori eḳ haz dila, hazor maze shunadi noksha lagaila.
Ṭebulor sairo kunar faear ufre shunar sairṭa ḳoṛa lagaila.
I sairo ḳoṛain ṭebulor kunar hou usa hazor tole lagani oilo, zate ṭebul boia neoar bala ḳoṛar bitre benda harail zae.
Ṭebulre boia neoar lagi babla laḳṛidi dugu benda banaia shunadi lefila.
Ṭebulor uforor tal-bashon, Allar name Shorbot-Fanir Kurbanir zog ar mog, hoḳolta ḳaṭi shunadi goṛaila.
Bade ḳaṭi shunadi eḳan seragdani tiar ḳorla. Seragdanir tola ar uforor ḍanḍi ḳaṭi shuna fiṭaia goṛaila. Er ḍanḍi, fulor laḳan fiala, kuṛi ar fafṛi oḳol seragdanir loge eḳano ḳori banaila.
Seragdanir ḍanḍir dui galat tinṭa ḳori muṭ soeṭa ḍal deoa oilo.
Forteḳ ḍalor maze zoba fulor laḳan tingu ḳori fiala tiar ḳora oilo. Seragdanir soeo ḍalo eḳlaḳan ḳam ḳora oilo.
Seragdanir mul ḍanḍir mazeo zoba fulor laḳan sairṭa fiala deoa oilo.
Ou mul ḍanḍi taki baroilo soeṭa ḍalor maze, foela duio ḍalor zuṛat egu ḳori kuṛi, dusra duio ḍalor zuṛat arok kuṛi, ar heshor duio ḍalor zuṛato kuṛi lagail oilo.
Kuṛi ar ḍal hoḳolta seragdani taki baroilo, hoḳolta milia eḳ siz oilo. Astaṭau ḳaṭi shuna fiṭaia banani oilo.
Ḳaṭi shunadi shatṭa lem, lemor fita saf ḳorar simṭa, zalail fitar sali toar lagi ḳoegu baṭi banail oilo.
Eḳ mon ḳaṭi shunadi i seragdani, ar logor hoḳolta tiar ḳora oilo.
Bade babla laḳṛidi sairkuna-ala agor-kushboe zalani ḳana banail oilo. Eḳ at lamba, eḳ at fash, ar dui at ubi dia i zalani ḳana banaila. Er sanir kunar hing oḳolo eḳano ḳori banaila.
Sani, sanir sairo kinara ar hing, hoḳolta ḳaṭi shunadi lefia sairo kinarao shunar noksha lagaila.
Er dui kinaror nokshar tole duigu ḳori shunar ḳoṛa lagail oilo, zate er bitre benda haraia boia neoa zae.
Babla laḳṛidi boia neoar benda banaila, iṭareo shunadi lefila.
Bade kushboeala moshla bananir ḳarigoror niome ḳelafoti boḳshibar fobitro tel ar kushboeala ḳaṭi agor tiar ḳorla.
Zalail Kurbanir lagi babla laḳṛidi fas at lamba, fas at fash ar tin at ubi dia sairkuni ḳori eḳan kurbani ḳana banaila.
Er sairo kunar ufre laḳṛidi sairṭa hing dila. Ou hing banaila sanir uforor kunar laḳṛi kudia, erlagi i astaḳan eḳ siz oilo. Bade fura kurbani ḳana fitoldi lefaila.
Kurbani ḳanar sali tular lagi boṛo samos ar sali toar gamla, lou toar baṭi, gust tular simṭa, angra toar fatil, hoḳolta fitoldi banaila.
Kurbani ḳanar lagi fitoldi eḳan zali banaila, banaia i zalire kurbani ḳanar bitoror mazḳanor sairo galar taṛiar tole lagaila.
Ar benda haranir lagi zalir sairo kunat sairṭa ḳoṛa lagaila.
Boia neoar benda banaila babla laḳṛidi, banaia duiogu fitoldi lefaila.
Ar kurbani ḳanare boibar lagi er kunar ḳoṛar bitre ou benda haraila. Kurbani ḳana banaila toḳtadi, ar er bitre pak raḳla.
Ozur fani toar lagi fitolor eḳ gamla banaila. Ebadoti ḳamor lagi zeta beṭin tambur duaror ḳasat aita, tarar fitolor aenadi i gamla ar er soki-ḳaṭ toiar ḳora oilo.
Batselole Allar goror sairo galabae uṭanor zaga raḳla. Uṭanor dokkin galar eḳ-sho at zagar lagi dami lilen ḳafoṛdi forda banaila.
I forda ṭananir lagi bishgu kuṭi banaila. Kuṭir tolat dibar lagi fitolor bishgu bura banaila, ar forda ṭananir lagi rufar ḳoṛa ar bandibar tar banaila.
Uṭanor uttor galar eḳ-sho at zagar lagi bishgu kuṭi, kuṭir tole dibar lagi fitolor bishgu bura, ar forda ṭananir lagi rufar ḳoṛa ar bandibar tar banaila.
Fosim galar fonchash at uṭanor lagi forda, doshgu kuṭi, doshgu bura, forda ṭananir lagi rufar ḳoṛa ar bandibar tar banaila.
Fub galar uṭano fonchash at asil.
Uṭanor geiṭor eḳ galar lagi fonro at lamba forda, tinṭa kuṭi, kuṭir tolor tingu bura,
ar dusra galato ou laḳan ḳori tinṭa kuṭi, tinṭa bura ar fonro at forda banail oilo.
Uṭanor sairo galar hokkol fordain dami lilen ḳafoṛdi banail oilo.
Kuṭir tolor hokkol bura fitolor, forda ṭananir ḳoṛa ar bandibar tar oilo rufar, kuṭir matao rufadi fesail oilo. Uṭanor sairo galar hokkol kuṭit rufar tardi banda oilo.
Uṭanor geiṭor lagi dami lilen ḳafoṛdi eḳan forda banail oilo. Bade lil, baingoni, lal sutadi noksha ḳora oilo. Fordaḳan bish at lamba, ar uṭanor baki fordar laḳan iṭao fas at usa deoa oilo.
Er sairo kuṭi ar bura fitolor, kuṭir ḳoṛa ar bandar tar rufar, kuṭir matao rufadi fesai deoa oilo.
Allar gor ar uṭanor sairo galar kuṭir fereg oḳol fitoldi banail.
Allar gor mani ou shahadot tambu banaite zeta mal-samana lagsil, imam Harunor fua Isamaror zimmae Lebi ḳandanor manshe itar hishab raḳla. Musa nobie ou hishab raḳar hukum disla.
Mabude Musare zelaḳan hukum disla, i hukum mafik Ehuda gusṭir Urir fua Batselole ita hokkolta banaila, tain asla Huror nati.

Dan gusṭir Ohisamaḳor fua Aholiabe Batselolre shaijjo ḳorla. Hoḳol zator ator ḳam ar noksha bananir ḳamo tain ustad asla. Dami lilen ḳafoṛor maze lil, baingoni, lal sutadi noksha ḳorar ḳamo-o tain ustad asla.
Dulona Kurbani taki faoa untish mon shat-sho tish tola shuna ou ebadot ḳana banaite lagse. I maf oilo ebadot ḳanar tular mafe.
Boni Israilor manush gonibar bala zerare gona oisil, tarar ges taki eḳ-sho mon eḳ azar shat-sho fosottoir tola rufa faoa gesil, i maf oilo ebadot ḳanar mafe.
Gona oise oula manush, mani bish boros ba er saite beshi boeoshala, hou soe lak tin azar shaṛe fas-sho manshe ebadot ḳanar mafe mata fisu ada tola ḳori rufa disil.
I rufa taki eḳ-sho mon rufa dia ebadot ḳana ar fordar kuṭir tolor bura banail oisil. Eḳ eḳ burat eḳ mon rufa dia muṭ eḳ-shogu bura banail oise.
Ar baki eḳ azar shat-sho fosottoir tola rufa kuṭir ḳoṛa, kuṭir mata fesani, ar bandibar tar bananit lagse.
Dulona Kurbani taki lillar fitol dola oisil shottoir mon dui azar sair-sho tola.
Ita dia milon-tambur duaror bura, fitolor kurbani ḳana, er fitolor zali ar kurbani ḳanar hokkol siz banail oise,
uṭanor sairo galar bura, geiṭor bura, tambu ar uṭanor sairo galar kuṭir fereg banail oise.

Allar goror faḳ zagat imamoti ḳamor shomoe findar lagi, tara lal, baingoni ar lil sutadi shundor ḳori lebas banaila. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ekkere ou laḳan ḳori imam Harunor lagi fobitro lebas banaila.
Ou ustad ḳarigor oḳole lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ ar shunadi fordan imamor efron banaila.
Shuna fiṭaia fat banaia, sutar laḳan shunar tar tiar ḳorla. Bade lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ ar shunar tar eḳloge milaia ḳafoṛ banaila.
Efronor ḳandor gala zuṛa dibar lagi duḳan foṭṭi banaia, efronor uforor kunat lagaila.

Efronor loge zuṛa lagail feṭor uforor belṭḳano efronor sutadi banaila. Tara lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ ar shunar tar dia ṭik efronor nomunae banaila. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ekkere ou laḳan ḳori hokkolta banail oilo.
Bade tara duiṭa akik fattor ḳaṭia, er ufre shunar zazoir boaila. Hunar oḳole dami fattor kudia zela shil banain, oula fattor kudia Israilor fuaintor nam lekla.
Ar ou duio fattor shunar zazoiror maze lagaia, efronor ḳandor fitar loge bandila. Israilor fuaintor bae Mabudor nozor raḳar lagi ila ḳorla. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, oula hoḳolta ḳora oilo.
Bade efronor laḳan bala ustad dorziredi lil, baingoni, lal suta, dami lilen ḳafoṛ ar shunadi buḳor uforor toli banail oilo.
Iṭa oilo lambae ada at, fashe ada at, sairkuni dui bainj ḳora ḳafoṛ.
Er ufre tara sair hair ḳori dami fattor lagaila. Foela harit iakut, fit ar fanna moni;
dusra harit lal-moni, lil-moni ar hira;
Tin nombor harit firuz, gumed ar foddorag moni.
Sair nombor hairo fuḳraz, boidurjo ar shuruz moni. I fattor oḳol shunar zazoiror ufre lagail oilo.
Israilor baro fuar lagi baroṭa fattor lagaila. Ita eḳo fattoro eḳ eḳ fuar nam kudia leḳa oilo, zela kudia shil banail oe.
Buḳor uforor tolir lagi ḳaṭi shunadi rosir laḳan fesaia duksa chein banaila.
Ar shunar duḳan zazoir ar duiṭa ḳoṛa banaia, buḳor ou tolir uforor dui kunat lagaila.
Ar chein duiogesa duio ḳoṛar loge aṭḳaila.
Duio ḳandor efronor samonor fitat shunar zazoiror loge cheinor eḳ mata bandila.
Aro duiṭa shunar ḳoṛa banaia buḳor uforor tolir dui kunat lagaila. I duioṭa efronor loge buḳor tolir tole roilo.
Bade aro duiṭa shunar ḳoṛa banaia, efronor ḳandor foṭṭir shoi toledi, feṭor uforor belṭor uforor silair ḳasat lagai dila.
Ar bukur uforor tolir tolor ḳoṛar loge feṭor uforor noksha ḳora belṭor ḳoṛa bandila, ar ou tolie loṛa-soṛa na ḳorar lagi tolor ḳoṛar loge lil sutadi bandi dila, zela Mabude Musare hukum ḳorsla.
Bade tara efronor tolor alḳella lil rongor sutadi bain ḳorla,
ar mata haraibar bala golar pak siṛto na ḳori er sairo gala foṭṭi dia doṛ ḳori bain ḳorla, golar ou pak raḳla maz borabor.
Lil, baingoni, lal rongor fesail sutadi anuar folor laḳan banaila. Banaia oguinre alḳellar tolor muṛir sairobae lagaila.
Bade ḳaṭi shunar gungur banaia ou anuaror faḳe faḳe lagaila,
asta tolor muṛit ekgu ḳori anuar ar ekgu ḳori gungur lagail oilo. Ebadoti ḳamor bala imam sabe ou alḳella findita. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ekkere oula ḳora oilo.
Bade tara Harun ar tan fuaintor lagi dami lilen sutadi fainjabi banaila.
Matar faugṛi ar tokiguino dami lilen ḳafoṛdi banaila, ar imamor haf-penṭo banaila ou ḳafoṛdi.
Ḳomoro bandar lagi eḳan ḳafoṛ banaila, dami lilen ḳafoṛ, lil, baingoni ar lal sutadi noksha ḳori banaila. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ekkere oula ḳora oilo.
Ar faugṛir samne laganir lagi, ḳaṭi shunar fatdi eḳan fobitro taz tiar ḳorla. Shilor ufre zela kudia leka oe, ou fattor ufre ola kudia lekla, ‘Mabudor name fobitro.’
Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ou hukum mafiku i fatre lil sutadi faugṛir samne bandi dila.
Ou laḳan milon-tambu shoho Allar goror hokkol ḳam-ḳaz shesh oilo. Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, Boni Israile ekkere ou laḳan hoḳolta ḳorla.
Bade tara Allar goror lagi banail hokkolta Musar ḳasat loia aila. Tara anla:
Mabude Musare zela hukum disla, ou laḳan Boni Israil oḳole hoḳol ḳam ḳorla.
Heshe Musae ita hoḳolta dekia buzla, Mabude zela hukum disla, ou laḳanu ḳora oise. Erlagi tain hoḳol Boni Israilre dua dila.
Mabude Musa nobire ḳoila,
“Tumi bosoror foela sandor foela tariḳo milon-tambu shoho amar gorre ḳaṛa ḳorio.
Goror bitre shahadot shondukre haraia, maze forda ṭanaia shondukre aoṛe toio.
Ṭebulreo bitre haraia, er uforor siz oḳol hazaio. Bade seragdani bitre ania tar lem oḳol zalai dio.
Shunadi banail agor-kushboe zalani ḳana shahadot shonduḳor samne toio, toia amar goror duaror forda lagaio.
Amar goror milon-tambur duaror samne Zalail Kurbani ḳana toio.
Kurbani ḳana ar milon-tambur mazḳano ozur gamla fanidi boria toio.
Bade uṭanor sairo galabae forda ṭanaio, ar uṭanor geiṭo-o forda lagaio.
“Bade tumi ḳelafotir tel dia amar gor ar amar goror hoḳol mal-samanare fobitro ḳorio. Teu ita hoḳolta moha faḳ-fobitro oibo.
Ar Zalail Kurbani ḳanar ufreo ḳelafotir tel dia fobitro ḳorio. Kurbani ḳanar hoḳol mal-samanareo fobitro ḳorio. Teu i kurbani ḳana moha-fobitro siz oibo.
Ozu ḳorar gamla ar er tolor soki-ḳaṭreo ḳelafotir tel dia fobitro ḳorio.
“Bade Harun ar tar fuainre milon-tambur duaror samne ania fanidi naoai dio.
Naoanir bade Harunre faḳ-fobitro lebas oḳol findaio, ar amar imam oar lagi tare fobitro tel lagaia ḳelafoti dia fobitro ḳorio.
Tar fuaintore ania imamotir fainjabi findaio.

Tarar bafore zela fobitro teldi imamoti ḳamor ḳelafoti diso, tarareo oula ḳelafoti dio. Zate tarao amar imamoti ḳam ḳorta faroin. I ḳelafotir mazdi imamotir ze niom salu oibo, ita oarishor for oarish dori salu roibo.”
Mabudor hukum mafik Musae ita hoḳolta ḳorla.
Dusra bosoror foela sandor foela tariḳo Allar gor ḳaṛa ḳora oilo.
Musae i gor ḳaṛa ḳorla, foela er kuṭir tolor bura boaila, kuṭin uba ḳorla, beṛar freim lagaila, freimor bitredi batti dila.
Mabudor hukum mafik tain sagolor ruma dia goror foela sani dila, er ufre dila aro duiṭa sani.
Bade fobitro shahadot-fattor ania shonduḳor bitre haraila. Shonduk boia neoar benda lagaila, shonduḳor uforor sanio lagaila.
Ar shondukre nia Allar goror bitre haraila. Haraia forda ṭanaia shondukre aoṛe raḳla. Zela Mabude Musare hukum disla.
Shonduḳor ou fordar bare uttor galabae, milon-tambur maze fobitro ruṭir ṭebul raḳla.
Ṭebulor ufre Mabudor namor fobitro ruṭi hazaia toila, zela Mabude Musare hukum disla.
Ṭebulor samne tambur dokkin galat seragdani toila.
Bade Mabudor samne lemguin zalaila, zela Mabude Musare hukum disla.
Milon-tambur mazḳanor fordar samne shunadi banail agor-kushboe zalani ḳana toila.
Oḳanor ufre kushboeala agor zalaila, zela Mabude Musare hukum disla.
Bade Musae duaror forda ṭanaila.
Tain Allar goror milon-tambur duaror ḳandat Zalail Kurbani ḳana toila. Toia er ufre zalail foshu kurbani ar Foshol Kurbani dila, zela Mabude Musare hukum disla.
Bade milon-tambu ar kurbani ḳanar mazḳano ozur gamla toila, toia ozur fani boria dila.
Ou fani dia Musa, Harun ar Harunor fuainte ozu ḳorta.
Mabudor hukum mafik tara milon-tambut hamanir age, ba kurbani ḳanar ḳandat zaoar age ozu ḳorta.
Bade Musae Allar gor ar kurbani ḳanar sairobae forda ṭanaia uṭan banaila. Uṭanor geiṭor forda lagaila. Ou laḳan Musae tan hoḳol ḳam shesh ḳorla.
Ḳam shesh ḳoria harle, gaibi megor saḳa aia ou milon-tambure gurililo, Mabudor mohima ar kudrote asta gor bori gelo.
Erlagi Musa ar milon-tambut hamaita farla na, ḳaron er ufre hou megor saḳa asil, ar Mabudor kudroti mohimae asta gor bori gesil.
Boni Israilor ou asta soforor maze, Allar goror ufre taki megor saḳa horia harle tara aṭia roana dita.
Oile megor saḳa ufre taki na hora forzonto tara baroita na, ou saḳa horar lagi bar saita.
Ḳaron Boni Israilor ou asta soforor mazeu, dinor bala tarar sokur samne Allar goror ufre megor saḳa roito, ar raitor bala roito aguinor saḳa. Amin.
Jonah: Mattar fua Iunusor gese Mabudor ou ohi nazil oilo,
“Tumi roana deo, ar Ninob namor hou boṛo ṭauno zao, gia amar gozobor ḳota zanao. Tarar naformani amar dorbaro zair oigese.”

Oile Iunuse Mabudor hukumor borḳelaf ḳoria bagia Spen desho zaoar lagi roana oigela. Tain Zafa namor zazor gaṭo gia Spen desho zaura eḳan zaz faia, zazor baṛa adae ḳoria bitre hamaia Mabudor samne tone bagita ḳori naiaintor loge oia roana dilaila.
Oile Mabude doriar maze eḳ bezuita tufan saṛila. Tufanor ṭelae zazḳan bangi zaoar dosha oilo.
Naiainte ḍoraia zarzir devtar gese ḳanda-ḳaṭi ḳorat lagla. Ar zazor bar ḳomanir lagi mal-samana doriat falai dilo. Oile Iunus zazor tolor talat lamia huti roila, hutia bedum gumo foṛla.
Ou shomoe zazor sharong Iunusor gese gia ḳoila, “Oi mia! Tumi ḳemne gumairae? Kunta hunrae nae ni? Uṭo, tumar devtare ḍako. Oito fare tain amrar bae kial ḳorba, amrar zan binash oito nae.”
Bade naiainte eḳe-oinne ḳoilo, “Ao amra loṭari maria deki, ḳar dushe i mosibot aise.” Teu tara loṭari marlo ar loṭarir maze Iunusor nam uṭlo.
Ou tara tanre zikaila, “Ḳo sain, ḳar dushe amrar ufre i mosibot aise? Tumi kita ḳam ḳoro? Kuai taki aiso? Kun deshor manush? Tumi kun zator manush?”
Iunuse zuaf dila, “Baiainre, ami eḳzon Ibrani, Israil zatir manush. Ami behestor malik Alla Mabudor ebadot ḳori, tainu doria ar zomin foeda ḳorsoin.”
Tain aro ḳoila, Mabudor samne tone bagibar niote tain aia zazo uṭsoin. Ikan hunia tara kub ḍoraia ḳoila, “Hae, hae! Tumi ita kun zator ḳam ḳorlae?”
Doriar tufan zebla aro bezuita bab dorlo, ou shomoe tara tanre zikailo, “Amra tumare kita ḳorle doria tir oibo?”
Iunuse zuaf dila, “Amare doria doriat falai deo, teu doria shanti oizibo. Ami to zani, amar dusheu afnaintor ufre i gozobi tufan aise.”
Oile naiainte tane na falaia zazḳan kinaro biṛanir lagi zan-foran shofia daṛ baila, tufanor zur ḳali baṛteu roilo, erdae tara zazḳan kinaro nita farla na.
Teu tara Allar gese foriad ḳorlo, ḳoilo “O Mabud, rohom ḳoro, ou manshor zanor lagi tumi amrare mario na, i ni-oforadir zanor ḳarone amrare daei ḳorio na. O Mabud, ita hoḳoltau to tumar munsha.”
Bade tara Iunus nobire doria doriat falai dilo, ar doriar tufanor ḍeu dom loililo.
I halot dekia tara Mabudre kub ḍoraila. Tara Mabudor name foshu-kurbani dila ar mannot manla.
Mabude kub boṛo eḳ masre zugai toisla Iunusre gililibar lagi, tain tin din, tin rait hou masor feṭo roila.
Iunuse masor feṭo tone Mabud Allar dorbaro dua ḳorla.
Mosiboto foiṛa Moula ḍakilam tore,
rohom ḳoria tui zuaf dile more.
Fatalor feṭo boia ami ḳandilam,
ḳobul ḳorilae aroz rohim rohman.
Doriar muro bondu more falailae,
tumar fanir ḍeue amae bashai loia zae.
Mile na didar tumar nai ḳanḍari,
tallashi ḳoria mukam zikir ḳori.
Ḍeuor mazete foṛi zan doṛfoṛ ḳore,
doriar lota-fatae fesililo more.
Fatalor tole gia miler na kinar,
ḳoredi saia deki duar nai ar.
Bondi oia ḳandi ami nirash bodone,
azad ḳorilae Moula goin gaṛa tone.
Zan amar zae zae oilo zoḳon,
ḳator oia go bondu ḳorinu shoron.
Bikka mangilam ḳangal dorbare tumar,
arosho taki doyal deḳailae didar.
Murtifuza ḳore zara na faibo rohomot,
elami ḳoria tara arailo kudrot.
Shukur-guzar ḳoro Iunus Mabud meherban,
tumar dorbare ami ḳorimu kurban.
Lilla-sodga dan-ḳoerat shofimu tore,
nazator Malik-Moulae basao amare.
Bade Mabude hou masre hukum dila, mase Iunusre nia hukna zominor ufre bait ḳori falai dilo.
Bade Iunusor ufre dusrabar Mabudor ou ohi nazil oilo.
Tain ḳoila, “Tumi roana deo, oḳon hou boṛo ṭaun Ninob zao, ar ami tumare zeta batai dimu tumi outa tarar gese elan ḳoro.”
Mabudor hukum mafik Iunus roana oia Ninob gela. Ninob oilo kub boṛo ṭaun, i ṭaunor eḳ mata taki aroḳ matat zaite tin din lagto.
Iunus hou ṭauno hamaia eḳdinor fot gela, gia elan ḳorla, ḳoila, “O Ninobor bashinda oḳol, ar sallish din bade Ninob ṭaun uloṭ-faloṭ oizibo.”
Ikan hunia Ninobor manshe Allar ufre iman anla, tara ruza raḳar lagi elan ḳorla, ar huru-boṛo hoḳole duḳ zair ḳorar lagi solar soṭ findila.
I ḳobor gia bashshar dorbaro azilo, taino bashshai godi saṛia finnor lebas kulia, solar soṭ findia salir maze boila.
Ar tain asta Ninob ṭauno ou elan ḳoraila, “Bashsha ar tan uzir-nazir oḳolor hukum oilo: Manush ba foshu, goru-sagol ḳeu kunuzat dana-fani kuntau muko dio na.
Manush ar foshu, hoḳole milia solar soṭ findia dile-zane Allar nam lo, hoḳole zarzir naformanir fot saṛo ar zur-zulum bad dia Allar bae firo.
Oito fare Allae rohom ḳorba, gozobor kial bodlailiba, tan dau dau ḳora gusa one ṭanḍa oiziba, ar amra binash oitam nae.”
Allae tarar i halot deḳla, tara zarzir naformanir fot bad dia touba ḳorsoin. Dekia taino tan irada bodlailila, tarare age binash ḳorar ḳota ḳoileo oḳon ar binash ḳorla na.
Oile Iunuse itar lagi teḳto oia kub gusa ḳorla.

Tain Mabudor dorbaro foriad ḳorla, “O Mabud, ami desho taḳteu to zantam ilaḳan oibo. Erdae ami ageu Spen desho horia zaitamgi saislam. Ami to zani, tumi doya-momotae bora Alla, gusa ḳoro dir gotie, rohom ḳoro behishab, ar gozob nazilor befare tumar morzi bodlailao.
O Mabud, ami oḳon aroz ḳorram, tumi amar zanḳan neogi, amar to basa taki morau bala.”
Mabude zuaf dila, “Tumar gusa ḳora ṭik or ni?”
Bade Iunus ṭaunor bara gela, gia fubedi eḳ zagat ḍera ṭangaia, ḍerar sebat boi roila. Ar ṭaunor kita dosha oe outa deḳar lagi bar saoat roila.
Mabud Allae hono eḳ gas zugaila. I gasor lot baṛia lamba oia, Iunusor ḳoshṭo ḳomanir lagi tan matar ufre aramor seba dilo. Ar Iunuseo i gasor seba faia kub allade godgod ḳorla.
Oile bador din fozor oḳto Allae egu fuk zugaila. Fuke aia gasor guṛi ḳaṭidilo, ḳaṭar bade igu hukaigelo.
Bade zebla shuruz uṭlo, ou shomoe Allae fubali gorom haoa zugaila. Roide Iunusor matat kub gorom laglo, tain beush oizibar dosha. Teu Iunuse moron mangila, ḳoila, “Amar to basa taki moronu bala.”
Oile Allae Iunusre ḳoila, “I gasor lagi tumar gusa ḳora kunu ṭik or ni?” Tain ḳoila, “Itar ḳaron ase. Ami gusa ḳoriau mormu.”
Mabude ḳoila, “Tumi to i gasor lagia kunu ḳoshṭo ḳorso na, ar igu boṛo-o ḳorso na. Igu to ḳali eḳ raite oise, ar eḳ raiteu morigese, tebou igur lagi tumar maea lagse.
Oile i Ninob ṭauno to eḳ laḳ bish azaroro beshi manush asoin, zera nizor ḍain-bau kita sine na. Ar bout heman-zanuaro asoin, te oto boṛo ṭaunor bae ami kita maea-momota ḳortam na ni?”
Malachi: Malaki nobir usillae Boni Israilor gese Mabudor ohi.
O Boni Israil, ami Mabude ḳoiram, ami to hamesha tumrare mohobbot ḳori.
Oile tumra ḳoirae, “Tumi kila amrare mohobbot ḳorlae?”
Te huno, Ish kita Iakubor bai asil na ni? Oile ami to tumrar ḳandanor murobbi Iakubre mohobbot ḳorsi,
ar Ishre horaia raḳsi. Ami tar faṛ oḳol binash ḳorsi, tar biṭa-maṭi morubumir hialor aḳra banaisi.
Ishor aolad Idumi oḳole ḳoito fare, “Amrare surmar ḳora oileo amra i surmar ḳora hoḳolta hirbar banailimu.”
Oile ami Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiar, tara ita banaileo ami bangilimu, ikanre ḳoa oibo, ‘Naformanir desh, ze deshor manshor loge Mabude hamesha gusa ḳoroin.’
I halot tumrar nizor souke dekia ḳoibae, “Israil deshor shimanar bareo Mabudor takkot ḳaim ase.”

O imam oḳol huno, ami Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiar, fuainte tarar bafore ijjot ḳoroin, saḳoreo tarar malikre ḍorain. Ou laḳan ami eḳzon malik oile, amar bae ḍor-ḳof kuai? Ar ami eḳzon baf oile amar faona ijjot kuai? Tumrau to amare beijjot ḳorso.
Oile tumra hirbar ḳoirae, “Amra kila tumare beijjot ḳorlam?”
Tumra to amar kurbani ḳanar ufre nafak kurbani dirae.
Dia ḳoirae, “Amrar kurbani nafaḳ oilo kila?”
Tumra buzairae Mabudor kurbani ḳana kuntau nae.

Ami Alla Rabbul Alamine zikairam, kurbanir niote tumra zebla anda foshu loia ao, ita kunu ṭik oe ni? Ar lula-lengṛa, bemari foshu kurbani deo, ita ṭik ni? Tumrar deshor razare oula foshu ufohar dia deḳo sain, tain kushi oin ni? Ar tumrar abdar raḳoin ni?
Huno, Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiram, tumra amar dorbaro rohomot mangile kunu lab oibo ni? Tumra zebla nizor ateu olaḳan kurbani deo, te ami ar tumrare rohom ḳormu kila?

Haere hae! Tumrar maze eḳzoneo zudi amar Baetul-Mukaddosor geiṭ ḳanain bond ḳorilto, tumra amar kurbani ḳanar ufre beḳamaea aguin na zalaitae, te ami kushi oilam one. Oḳon to ami Mabud tumrar ufre kushi nae, ar tumrar at tone kunu lilla-sodgao ḳobul ḳortam nae.

Huno, Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiar, duniar eḳ mata taki aroḳ mata forzonto tamam zatir maze amar kudroti shan ḳaim or. Tamam zomino amar name agor batti zalani or, manshe faḳ-saf lilla-sodga dira. Hoḳol zatir mazeu to amar shan-shouḳot ḳaim ase.
Oile tumra amar namre beijjot ḳorrae. Tumra to ḳoirae, “Mabudor kurbani ḳana kuntau nae, i kurbanir kunu damu nai.”
Amare beijjotir niote ḳoirae, “Ita to ḳamoḳa ḳoshṭo deoa!”
Te Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiar, tumra ḍaḳati ḳora, ar lula-lengṛa, bemari foshu ania kurbani dirae, ami kunu ota kurbani tumrar at tone ḳobul ḳormu ni?

Ami Alla Rabbul Alamine ḳoiar, ḳeuror falor maze nikut meda foshu ase, ogure kurbani ḳorar lagi he nioto ḳorse, oile bade ṭogami ḳori kunu kut-ala foshu Mabudor name kurbani dey, tar ufre lannot foṛouk! Ami to mohan bashsha, tamam zatie amare tazim ḳore.
Ami Alla Rabbul Alamine imam oḳolre hushiar ḳori ḳoiram,

tumra zudi amar ḳota na huno ar amar ijjot-tazimor bae furafur kial na ḳoro, te ami tumrar ufre lannot falaimu. Tumrar hoḳol rohomotreo gozob banailimu. Ashole tumra amar ḳota mancho na ḳori ou laḳan gozob oḳono ḍalia aiar.
Tumrar lagi tumrar aolad oḳolreo shaza dimu. Tumrar idor kurbanir foshur gufor-sena ami tumrar muko maḳaimu, ota maḳail halote manshe tumrare horaia falaiba.
